Meaning: To lay means to put or place in a horizontal or flat position.
Meaning_Translation: 「放置」是指將某物平放。
Example: Don’t lay your socks on the floor.
Example_Translation: 別把襪子放在地板上。

Meaning: Peace is a time without war.
Meaning_Translation: 「和平」是沒有戰爭的時期。
Example: A white dove is a symbol of peace.
Example_Translation: 白鴿是和平的象徵。

Meaning: A prince is the son of a king.
Meaning_Translation: 「王子」是國王的兒子。
Example: The prince and the princess were married.
Example_Translation: 王子和公主結婚了。

Meaning: To protect someone is to stop them from getting hurt.
Meaning_Translation: 「保護」是指防止某人受傷。
Example: Firemen protect us from fires.
Example_Translation: 消防員保護我們免受火災。

Meaning: To sense something is to know about it without being told.
Meaning_Translation: 「察覺」是指未經告知就感知某事。
Example: I could sense that he was watching me.
Example_Translation: 我能感覺到他在盯著我看。

Meaning: When something is sudden, it happens very quickly.
Meaning_Translation: 「突然的」是指事情發生得非常快。
Example: He felt a sudden pain in his chest.
Example_Translation: 他胸口突然一陣痛。

Meaning: Therefore means for this reason.
Meaning_Translation: 「因此」是基於這個理由。
Example: He is fat. Therefore, he should go on a diet.
Example_Translation: 他很胖，因此應該減肥。

Meaning: To accept something that is offered is to take it.
Meaning_Translation: 「接受」是指收下被提供的東西。
Example: I accepted the girl’s very nice gift.
Example_Translation: 我接受了女孩送的精美禮物。

Meaning: To arrange things is to put them in the right place.
Meaning_Translation: 「安排」是指將物品放在正確位置。
Example: Please arrange the words in order from A to Z.
Example_Translation: 請把單字按A到Z排序。

Meaning: To attend something is to go to it.
Meaning_Translation: 「出席」是指前往某活動。
Example: My sister and I attend the same school.
Example_Translation: 我和妹妹上同一所學校。

Meaning: You chase people when you run after them and try to catch them.
Meaning_Translation: 「追趕」是指跑在後面試圖抓住某人。
Example: I was chased by a dog.
Example_Translation: 我被一隻狗追。

Meaning: A contrast is a sharp difference between two things.
Meaning_Translation: 「對比」是兩事物之間的明顯差異。
Example: The contrast between my parents is very noticeable.
Example_Translation: 我父母的差異非常明顯。

Meaning: To encourage people is to make them want to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「鼓勵」是指使人想做某事。
Example: My football coach will encourage us when we are losing.
Example_Translation: 我們落後時，足球教練會鼓勵我們。

Meaning: People or things familiar to you are those you know well.
Meaning_Translation: 「熟悉的」人或事物是你熟知的。
Example: The two friends were very familiar with each other.
Example_Translation: 這兩個朋友彼此很熟。

Meaning: To grab is to take a hold of someone or something suddenly.
Meaning_Translation: 「抓住」是指突然抓住某人或某物。
Example: I grabbed a pear from the tree.
Example_Translation: 我從樹上摘了一顆梨子。

Meaning: To hang something is to keep it above the ground.
Meaning_Translation: 「懸掛」是指將某物保持在地面之上。
Example: I drew a picture of my family, and my mother hung it on the wall.
Example_Translation: 我畫了一張全家福，媽媽把它掛在牆上。

Meaning: If something is huge, it is very big.
Meaning_Translation: 「巨大的」事物是非常大的。
Example: At work, my father drives a huge truck.
Example_Translation: 我爸上班開一輛大卡車。

Meaning: If something is necessary, you must do it.
Meaning_Translation: 「必要的」事物是你必須做的。
Example: A passport is necessary if you travel to other countries.
Example_Translation: 去國外旅行需要護照。

Meaning: A pattern is a way in which something is done or organized.
Meaning_Translation: 「模式」是做事或組織的方式。
Example: My pattern of brushing my teeth is the same as most people’s.
Example_Translation: 我刷牙的方式和大多數人一樣。

Meaning: To propose something is to say that it should be done.
Meaning_Translation: 「提議」是指建議應該做某事。
Example: My grandmother proposed that we have our picture taken with Santa.
Example_Translation: 奶奶提議我們和聖誕老人拍照。

Meaning: A purpose is the reason that you do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「目的」是你做某事的原因。
Example: The purpose of exercising is to get into shape.
Example_Translation: 運動的目的是保持身材。

Meaning: To release something is to stop holding it.
Meaning_Translation: 「釋放」是指停止抓住某物。
Example: She released the bird from her hands.
Example_Translation: 她把手裡的鳥放飛。

Meaning: To require something is to say that it is necessary.
Meaning_Translation: 「要求」是指說明某事是必要的。
Example: We require teachers to have a university degree.
Example_Translation: 我們要求老師要有大學學位。

Meaning: You are satisfied when you have what you wanted.
Meaning_Translation: 「滿足的」是指得到了想要的東西。
Example: I am very satisfied with your work.
Example_Translation: 我對你的工作非常滿意。

Meaning: If something is single, then there is only one.
Meaning_Translation: 「單一的」是指只有一個。
Example: I have a single key in my hand.
Example_Translation: 我手上只有一把鑰匙。

Meaning: To tear something means to pull it apart.
Meaning_Translation: 「撕裂」是指將某物扯開。
Example: It is easy to tear paper.
Example_Translation: 紙很容易撕破。

Meaning: A theory is an idea about how something works.
Meaning_Translation: 「理論」是關於某事如何運作的想法。
Example: We talked about Einstein’s theory of relativity in class.
Example_Translation: 我們在課堂上討論愛因斯坦的相對論。

Meaning: An animal is a living thing that can move.
Meaning_Translation: 「動物」是能移動的生物。
Example: My favorite animal is the panda.
Example_Translation: 我最喜歡的動物是熊貓。

Meaning: A bus is a large vehicle that people travel on.
Meaning_Translation: 「公車」是供人搭乘的大型交通工具。
Example: My father takes the bus to work.
Example_Translation: 我爸搭公車上班。

Meaning: A cat is a small animal related to lions and tigers that is kept as a pet.
Meaning_Translation: 「貓」是與獅子和老虎相關的小型動物，常當寵物飼養。
Example: This cat is playing with a ball.
Example_Translation: 這隻貓在玩球。

Meaning: A command is an order given to a person or animal to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「命令」是給人或動物去做某事的指示。
Example: Joe gave the students a command to stand up.
Example_Translation: 喬命令學生起立。

Meaning: To depend on something is to need it for support or help.
Meaning_Translation: 「依賴」是指需要某物來支持或幫助。
Example: My grandfather depends on a cane when he walks.
Example_Translation: 我爺爺走路要靠拐杖。

Meaning: A dog is an animal with four legs and a tail that is kept as a pet or trained to work.
Meaning_Translation: 「狗」是有四條腿和尾巴的動物，常當寵物或訓練工作。
Example: This woman’s best friend is her dog.
Example_Translation: 這位女士最好的朋友是她的狗。

Meaning: A door is an object that swings or slides open and shut.
Meaning_Translation: 「門」是可以擺動或滑動開關的物件。
Example: Can you close the door, please?
Example_Translation: 你可以幫忙關門嗎？

Meaning: A friend is someone a person knows and likes spending time with.
Meaning_Translation: 「朋友」是認識且喜歡共度時光的人。
Example: Brian’s friend is very sad.
Example_Translation: 布萊恩的朋友很難過。

Meaning: To hear is to be aware of sound through your ears.
Meaning_Translation: 「聽見」是指透過耳朵察覺聲音。
Example: Michelle cannot hear what you are saying.
Example_Translation: 蜜雪兒聽不到你在說什麼。

Meaning: To help is to do something that makes something easier for someone else.
Meaning_Translation: 「幫助」是指做些事讓別人更容易。
Example: Jane can help Nathan climb up the rock.
Example_Translation: 珍可以幫奈森爬上岩石。

Meaning: A horse is a big, strong animal that people ride and use for pulling heavy things.
Meaning_Translation: 「馬」是高大強壯的動物，供人騎乘或拉重物。
Example: I went to a farm and saw a horse.
Example_Translation: 我去農場看到一匹馬。

Meaning: A hospital is where sick or hurt people receive care or treatment.
Meaning_Translation: 「醫院」是病人或傷者接受照護或治療的地方。
Example: The doctor talks to a patient at the hospital.
Example_Translation: 醫生在醫院和病人說話。

Meaning: A leg is a body part used for standing and walking.
Meaning_Translation: 「腿」是用於站立和行走的身體部位。
Example: She hurt her leg.
Example_Translation: 她傷到腿了。

Meaning: Medical means related to the treatment of an injury or disease.
Meaning_Translation: 「醫療的」是指與傷病治療相關的。
Example: Tyler is a medical student studying to become a doctor.
Example_Translation: 泰勒是醫學院學生，未來想當醫生。

Meaning: To open is to move something so that an opening is not covered.
Meaning_Translation: 「打開」是指移動某物使開口不被遮蓋。
Example: Amy likes to open the window to let fresh air in.
Example_Translation: 艾米喜歡開窗讓新鮮空氣進來。

Meaning: To pull is to hold onto something to move it toward you.
Meaning_Translation: 「拉」是指抓住某物將它朝自己移動。
Example: The children pull the rope.
Example_Translation: 孩子們拉繩子。

Meaning: A rabbit is a small animal with long ears that lives in a hole in the ground.
Meaning_Translation: 「兔子」是長耳朵的小動物，住在地洞裡。
Example: Look at the rabbit in the park.
Example_Translation: 看公園裡的兔子。

Meaning: A school is a place where children go to learn.
Meaning_Translation: 「學校」是孩子去學習的地方。
Example: The students study at school.
Example_Translation: 學生們在學校讀書。

Meaning: To see is to use your eyes to look at something or someone.
Meaning_Translation: 「看見」是指用眼睛看某物或某人。
Example: Steven does not want to see the scary picture.
Example_Translation: 史蒂芬不想看那張恐怖圖片。

Meaning: Service is the act of helping or serving someone.
Meaning_Translation: 「服務」是幫助或為他人做事的行為。
Example: This coffee shop has excellent service.
Example_Translation: 這家咖啡廳服務很好。

Meaning: A benefit is a good thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「好處」是好的事物。
Example: Being able to fly is a benefit to birds.
Example_Translation: 會飛對鳥類來說是優勢。

Meaning: If you are certain about something, you know it is true.
Meaning_Translation: 「確定的」是指知道某事是真的。
Example: I am certain that zebras have stripes.
Example_Translation: 我確定斑馬有條紋。

Meaning: A chance is an opportunity to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「機會」是做某事的可能性。
Example: I had a chance to see the Coliseum in Rome last summer.
Example_Translation: 去年夏天我有機會參觀羅馬競技場。

Meaning: An effect is a change made by something else.
Meaning_Translation: 「效果」是某事造成的改變。
Example: The medicine had a good effect on the boy.
Example_Translation: 這藥對男孩效果很好。

Meaning: If something is essential, it is very important and necessary.
Meaning_Translation: 「必要的」事物是非常重要且不可或缺的。
Example: It is essential to have oxygen when you scuba dive.
Example_Translation: 潛水時氧氣是必需的。

Meaning: If something is far, it is not close.
Meaning_Translation: 「遙遠的」事物是不近的。
Example: It’s far from the east coast to the west coast of America.
Example_Translation: 從美國東岸到西岸很遠。

Meaning: To focus on something is to think about it and pay attention to it.
Meaning_Translation: 「專注」是指思考並注意某事。
Example: My mom always helps me to focus on my school work.
Example_Translation: 我媽總是幫我專注於功課。

Meaning: The function of something is what it does.
Meaning_Translation: 「功能」是某物的作用。
Example: The function of a flashlight is to help you see in the dark.
Example_Translation: 手電筒的功能是在黑暗中幫你看東西。

Meaning: Grass is the green leaves that cover the ground.
Meaning_Translation: 「草」是覆蓋地面的綠色葉片。
Example: The grass looked so soft and green.
Example_Translation: 草看起來又軟又綠。

Meaning: To guard something is to take care of it.
Meaning_Translation: 「守衛」是指照顧某物。
Example: The police officer will guard us from any harm.
Example_Translation: 警察會保護我們不受傷害。

Meaning: The image of something is a picture of it.
Meaning_Translation: 「影像」是某物的圖片。
Example: The image of her eye was very clear.
Example_Translation: 她眼睛的影像非常清晰。

Meaning: If something is immediate, it happens quickly.
Meaning_Translation: 「立即的」是指事情快速發生。
Example: An immediate response came from the pizza place.
Example_Translation: 披薩店立刻回應了。

Meaning: If something is primary, it is the most important thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「主要的」事物是最重要的。
Example: His primary thoughts are about money.
Example_Translation: 他主要想的是錢。

Meaning: People who feel proud are happy about what they have done.
Meaning_Translation: 「自豪的」人對自己的成就感到開心。
Example: She is proud of the picture she drew of her house.
Example_Translation: 她對自己畫的房子圖感到自豪。

Meaning: To remain somewhere is to stay there.
Meaning_Translation: 「留下」是指待在某地。
Example: My sister had to remain home since she was sick.
Example_Translation: 我妹妹生病了，得待在家裡。

Meaning: To rest is to stop being active while the body gets back its strength.
Meaning_Translation: 「休息」是指停止活動，讓身體恢復體力。
Example: I rested on the couch after work.
Example_Translation: 我下班後在沙發上休息。

Meaning: If two things are separate, they are not together.
Meaning_Translation: 「分開的」兩物是不在一起的。
Example: New York and Los Angeles are in two separate parts of America.
Example_Translation: 紐約和洛杉磯位於美國兩個不同的地區。

Meaning: A site is a place.
Meaning_Translation: 「地點」是某個地方。
Example: We found the perfect site for our picnic.
Example_Translation: 我們找到了野餐的理想地點。

Meaning: A tail is a part of an animal’s body that sticks out from its rear or back.
Meaning_Translation: 「尾巴」是動物身體後端伸出的部分。
Example: Our dog wags its tail when it’s happy.
Example_Translation: 我們的狗開心時會搖尾巴。

Meaning: Trouble is a problem or a difficulty.
Meaning_Translation: 「麻煩」是問題或困難。
Example: I have trouble working with my boss.
Example_Translation: 我和老闆合作有困難。

Meaning: To advertise is to describe or draw attention to a product or event by using a public medium.
Meaning_Translation: 「廣告」是指透過大眾媒體宣傳產品或活動。
Example: The woman started a new company and needed to advertise her products.
Example_Translation: 這位女士創立新公司，需要宣傳產品。

Meaning: If someone is aware, they know that something or a situation exists.
Meaning_Translation: 「察覺的」人知道某事或情況存在。
Example: The student became aware that the teacher was watching him.
Example_Translation: 學生發現老師在看著他。

Meaning: A battery is an object placed inside something to supply it with electricity.
Meaning_Translation: 「電池」是放入裝置內提供電力的物品。
Example: My brother needs a battery for his clock.
Example_Translation: 我弟弟的鬧鐘需要電池。

Meaning: Black is the darkest color.
Meaning_Translation: 「黑色」是最深的顏色。
Example: Our street is black at night because there are no street lights.
Example_Translation: 我們街道晚上一片漆黑，因為沒有路燈。

Meaning: A city is a place where a lot of people live.
Meaning_Translation: 「城市」是許多人居住的地方。
Example: Tokyo is a very big city in Japan.
Example_Translation: 東京是日本一座很大的城市。

Meaning: To clean is to make something neat and tidy.
Meaning_Translation: 「清潔」是指使某物整齊乾淨。
Example: I clean our kitchen every Saturday.
Example_Translation: 我每週六打掃廚房。

Meaning: A country is an area of land with the same government and laws.
Meaning_Translation: 「國家」是有相同政府與法律的土地區域。
Example: France is a country in Europe.
Example_Translation: 法國是歐洲的一個國家。

Meaning: To develop is to make something larger or more advanced.
Meaning_Translation: 「發展」是指使某物變得更大或更進步。
Example: This practice will help you develop your math skills.
Example_Translation: 這個練習會幫助你提升數學能力。

Meaning: If something is electric, it uses electricity.
Meaning_Translation: 「電動的」事物使用電力。
Example: Some car companies make electric cars.
Example_Translation: 有些汽車公司生產電動車。

Meaning: When something happens at a later time or in the end, it happens eventually.
Meaning_Translation: 「最終」是指事情在稍後或最後發生。
Example: He will eventually move to London to find a new job.
Example_Translation: 他最終會搬到倫敦找新工作。

Meaning: A fact is a piece of information that is true.
Meaning_Translation: 「事實」是真實的資訊。
Example: A fact about South America is that it is a continent.
Example_Translation: 關於南美洲的事實是：它是一個大陸。

Meaning: Glass is a transparent, breakable material.
Meaning_Translation: 「玻璃」是透明且易碎的材料。
Example: Windows are made of glass.
Example_Translation: 窗戶是用玻璃做的。

Meaning: History is the study of the past.
Meaning_Translation: 「歷史」是對過去的研究。
Example: History was my favorite subject in school.
Example_Translation: 歷史是我上學時最喜歡的科目。

Meaning: Nature is everything in the physical world that is not made by people.
Meaning_Translation: 「自然」是物理世界中非人造的一切。
Example: On the weekends, I love to walk in nature among the trees.
Example_Translation: 週末我喜歡在樹林間散步。

Meaning: Never is when something is impossible or will not happen.
Meaning_Translation: 「永不」是指不可能或不會發生。
Example: They never eat meat because they are vegetarians.
Example_Translation: 他們不吃肉，因為是素食者。

Meaning: People are humans.
Meaning_Translation: 「人們」是人類。
Example: How many people live in China?
Example_Translation: 中國有多少人口？

Meaning: Plastic is a material made by people.
Meaning_Translation: 「塑膠」是人造材料。
Example: Many drinks are sold in plastic bottles.
Example_Translation: 許多飲料用塑膠瓶裝。

Meaning: A problem is a situation when something goes wrong.
Meaning_Translation: 「問題」是事情出錯的情況。
Example: My problem is that I lost my dog.
Example_Translation: 我的問題是我弄丟了狗。

Meaning: A street is a road in a city or village.
Meaning_Translation: 「街道」是城市或村莊中的道路。
Example: What is the name of the street you live on?
Example_Translation: 你住的街道叫什麼名字？

Meaning: To think is to have an opinion or thought about something.
Meaning_Translation: 「思考」是指對某事有想法或意見。
Example: I think summer is the best season.
Example_Translation: 我覺得夏天是最好的季節。

Meaning: A person who is alone is not with another person.
Meaning_Translation: 「獨自的」人是沒有和其他人在一起的。
Example: The boy wanted to be alone to think.
Example_Translation: 男孩想獨處思考。

Meaning: An apartment is a set of rooms in a building where people live.
Meaning_Translation: 「公寓」是建築物中供人居住的一組房間。
Example: She has a nice apartment in the city.
Example_Translation: 她在市區有間不錯的公寓。

Meaning: An article is a story in a newspaper or magazine.
Meaning_Translation: 「文章」是報紙或雜誌中的報導。
Example: Did you read the article in the newspaper about the soccer game?
Example_Translation: 你看了報紙上那篇關於足球賽的文章嗎？

Meaning: An artist is a person who paints, draws, or makes sculptures.
Meaning_Translation: 「藝術家」是繪畫、素描或雕塑的人。
Example: He went to Paris to become an artist.
Example_Translation: 他去巴黎成為藝術家。

Meaning: Someone’s attitude is the way they feel and think.
Meaning_Translation: 「態度」是人的感受與想法方式。
Example: John has a bad attitude. He’s always angry.
Example_Translation: 約翰態度不好，總是生氣。

Meaning: Beauty is the state or quality of being beautiful.
Meaning_Translation: 「美」是美麗的狀態或品質。
Example: I heard my mother was a great beauty when she was young.
Example_Translation: 我聽說我媽年輕時是個大美女。

Meaning: To compare means to say how two things are the same and different.
Meaning_Translation: 「比較」是指說明兩事物的相同與不同之處。
Example: If you compare cats and dogs, you’ll see that they’re both good pets.
Example_Translation: 如果你比較貓和狗，會發現牠們都是好寵物。

Meaning: To judge something is to say if it is good or bad.
Meaning_Translation: 「評判」是指評斷某事的好壞。
Example: The boy was going to judge how his mother’s turkey tasted.
Example_Translation: 男孩要評判媽媽烤的火雞味道如何。

Meaning: A magazine is a regular publication with news, stories, and articles.
Meaning_Translation: 「雜誌」是定期出版、包含新聞、故事和文章的刊物。
Example: She likes to read fashion magazines.
Example_Translation: 她喜歡看時尚雜誌。

Meaning: A material is what is used to make something.
Meaning_Translation: 「材料」是用來製造某物的東西。
Example: Brick is a good material for building houses.
Example_Translation: 磚是蓋房子的好材料。

Meaning: A meal is a time when food is eaten, such as breakfast, lunch, or dinner.
Meaning_Translation: 「一餐」是進食的時間，如早餐、午餐或晚餐。
Example: Breakfast is my favorite meal because I enjoy cereal.
Example_Translation: 早餐是我最喜歡的一餐，因為我愛吃穀片。

Meaning: A method is the way to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「方法」是做事的方式。
Example: One method to remember things is to tie a string around your finger.
Example_Translation: 記住事情的方法之一是在手指上綁根繩子。

Meaning: A neighbor is a person who lives near you.
Meaning_Translation: 「鄰居」是住在你附近的人。
Example: I like my neighbor because he’s very friendly.
Example_Translation: 我喜歡我的鄰居，因為他很友善。

Meaning: If something is professional, it deals with work that uses special skills.
Meaning_Translation: 「專業的」事物涉及運用特殊技能的工作。
Example: If you want to be a pilot, you must have professional training.
Example_Translation: 如果你想當飛行員，必須接受專業訓練。

Meaning: A profit is the extra money you make when you sell something.
Meaning_Translation: 「利潤」是賣東西時賺到的額外錢。
Example: I made a small profit from selling my old clothes.
Example_Translation: 我賣舊衣服賺了一點小錢。

Meaning: The quality of something is how good it is.
Meaning_Translation: 「品質」是某物的好壞程度。
Example: The quality of his car is very good.
Example_Translation: 他的車品質很好。

Meaning: A space is an empty area.
Meaning_Translation: 「空間」是空的區域。
Example: I don’t have much space for things in my small house.
Example_Translation: 我家很小，沒多少空間放東西。

Meaning: Stairs are the things that are used to walk up or down in a building.
Meaning_Translation: 「樓梯」是建築物中用來上下走的設施。
Example: You can take the stairs to the second floor.
Example_Translation: 你可以走樓梯到二樓。

Meaning: A symbol is a thing that stands for something else.
Meaning_Translation: 「象徵」是代表其他事物的東西。
Example: This symbol tells us that we cannot smoke in this area.
Example_Translation: 這個符號表示此區域禁止吸菸。

Meaning: If someone or something is thin, they are not fat.
Meaning_Translation: 「瘦的」人或物是不胖的。
Example: The man was thin because he didn’t eat much.
Example_Translation: 這男人很瘦，因為吃得不多。

Meaning: People study accounting so they can deal with money and finance properly.
Meaning_Translation: 「會計」是學習如何正確處理金錢與財務的學科。
Example: He works for an accounting firm.
Example_Translation: 他在會計公司工作。

Meaning: To appeal to someone is to be interesting or attractive.
Meaning_Translation: 「吸引」是指引起興趣或吸引力。
Example: Sleeping all day appeals to me, but I have to go to school.
Example_Translation: 整天睡覺很吸引我，但我得去上學。

Meaning: To assume something is to think that it is true, even with no proof.
Meaning_Translation: 「假設」是指認為某事為真，即使沒有證據。
Example: I assume you are both familiar with this plan.
Example_Translation: 我假設你們都熟悉這個計畫。

Meaning: To borrow something is to take it and then give it back later.
Meaning_Translation: 「借」是指拿走某物，之後再歸還。
Example: Can I borrow a pencil to use today? I’ll give it back to you tomorrow.
Example_Translation: 我可以今天借支鉛筆用嗎？明天還你。

Meaning: A client is a person or business that pays another to do a service.
Meaning_Translation: 「客戶」是付錢請他人提供服務的個人或公司。
Example: She has many clients who enjoy coming to her salon.
Example_Translation: 她有很多客戶喜歡來她的沙龍。

Meaning: The downtown area is the center of most cities.
Meaning_Translation: 「市中心」是大多數城市的中心區域。
Example: The downtown area is filled with many tall buildings.
Example_Translation: 市中心有許多高樓大廈。

Meaning: If something is dull, it is not exciting.
Meaning_Translation: 「乏味的」事物是不刺激的。
Example: The movie was very dull. I fell asleep watching it.
Example_Translation: 電影很無聊，我看到睡著了。

Meaning: To embarrass people is to make them feel ashamed or foolish.
Meaning_Translation: 「尷尬」是指讓人感到羞愧或愚蠢。
Example: He was embarrassed when he couldn’t remember her name.
Example_Translation: 他忘記她的名字，覺得很尷尬。

Meaning: A fare is an amount of money paid to use a bus, train, or taxi.
Meaning_Translation: 「車資」是搭乘公車、火車或計程車所付的金額。
Example: Since he is a senior, my grandfather pays a low fare for the bus.
Example_Translation: 因為是長者，我爺爺搭公車付優惠票價。

Meaning: Former describes something that used to be but is not anymore.
Meaning_Translation: 「以前的」是指過去存在但現在沒有的事物。
Example: The hotel, a former castle, was built over 200 years ago.
Example_Translation: 這家飯店以前是城堡，建於兩百多年前。

Meaning: To found a company or organization means to start it.
Meaning_Translation: 「創立」公司或組織是指開始建立它。
Example: The Pilgrims founded one of the first colonies in the United States.
Example_Translation: 清教徒建立了美國最早的殖民地之一。

Meaning: To invest means to use money in a way that will bring a profit later.
Meaning_Translation: 「投資」是指用錢以期未來獲利。
Example: I invested money in a new building that should bring me a profit.
Example_Translation: 我投資了一棟新大樓，應該會獲利。

Meaning: A loan is something, usually money, that one person lends to another.
Meaning_Translation: 「貸款」是某人借給另一人的東西，通常是錢。
Example: I got a loan from the bank.
Example_Translation: 我向銀行貸款。

Meaning: If something is practical, it is useful.
Meaning_Translation: 「實用的」事物是有用的。
Example: Learning English is practical; you can use it in many places.
Example_Translation: 學英文很實用，很多地方都能用。

Meaning: A quarter is 1/4 or 25% of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「四分之一」是某物的 1/4 或 25%。
Example: He paid a quarter for the candy.
Example_Translation: 他付了二十五分錢買糖果。

Meaning: A salary is how much money a person makes at his or her job.
Meaning_Translation: 「薪水」是人在工作中賺取的金額。
Example: He got a new job with a better salary.
Example_Translation: 他找到薪水更好的新工作。

Meaning: A scholarship is money given so someone can go to school.
Meaning_Translation: 「獎學金」是提供給人上學的金錢。
Example: I got a scholarship to help me pay for university.
Example_Translation: 我拿到獎學金幫忙支付大學費用。

Meaning: If something is temporary, it exists for a short time.
Meaning_Translation: 「暫時的」事物只存在短時間。
Example: This car is only temporary; I’ll get a new one soon.
Example_Translation: 這輛車只是暫時的，我很快會買新車。

Meaning: A treasure is a collection of valuable things, especially jewels or gold.
Meaning_Translation: 「寶藏」是貴重物品的收藏，尤其是珠寶或黃金。
Example: They became very rich when they found the buried treasure.
Example_Translation: 他們找到埋藏的寶藏後變得非常富有。

Meaning: To urge someone is to try very hard to get them to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「敦促」是指極力促使某人做某事。
Example: He urged them to believe his story.
Example_Translation: 他催促他們相信他的故事。

Meaning: A coach is a person who teaches sports.
Meaning_Translation: 「教練」是教導運動的人。
Example: My coach gets very excited during games.
Example_Translation: 我的教練比賽時非常激動。

Meaning: To control something is to make it do what you want.
Meaning_Translation: 「控制」是指讓某物照你的意思行動。
Example: To control the TV, just push the buttons.
Example_Translation: 只要按按鈕就能控制電視。

Meaning: A description of someone or something says what they are like.
Meaning_Translation: 「描述」是說明某人或某物的樣子。
Example: I gave a description of the man with the gun and hat to the police.
Example_Translation: 我向警方描述了那個拿槍戴帽子的男人。

Meaning: If something is direct, it goes straight between two places.
Meaning_Translation: 「直接的」是指兩地之間不繞路。
Example: The green path is a direct route to my house.
Example_Translation: 綠色小徑是通往我家的捷徑。

Meaning: An exam is a test.
Meaning_Translation: 「考試」是測驗。
Example: I did some practice questions for the math exam on the board.
Example_Translation: 我在黑板上做了幾題數學考試練習題。

Meaning: An example of something is a thing that is typical of it.
Meaning_Translation: 「例子」是某類事物的典型代表。
Example: Cola is an example of a soft drink.
Example_Translation: 可樂是軟性飲料的例子。

Meaning: A limit is the largest or smallest amount of something that you allow.
Meaning_Translation: 「限制」是你允許的最大或最小數量。
Example: My mother put a limit on how much I could use the phone.
Example_Translation: 我媽限制我用手機的時間。

Meaning: If something is local, it is nearby.
Meaning_Translation: 「當地的」事物是附近的。
Example: The local market in my neighborhood sells all the food we need.
Example_Translation: 我家附近的地方市場賣我們需要的所有食物。

Meaning: Magical describes a quality that makes someone or something special.
Meaning_Translation: 「神奇的」是指使人或事物特別的特質。
Example: The fireworks made the night sky look so magical.
Example_Translation: 煙火讓夜空看起來如此神奇。

Meaning: Mail is letters and other things sent to people.
Meaning_Translation: 「郵件」是寄給人的信件和其他物品。
Example: I get a lot of mail because I have friends all over the world.
Example_Translation: 我收到很多信，因為朋友遍佈世界各地。

Meaning: A novel is a book that tells a story.
Meaning_Translation: 「小說」是講述故事的書。
Example: He wrote a great novel about ancient China.
Example_Translation: 他寫了一本很棒的古代中國小說。

Meaning: An outline is the plan for a story or essay.
Meaning_Translation: 「大綱」是故事或文章的計畫。
Example: Before I wrote my essay, I made an outline.
Example_Translation: 我寫文章前先擬了大綱。

Meaning: A poet is a person who writes poems.
Meaning_Translation: 「詩人」是寫詩的人。
Example: William Shakespeare was one of the greatest poets.
Example_Translation: 威廉·莎士比亞是最偉大的詩人之一。

Meaning: To print something is to put it onto paper.
Meaning_Translation: 「列印」是指將內容輸出到紙上。
Example: Make sure that you print your name clearly.
Example_Translation: 務必清楚地印出你的名字。

Meaning: A scene is one part of a book or movie.
Meaning_Translation: 「場景」是書或電影中的一部分。
Example: A movie is made up of many short pieces or scenes.
Example_Translation: 一部電影由許多短片段或場景組成。

Meaning: A sheet is a thin flat piece of paper.
Meaning_Translation: 「紙張」是薄而平的紙片。
Example: I only needed a single sheet of paper to do my homework.
Example_Translation: 我做功課只需要一張紙。

Meaning: People who are silly show a lack of serious thought.
Meaning_Translation: 「傻氣的」人缺乏嚴肅思考。
Example: I made a silly mistake of dropping mom’s vase.
Example_Translation: 我犯了個傻錯誤，把媽的花瓶打碎了。

Meaning: A store is a place where you can buy things.
Meaning_Translation: 「商店」是購買物品的地方。
Example: I picked up a few things at the grocery store.
Example_Translation: 我在雜貨店買了些東西。

Meaning: To suffer is to feel pain.
Meaning_Translation: 「受苦」是指感到痛苦。
Example: Her headache made her suffer all day.
Example_Translation: 她頭痛了一整天。

Meaning: Technology is new things made by using science.
Meaning_Translation: 「科技」是運用科學製造的新事物。
Example: He loves technology such as laptop computers.
Example_Translation: 他喜歡筆電之類的科技產品。

Meaning: To go across something is to go to the other side of it.
Meaning_Translation: 「橫越」是指走到某物的另一邊。
Example: He walked across the board to the other side.
Example_Translation: 他走過木板到另一邊。

Meaning: To breathe means to let air go in and out of your body.
Meaning_Translation: 「呼吸」是指讓空氣進出身體。
Example: We need strong healthy lungs to help us breathe well.
Example_Translation: 我們需要強健的肺才能好好呼吸。

Meaning: A characteristic is something that shows what a person or a thing is like.
Meaning_Translation: 「特徵」是顯示人或事物特性的東西。
Example: One characteristic of tigers is their black stripes.
Example_Translation: 老虎的特徵之一是黑色條紋。

Meaning: To consume something means to eat or drink it.
Meaning_Translation: 「消耗」是指吃或喝某物。
Example: Jack consumed a whole plate of spaghetti.
Example_Translation: 傑克吃掉一整盤義大利麵。

Meaning: To excite someone means to make them happy and interested.
Meaning_Translation: 「激動」是指使人開心且感興趣。
Example: I heard about the school dance on Friday. This excited me.
Example_Translation: 我聽到週五有學校舞會，很興奮。

Meaning: If something is extremely good, it is very, very good.
Meaning_Translation: 「極度地」好是指非常好非常好。
Example: I was extremely worried about him.
Example_Translation: 我非常擔心他。

Meaning: Fear is the feeling of being afraid.
Meaning_Translation: 「恐懼」是害怕的感覺。
Example: I have a great fear of skateboarding.
Example_Translation: 我很怕滑板。

Meaning: If you are fortunate, you are lucky.
Meaning_Translation: 「幸運的」是指運氣好。
Example: I was fortunate to get a seat.
Example_Translation: 我很幸運有位子坐。

Meaning: If someone happens to do something, he or she does it by chance.
Meaning_Translation: 「碰巧」是指偶然做某事。
Example: I happened to meet some new friends at school today.
Example_Translation: 我今天剛好在學校認識一些新朋友。

Meaning: The length of something is how long it is from one end to the other.
Meaning_Translation: 「長度」是某物從一端到另一端的距離。
Example: The length of the floor is three meters.
Example_Translation: 地板長三公尺。

Meaning: A mistake is something you do wrong.
Meaning_Translation: 「錯誤」是你做錯的事。
Example: My boss always yells at me when I make a mistake.
Example_Translation: 我一犯錯，老闆就對我大吼。

Meaning: To observe something is to watch it.
Meaning_Translation: 「觀察」是指看著某物。
Example: Brian observed the sun rising over the mountains.
Example_Translation: 布萊恩觀察太陽從山後升起。

Meaning: An opportunity is a chance to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「機會」是做某事的可能性。
Example: I had an opportunity to take pictures in the jungle.
Example_Translation: 我有機會在叢林拍照。

Meaning: A prize is something of value that is given to the winner.
Meaning_Translation: 「獎品」是頒給勝利者的有價值物品。
Example: I won a prize for getting the best grade on my science test.
Example_Translation: 我科學考試成績最好，贏得獎品。

Meaning: A race is a contest to see who is the fastest.
Meaning_Translation: 「賽跑」是比賽誰最快。
Example: Paul is a fast runner, so he easily won the race.
Example_Translation: 保羅跑得很快，輕鬆贏得比賽。

Meaning: To realize is to suddenly understand.
Meaning_Translation: 「意識到」是指突然明白。
Example: After I left my house, I realized that I left the light on.
Example_Translation: 我離開家後才發現忘了關燈。

Meaning: To respond is to give an answer to what someone else said.
Meaning_Translation: 「回應」是指回答別人說的話。
Example: When the teacher asked the question, we all responded.
Example_Translation: 老師提問時，我們都回答了。

Meaning: A risk is a chance of something bad happening.
Meaning_Translation: 「風險」是壞事發生的可能性。
Example: I took a risk and climbed the snowy mountain.
Example_Translation: 我冒險爬上積雪山。

Meaning: To wonder is to ask yourself questions or have a need to know.
Meaning_Translation: 「好奇」是指問自己問題或渴望知道。
Example: The young mother wondered if she’d have a boy or a girl.
Example_Translation: 年輕的媽媽想知道會生男孩還是女孩。

Meaning: Yet is used to say something has not happened up to now.
Meaning_Translation: 「還」是用來表示某事至今尚未發生。
Example: We can’t go out yet; we’re still eating.
Example_Translation: 我們還不能出門，還在吃飯。

Meaning: Art is something creative that expresses ideas and feelings.
Meaning_Translation: 「藝術」是表達想法與情感的創作。
Example: My sister likes to look at the art in the museum.
Example_Translation: 我妹妹喜歡看博物館的藝術品。

Meaning: A book is a set of printed sheets of paper that are held together inside a cover.
Meaning_Translation: 「書」是一疊印刷紙張，由封面裝訂在一起。
Example: The man smiles as he reads his favorite book.
Example_Translation: 這男人讀最愛的書時微笑。

Meaning: Clothes are what people wear to cover their bodies.
Meaning_Translation: 「衣服」是人們穿來遮蓋身體的物品。
Example: I bought warm clothes for the cold winter.
Example_Translation: 我為寒冷的冬天買了保暖衣物。

Meaning: A community is a group of people who share the same area or interests.
Meaning_Translation: 「社區」是共享同一區域或興趣的人群。
Example: The community got together to plant trees.
Example_Translation: 社區居民聚在一起種樹。

Meaning: December is the twelfth month of the year.
Meaning_Translation: 「十二月」是一年的第十二個月。
Example: The last day of the year is December 31st.
Example_Translation: 一年的最後一天是12月31日。

Meaning: Dinner is the main meal eaten in the evening.
Meaning_Translation: 「晚餐」是晚上吃的主要餐點。
Example: I had a hamburger for dinner.
Example_Translation: 我晚餐吃漢堡。

Meaning: To end is to stop or finish.
Meaning_Translation: 「結束」是指停止或完成。
Example: They are happy because the teacher wanted to end the class early.
Example_Translation: 他們很高興，因為老師想提早下課。

Meaning: To exchange is to give one thing in return for another.
Meaning_Translation: 「交換」是指以一物換另一物。
Example: The men exchange business cards.
Example_Translation: 這些人交換名片。

Meaning: A family is a group of people who are related to each other.
Meaning_Translation: 「家庭」是彼此有血緣關係的一群人。
Example: There are four people in my family.
Example_Translation: 我家有四個人。

Meaning: From shows a starting place or position.
Meaning_Translation: 「從」表示起始地點或位置。
Example: Chris studies from 10 o’clock to noon every morning.
Example_Translation: 克里斯每天早上十點到中午讀書。

Meaning: Green is the color of growing grass or leaves.
Meaning_Translation: 「綠色」是生長中草或葉子的顏色。
Example: I don’t like green apples.
Example_Translation: 我不喜歡青蘋果。

Meaning: A person’s home is the place where that person lives.
Meaning_Translation: 「家」是人居住的地方。
Example: The family likes to stay at home on the weekends.
Example_Translation: 這家人週末喜歡待在家。

Meaning: January is the first month of the year.
Meaning_Translation: 「一月」是一年的第一個月。
Example: My birthday is in January.
Example_Translation: 我的生日在一月。

Meaning: Red is the color of blood.
Meaning_Translation: 「紅色」是血的顏色。
Example: Jack is wearing a red shirt.
Example_Translation: 傑克穿紅色襯衫。

Meaning: Seven is the word for the number 7.
Meaning_Translation: 「七」是數字 7 的文字。
Example: I have seven colored pencils on my desk.
Example_Translation: 我桌上放了七支彩色鉛筆。

Meaning: To start is to begin doing something.
Meaning_Translation: 「開始」是指著手做某事。
Example: Catherine has to start work at 8 o’clock in the morning.
Example_Translation: 凱瑟琳早上八點要開始工作。

Meaning: Together shows an action is done with another person or thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「一起」表示與他人或他物共同行動。
Example: Let’s work together to finish the project.
Example_Translation: 我們一起完成這個專案吧。

Meaning: A university is a school where people study for a degree.
Meaning_Translation: 「大學」是人們攻讀學位的學校。
Example: My dream is to go to a good university.
Example_Translation: 我的夢想是上一所好大學。

Meaning: To wear is to have clothing on your body.
Meaning_Translation: 「穿著」是指身上有衣物。
Example: The man has to wear a suit to work.
Example_Translation: 這男人上班必須穿西裝。

Meaning: A year is a period of 365 days or twelve months.
Meaning_Translation: 「一年」是 365 天或十二個月的時間。
Example: You become one year older every birthday.
Example_Translation: 每過一次生日就長一歲。

Meaning: To appreciate something is to understand its good qualities.
Meaning_Translation: 「欣賞」是指理解某物的優點。
Example: I can appreciate the lovely scenery.
Example_Translation: 我能欣賞這美麗的風景。

Meaning: If something is available, it means you can get it.
Meaning_Translation: 「可用的」是指你可以取得某物。
Example: There were many seats available in the room.
Example_Translation: 房間裡有很多空位。

Meaning: To beat someone means to do better than they do.
Meaning_Translation: 「打敗」是指做得比對方好。
Example: I managed to beat everyone in the race.
Example_Translation: 我成功在比賽中打敗所有人。

Meaning: If something is bright, it gives off a lot of light.
Meaning_Translation: 「明亮的」事物會發出很多光。
Example: The bright light from the explosion hurt my eyes.
Example_Translation: 爆炸產生的強光刺痛我的眼睛。

Meaning: To celebrate is to do something to show that an event is special.
Meaning_Translation: 「慶祝」是指做些事來表示事件的重要性。
Example: We all celebrated when we heard the great news.
Example_Translation: 我們聽到好消息後一起慶祝。

Meaning: To decide is to make a definite choice.
Meaning_Translation: 「決定」是指做出明確選擇。
Example: He tried to decide which one to eat first.
Example_Translation: 他試著決定先吃哪一個。

Meaning: To disappear means to go away or not be seen.
Meaning_Translation: 「消失」是指離開或看不見。
Example: The top of the building is disappearing in the clouds.
Example_Translation: 建築物頂端消失在雲裡。

Meaning: If you talk about something else, you talk about something different.
Meaning_Translation: 「其他的」是指不同的事物。
Example: I wanted a bike for my birthday, but I got something else.
Example_Translation: 我生日想要腳踏車，但收到了別的東西。

Meaning: Fair means reasonable or right.
Meaning_Translation: 「公平的」是指合理或正確的。
Example: He sold me his car for a fair price.
Example_Translation: 他用公道的價格把車賣給我。

Meaning: To flow is to move easily and continuously in one direction.
Meaning_Translation: 「流動」是指朝一個方向輕易且持續地移動。
Example: The water flowed over the rocks and into the lake.
Example_Translation: 水流過岩石進入湖泊。

Meaning: If you move forward, you move in the direction in front of you.
Meaning_Translation: 「向前」是指朝前方移動。
Example: When he saw his mother, the baby crawled forward to her.
Example_Translation: 嬰兒看到媽媽就向前爬向她。

Meaning: A hill is a raised area of land. It is higher than the land around it.
Meaning_Translation: 「小山」是隆起的土地，比周圍地勢高。
Example: The sun was rising above the green hills.
Example_Translation: 太陽從綠色山丘上升起。

Meaning: A level is a point on a scale that measures something.
Meaning_Translation: 「等級」是衡量某物的尺度上的一點。
Example: Please check the level of the temperature.
Example_Translation: 請檢查溫度水平。

Meaning: A lone person or thing is the only one in a given place.
Meaning_Translation: 「孤單的」人或物是在某地唯一的。
Example: A lone man walked along the street.
Example_Translation: 一個孤單的男人沿街走。

Meaning: A puddle is a pool of liquid on the ground.
Meaning_Translation: 「水窪」是地上的小水池。
Example: When the ice melted, it formed a puddle.
Example_Translation: 冰融化後形成一灘水。

Meaning: A response is the answer to a question.
Meaning_Translation: 「回應」是對問題的回答。
Example: He asked if I was sad. My response was “No.”
Example_Translation: 他問我是否難過，我回答「沒有」。

Meaning: A season is a time of the year: spring, summer, fall, or winter.
Meaning_Translation: 「季節」是一年中的時期：春、夏、秋或冬。
Example: Fall is a warm season, while winter is very cold.
Example_Translation: 秋天是溫暖的季節，冬天則很冷。

Meaning: A solution is a way to solve a problem.
Meaning_Translation: 「解決方案」是解決問題的方法。
Example: There are many problems. We need solutions!
Example_Translation: 問題很多，我們需要解決方案！

Meaning: To waste means to use something carelessly and unnecessarily.
Meaning_Translation: 「浪費」是指不小心且不必要地使用某物。
Example: Turn off the water so you don’t waste it.
Example_Translation: 關掉水龍頭，不要浪費水。

Meaning: You use whether when you must choose between two things.
Meaning_Translation: 「是否」是用於在兩者之間選擇時。
Example: I could not decide whether to go left or right.
Example_Translation: 我無法決定該往左還是往右。

Meaning: Always means that something happens all the time.
Meaning_Translation: 「總是」是指某事一直發生。
Example: They always brush their teeth in the morning.
Example_Translation: 他們早上總是刷牙。

Meaning: To ask is to say or write something to get an answer.
Meaning_Translation: 「詢問」是指說或寫以獲得答案。
Example: Please ask questions if you do not understand.
Example_Translation: 不懂就請問。

Meaning: A banana is a long yellow fruit with soft white flesh inside.
Meaning_Translation: 「香蕉」是長條黃色水果，內部有柔軟的白色果肉。
Example: Did you eat a banana for breakfast?
Example_Translation: 你早餐吃香蕉了嗎？

Meaning: Bread is a food made from flour and water.
Meaning_Translation: 「麵包」是用麵粉和水製成的食物。
Example: You need two pieces of bread to make a sandwich.
Example_Translation: 做三明治需要兩片麵包。

Meaning: Cake is a sweet dessert made from flour, water, sugar, and eggs.
Meaning_Translation: 「蛋糕」是用麵粉、水、糖和蛋製成的甜點。
Example: What a beautiful birthday cake!
Example_Translation: 多漂亮的生日蛋糕啊！

Meaning: A carrot is an orange vegetable.
Meaning_Translation: 「胡蘿蔔」是橙色蔬菜。
Example: I put a carrot in my salad.
Example_Translation: 我在沙拉裡加了胡蘿蔔。

Meaning: Chicken is a bird that is often used for food.
Meaning_Translation: 「雞」是常被當作食物的鳥類。
Example: Chicken is his favorite kind of meat.
Example_Translation: 雞肉是他最喜歡的肉類。

Meaning: Chocolate is a sweet food made from cacao beans.
Meaning_Translation: 「巧克力」是用可可豆製成的甜食。
Example: I made a chocolate cake for my mom’s party.
Example_Translation: 我為媽媽的派對做了巧克力蛋糕。

Meaning: To contain is to hold or have something.
Meaning_Translation: 「包含」是指持有或擁有某物。
Example: I have to find something to contain these apples.
Example_Translation: 我得找個容器裝這些蘋果。

Meaning: If a food is delicious, it is tasty.
Meaning_Translation: 「美味的」食物是好吃的。
Example: I loved the delicious fried chicken I ate for dinner!
Example_Translation: 我晚餐吃的炸雞超好吃！

Meaning: A diet is the food regularly eaten by a person.
Meaning_Translation: 「飲食」是人平常吃的食物。
Example: His diet mostly consists of fruits and vegetables.
Example_Translation: 他的飲食主要是水果和蔬菜。

Meaning: To eat is to chew and swallow food.
Meaning_Translation: 「吃」是指咀嚼並吞下食物。
Example: You should eat breakfast every day.
Example_Translation: 你應該每天吃早餐。

Meaning: Food is things people and animals eat.
Meaning_Translation: 「食物」是人和動物吃的东西。
Example: Pasta is a famous food in Italy.
Example_Translation: 義大利麵是義大利的著名食物。

Meaning: Fruit is a type of healthy food that grows on trees and plants.
Meaning_Translation: 「水果」是長在樹木和植物上的健康食物。
Example: Apples, pears, and oranges are types of fruit.
Example_Translation: 蘋果、梨子和橘子都是水果。

Meaning: When something is great, it is very good.
Meaning_Translation: 「很棒的」事物是非常好的。
Example: It was a great, exciting game!
Example_Translation: 那是場精彩刺激的比賽！

Meaning: Health is the state of a person’s body.
Meaning_Translation: 「健康」是人身體的狀態。
Example: People who want good health should not smoke.
Example_Translation: 想保持健康的人不該抽菸。

Meaning: A recipe is a set of instructions for cooking a certain type of food.
Meaning_Translation: 「食譜」是烹調某種食物的指示。
Example: Do you use a recipe when you make that sauce?
Example_Translation: 你做那種醬汁會用食譜嗎？

Meaning: A restaurant is a business where people sit and eat food.
Meaning_Translation: 「餐廳」是人們坐著吃飯的營業場所。
Example: Let’s eat at the Indian restaurant.
Example_Translation: 我們去印度餐廳吃飯吧。

Meaning: If something is special, it is unique and different.
Meaning_Translation: 「特別的」事物是獨特且不同的。
Example: The cupcake was special because it had blue frosting.
Example_Translation: 這紙杯蛋糕很特別，因為上面有藍色糖霜。

Meaning: Water is a clear liquid that people need to survive.
Meaning_Translation: 「水」是人賴以生存的透明液體。
Example: Drink eight cups of water every day.
Example_Translation: 每天喝八杯水。

Meaning: Someone or something that is alive is not dead.
Meaning_Translation: 「活著的」人或物是沒有死亡的。
Example: My grandparents are still alive even though they are over 90.
Example_Translation: 我祖父母雖然超過九十歲，但還健在。

Meaning: A bone is a hard part of the body.
Meaning_Translation: 「骨頭」是身體的硬質部分。
Example: I brought home a nice bone for my dog.
Example_Translation: 我帶了一根好骨頭回家給狗。

Meaning: To bother is to make the effort to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「費心」是指努力去做某事。
Example: No one bothered to wash the dishes today.
Example_Translation: 今天沒人願意洗碗。

Meaning: A captain is the person who controls a ship or airplane.
Meaning_Translation: 「船長／機長」是控制船隻或飛機的人。
Example: The captain sailed his ship to Australia.
Example_Translation: 船長把船開到澳洲。

Meaning: The conclusion of something is the final part of it.
Meaning_Translation: 「結論」是某事的最後部分。
Example: At the conclusion of the race, the spectators cheered for the winner.
Example_Translation: 比賽結束時，觀眾為冠軍歡呼。

Meaning: Doubt is a feeling of not being sure.
Meaning_Translation: 「懷疑」是不確定的感覺。
Example: I have doubt that the story is true.
Example_Translation: 我懷疑這故事是真的。

Meaning: To explore is to look for new places.
Meaning_Translation: 「探索」是指尋找新地方。
Example: He wants to explore the world and see new things.
Example_Translation: 他想探索世界，看看新事物。

Meaning: If you are glad, you are happy.
Meaning_Translation: 「高興的」是指快樂的。
Example: I am glad you came to my party.
Example_Translation: 我很開心你來參加我的派對。

Meaning: However means despite or not being influenced by something.
Meaning_Translation: 「然而」是指儘管或不受某事影響。
Example: She is a great cook. However, she never had professional lessons.
Example_Translation: 她是個很棒的廚師，但她從未上過專業課程。

Meaning: Injustice is a lack of fairness or justice.
Meaning_Translation: 「不公」是缺乏公平或正義。
Example: Putting an innocent person in jail is an act of injustice.
Example_Translation: 把無辜的人關進監獄是不公義的行為。

Meaning: If something is international, it involves more than one country.
Meaning_Translation: 「國際的」事物涉及多個國家。
Example: The United Nations is a powerful international organization.
Example_Translation: 聯合國是一個強大的國際組織。

Meaning: A lawyer works with the law and represents people in court.
Meaning_Translation: 「律師」是處理法律並在法庭代表他人的人。
Example: The lawyer left the courthouse after the judge made her decision.
Example_Translation: 律師在法官做出裁決後離開法院。

Meaning: To mention something is to talk about it.
Meaning_Translation: 「提到」是指談論某事。
Example: The doctors mentioned the problems that the patient was having.
Example_Translation: 醫生提到病人遇到的問題。

Meaning: Someone who is old has lived for many years.
Meaning_Translation: 「年老的」人是活了很多年的人。
Example: My mother is seventy years old now.
Example_Translation: 我媽現在七十歲。

Meaning: A policy is a rule.
Meaning_Translation: 「政策」是規則。
Example: He told us that his policy was to put customers first.
Example_Translation: 他告訴我們他的政策是顧客至上。

Meaning: If something is social, it is about many people in a community.
Meaning_Translation: 「社交的」事物是關於社群中許多人的。
Example: People should come together and fix the world’s social problems.
Example_Translation: 人們應該團結解決全球社會問題。

Meaning: A speech is something said to a group of people.
Meaning_Translation: 「演講」是對一群人說的話。
Example: She gave a speech to the class.
Example_Translation: 她對全班發表演講。

Meaning: A staff is a group of people working together in a company.
Meaning_Translation: 「員工」是在公司一起工作的一群人。
Example: My dad has a staff of four people to help him at the office.
Example_Translation: 我爸辦公室有四名員工協助他。

Meaning: If you go toward something, you go closer to it.
Meaning_Translation: 「朝向」是指靠近某物。
Example: Santa walked toward my house with a bag of gifts.
Example_Translation: 聖誕老人帶著一袋禮物走向我家。

Meaning: Wood is the thing that trees are made of.
Meaning_Translation: 「木材」是樹木構成的物質。
Example: I put the pieces of wood in a pile.
Example_Translation: 我把木頭堆成一堆。

Meaning: To achieve something is to successfully do it after trying hard.
Meaning_Translation: 「達成」是指努力後成功完成某事。
Example: I was happy that I could achieve my goal.
Example_Translation: 我很開心達成了目標。

Meaning: To advise someone is to tell them what to do.
Meaning_Translation: 「建議」是指告訴別人該做什麼。
Example: My mother often advises people about their money.
Example_Translation: 我媽常給別人理財建議。

Meaning: If something happens already, it happens before a certain time.
Meaning_Translation: 「已經」是指在某個時間點之前發生。
Example: It is already time for the movie to start. Let’s go in.
Example_Translation: 電影已經開始了，我們進去吧。

Meaning: If something is basic, it is very simple or easy.
Meaning_Translation: 「基本的」事物是非常簡單或容易的。
Example: I learned some basic English skills in school today.
Example_Translation: 我今天在學校學了一些基礎英文。

Meaning: A bit is a small amount of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「一點點」是少量的某物。
Example: I ate a bit of chocolate before I went to bed.
Example_Translation: 睡前我吃了一點巧克力。

Meaning: To consider something means to think about it.
Meaning_Translation: 「考慮」是指思考某事。
Example: Pete didn’t like his job. He considered getting a new one.
Example_Translation: 皮特不喜歡他的工作，考慮換一份。

Meaning: To destroy means to damage something so badly that it cannot be used.
Meaning_Translation: 「摧毀」是指嚴重損壞某物使其無法使用。
Example: The glass was destroyed.
Example_Translation: 玻璃被毀了。

Meaning: To entertain someone is to do something that they enjoy.
Meaning_Translation: 「娛樂」是指做些事讓別人享受。
Example: The clown entertained the kids at the party.
Example_Translation: 小丑在派對上逗孩子們開心。

Meaning: If something is extra, it is more than what is needed.
Meaning_Translation: 「額外的」事物是超過所需的部分。
Example: The squirrel had extra nuts for the winter.
Example_Translation: 松鼠為冬天準備了額外的堅果。

Meaning: A goal is something you work toward.
Meaning_Translation: 「目標」是你努力追求的東西。
Example: Her goal was to become a doctor.
Example_Translation: 她的目標是成為醫生。

Meaning: To lie is to say or write something untrue to deceive someone.
Meaning_Translation: 「說謊」是指說或寫不實的話來欺騙人。
Example: Whenever Pinocchio lied to his father, his nose grew.
Example_Translation: 每次皮諾丘對爸爸說謊，鼻子就會變長。

Meaning: Meat is food made of animals.
Meaning_Translation: 「肉」是動物製成的食物。
Example: This piece of meat I’m eating tastes very good.
Example_Translation: 我吃的這塊肉很好吃。

Meaning: An opinion is a thought about a person or a thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「意見」是對人或事物的看法。
Example: Meg told me her opinion of my story. She said it was not funny.
Example_Translation: 梅格告訴我她對我故事的看法，說不好笑。

Meaning: If something is real, it actually exists.
Meaning_Translation: 「真實的」事物是確實存在的。
Example: Some people don’t believe in aliens from space, but I think they’re real.
Example_Translation: 有些人不相信外星人，但我認為他們是真的。

Meaning: To reflect is when a surface sends back light, heat, sound or an image.
Meaning_Translation: 「反射」是指表面將光、熱、聲音或影像反彈回去。
Example: Her face was reflected in the smooth glass.
Example_Translation: 她的臉映在光滑的玻璃上。

Meaning: To regard people is to think of them in a certain way.
Meaning_Translation: 「看待」是指以某種方式思考他人。
Example: The boy regarded the girl as a good friend.
Example_Translation: 男孩把這女孩當好朋友。

Meaning: To serve someone is to give them food or drinks.
Meaning_Translation: 「服務」是指提供食物或飲料給他人。
Example: He served us our drinks quickly.
Example_Translation: 他很快為我們送上飲料。

Meaning: A vegetable is a plant used as food.
Meaning_Translation: 「蔬菜」是用作食物的植物。
Example: Carrots are my favorite vegetable.
Example_Translation: 胡蘿蔔是我最喜歡的蔬菜。

Meaning: A war is a big fight between two groups of people.
Meaning_Translation: 「戰爭」是兩群人之間的大規模戰鬥。
Example: Many young men died in the war.
Example_Translation: 許多青年在戰爭中喪生。

Meaning: If something is worth an amount of money, it costs that amount.
Meaning_Translation: 「值」是指某物的價格等於該金額。
Example: Our house is worth a lot of money.
Example_Translation: 我們的房子很值錢。

Meaning: To appear is to seem.
Meaning_Translation: 「出現」是指顯得如此。
Example: She appeared to be sad. She was crying.
Example_Translation: 她看起來很難過，正在哭。

Meaning: The base is the bottom of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「底部」是某物的最下端。
Example: The base of the table has three legs.
Example_Translation: 桌子底部有三隻腳。

Meaning: The brain is the organ in your head that lets you think.
Meaning_Translation: 「大腦」是頭部中讓你思考的器官。
Example: You must use your brain to solve the problem.
Example_Translation: 你必須動腦解決問題。

Meaning: A career is a job that you do for a large part of your life.
Meaning_Translation: 「職業」是你一生中大部分時間從事的工作。
Example: He was in the hospitality business for most of his career.
Example_Translation: 他職業生涯大部分時間都在餐旅業。

Meaning: A clerk is a type of worker. Clerks in a store help customers.
Meaning_Translation: 「店員」是商店中協助顧客的工作人員。
Example: The clerk added up her bill for the groceries.
Example_Translation: 店員幫她計算雜貨帳單。

Meaning: Effort is hard work or an attempt to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「努力」是辛勤工作或嘗試做某事。
Example: He always puts a lot of effort into his studies.
Example_Translation: 他讀書總是全力以赴。

Meaning: To enter a place is to go into it.
Meaning_Translation: 「進入」是指走進某地。
Example: Two guards greeted me as I entered the front door.
Example_Translation: 我進前門時，兩名警衛向我打招呼。

Meaning: When something is excellent, it is very good.
Meaning_Translation: 「優秀的」事物是非常好的。
Example: I got an excellent score on my school test.
Example_Translation: 我學校考試考得很好。

Meaning: A hero is a brave person who does things to help others.
Meaning_Translation: 「英雄」是勇敢幫助他人的人。
Example: To children, the man in the blue and red costume was a real hero.
Example_Translation: 對孩子來說，穿藍紅制服的男人是真正的英雄。

Meaning: To hurry is to do something quickly.
Meaning_Translation: 「匆忙」是指快速做某事。
Example: I hurried home on my bike.
Example_Translation: 我騎腳踏車趕回家。

Meaning: To inform someone is to tell them about something.
Meaning_Translation: 「通知」是指告訴某人某事。
Example: I called and informed her about my idea.
Example_Translation: 我打電話告訴她我的想法。

Meaning: Later means after the present, expected, or usual time.
Meaning_Translation: 「稍後」是指在現在、預期或平常時間之後。
Example: She missed the train, so she’ll arrive a little later than expected.
Example_Translation: 她錯過火車，會比預期晚一點到。

Meaning: To leave means to go away from someone or something.
Meaning_Translation: 「離開」是指遠離某人或某物。
Example: He packed his bag and was ready to leave for home.
Example_Translation: 他收拾好行李，準備回家。

Meaning: To locate something is to find it.
Meaning_Translation: 「定位」是指找到某物。
Example: I could not locate my keys in the house.
Example_Translation: 我在家裡找不到鑰匙。

Meaning: A nurse is a person who helps sick people in the hospital.
Meaning_Translation: 「護士」是在醫院協助病人的專業人員。
Example: A nurse helped me get better.
Example_Translation: 護士幫我康復。

Meaning: An operation is when a doctor replaces or removes something in the body.
Meaning_Translation: 「手術」是醫生在體內更換或移除某物的過程。
Example: The operation on my arm was a success.
Example_Translation: 我手臂的手術很成功。

Meaning: Pain is the feeling that you have when you are hurt.
Meaning_Translation: 「疼痛」是受傷時的感受。
Example: His head was full of pain.
Example_Translation: 他頭痛欲裂。

Meaning: To refuse something is to say “no” to it.
Meaning_Translation: 「拒絕」是指對某事說「不」。
Example: The dog refused to play with the cat.
Example_Translation: 狗拒絕和貓玩。

Meaning: Though is used when one idea makes another seem surprising.
Meaning_Translation: 「雖然」是用於一個想法使另一個顯得意外時。
Example: Though he was overweight, he liked to be active.
Example_Translation: 雖然他過重，但他喜歡活動。

Meaning: If something is various, there are many types of it.
Meaning_Translation: 「各種的」事物有許多類型。
Example: She owned shoes of various styles.
Example_Translation: 她有各種款式的鞋子。

Meaning: Actual means real or true.
Meaning_Translation: 「實際的」是指真實的。
Example: This is the actual sword that the king owned, not a fake one.
Example_Translation: 這是國王擁有的真劍，不是假的。

Meaning: To amaze people is to surprise them very much.
Meaning_Translation: 「驚訝」是指讓人非常驚奇。
Example: The news in the paper amazed Jack.
Example_Translation: 報紙上的新聞讓傑克驚訝。

Meaning: A charge is the price to pay for something.
Meaning_Translation: 「費用」是為某物支付的價格。
Example: The charge for the shirts was $15.
Example_Translation: 這些襯衫收費15美元。

Meaning: To comfort someone means to make them feel better.
Meaning_Translation: 「安慰」是指讓某人感覺更好。
Example: I wanted to comfort my friend after I heard the bad news.
Example_Translation: 聽到壞消息後，我想安慰朋友。

Meaning: To contact people is to speak or write to them.
Meaning_Translation: 「聯絡」是指與人說話或寫信。
Example: I contacted Sue about my party.
Example_Translation: 我聯絡蘇談我的派對。

Meaning: A customer is a person who buys something at a store.
Meaning_Translation: 「顧客」是在商店購買東西的人。
Example: The customer put a few items in a bag.
Example_Translation: 顧客把幾樣東西放進袋子。

Meaning: To deliver something is to take it from one place to another.
Meaning_Translation: 「遞送」是指將某物從一地送到另一地。
Example: The man delivered Chinese food to my house.
Example_Translation: 那人送中餐到我家。

Meaning: To earn means to get money for the work you do.
Meaning_Translation: 「賺取」是指透過工作獲得金錢。
Example: He earns his living as a chef in a great restaurant.
Example_Translation: 他在一家高級餐廳當主廚維生。

Meaning: A gate is a type of door. Gates are usually made of metal or wood.
Meaning_Translation: 「大門」是一種門，通常由金屬或木材製成。
Example: We want to put up a wooden gate around our house.
Example_Translation: 我們想在家周圍裝木柵門。

Meaning: To include something means to have it as part of a group.
Meaning_Translation: 「包含」是指將某物作為群體的一部分。
Example: Does this meal include a soft drink?
Example_Translation: 這餐包含軟性飲料嗎？

Meaning: To manage something means to control or be in charge of it.
Meaning_Translation: 「管理」是指控制或負責某事。
Example: I had to manage the meeting myself.
Example_Translation: 我得自己主持會議。

Meaning: A mystery is something that is difficult to understand or explain.
Meaning_Translation: 「謎」是難以理解或解釋的事物。
Example: The path on the map was a complete mystery to me.
Example_Translation: 地圖上的路徑對我來說完全神秘。

Meaning: To occur means to happen.
Meaning_Translation: 「發生」是指事情出現。
Example: When did the thunderstorm occur?
Example_Translation: 雷雨是什麼時候發生的？

Meaning: If A is the opposite of B, A is completely different from B.
Meaning_Translation: 「相反的」是指 A 與 B 完全不同。
Example: The opposite of black is white.
Example_Translation: 黑色的相反是白色。

Meaning: A plate is a flat round thing that you put food on.
Meaning_Translation: 「盤子」是放食物的扁平圓形器皿。
Example: I put my plate down so I could put some food on it.
Example_Translation: 我把盤子放下，好放食物上去。

Meaning: To receive something is to get it.
Meaning_Translation: 「收到」是指獲得某物。
Example: I received a present on my birthday.
Example_Translation: 我生日收到禮物。

Meaning: A reward is something given in exchange for good behavior or work.
Meaning_Translation: 「獎勵」是因良好行為或工作而給予的東西。
Example: He was given a reward for his excellent performance.
Example_Translation: 他因表現出色獲得獎勵。

Meaning: To set something is to put it somewhere.
Meaning_Translation: 「放置」是指把某物放到某處。
Example: Please set the dice down on the table.
Example_Translation: 請把骰子放在桌上。

Meaning: To steal is to take something that is not yours.
Meaning_Translation: 「偷竊」是指拿走不屬於自己的東西。
Example: The men tried to steal money from the bank.
Example_Translation: 這些人試圖從銀行偷錢。

Meaning: A thief is someone who quietly takes things that do not belong to them.
Meaning_Translation: 「小偷」是悄悄拿走不屬於自己東西的人。
Example: A thief broke into our home and took my mother’s jewelry.
Example_Translation: 小偷闖入我家，偷走媽媽的珠寶。

Meaning: To advance is to go forward.
Meaning_Translation: 「前進」是指向前移動。
Example: He advanced across the bridge slowly.
Example_Translation: 他緩慢地前進過橋。

Meaning: An athlete is a person who plays sports.
Meaning_Translation: 「運動員」是從事運動的人。
Example: Some athletes can play many sports very well.
Example_Translation: 有些運動員擅長多種運動。

Meaning: If something is average, it is at a normal level.
Meaning_Translation: 「普通的」事物是處於正常水平。
Example: I’m not rich or poor; I’m average.
Example_Translation: 我不窮也不富，算是普通。

Meaning: Your behavior is the way you act.
Meaning_Translation: 「行為」是你行動的方式。
Example: Their behavior was good this semester. They didn’t cause trouble.
Example_Translation: 他們這學期行為良好，沒惹麻煩。

Meaning: Behind means to be at the back of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「在……後面」是指位於某物的後方。
Example: The little girl was hiding behind a tree.
Example_Translation: 小女孩躲在樹後。

Meaning: A course is a class in school.
Meaning_Translation: 「課程」是學校中的課堂。
Example: I took a P.E. course in school this year.
Example_Translation: 我今年在學校修了體育課。

Meaning: To lower something is to make it go down.
Meaning_Translation: 「降低」是指使某物下降。
Example: The chart shows how his production has lowered over the year.
Example_Translation: 圖表顯示他今年的產量下降了。

Meaning: To match is to be the same or similar.
Meaning_Translation: 「匹配」是指相同或相似。
Example: The two shoes matched. They looked the same.
Example_Translation: 兩隻鞋很配，看起來一樣。

Meaning: A member is a person who is part of a group.
Meaning_Translation: 「成員」是群體中的一份子。
Example: Julie is the newest member of our team.
Example_Translation: 茱莉是我們團隊的新成員。

Meaning: If something is mental, it has to do with your mind.
Meaning_Translation: 「心理的」事物與心智有關。
Example: I made a mental picture of the room.
Example_Translation: 我在腦中描繪房間的樣子。

Meaning: A passenger is a person who rides in a car, train, or airplane.
Meaning_Translation: 「乘客」是搭乘汽車、火車或飛機的人。
Example: One passenger was standing near the subway train.
Example_Translation: 一名乘客站在地鐵列車旁。

Meaning: Your personality is what you are like and how you behave.
Meaning_Translation: 「個性」是你是怎樣的人以及你的行為方式。
Example: John has a bad personality.
Example_Translation: 約翰個性不好。

Meaning: A poem is a short kind of writing.
Meaning_Translation: 「詩」是一種簡短的文學形式。
Example: William Shakespeare wrote many poems.
Example_Translation: 威廉·莎士比亞寫了很多詩。

Meaning: A pole is a long thin stick made of wood or metal that supports things.
Meaning_Translation: 「桿子」是用木頭或金屬製成的長細棍，用來支撐物品。
Example: The flag was hanging from the flag pole.
Example_Translation: 旗子掛在旗桿上。

Meaning: To remove something is to take it away.
Meaning_Translation: 「移除」是指拿走某物。
Example: I removed the nail from the board.
Example_Translation: 我從木板上拔出釘子。

Meaning: Safety means the condition of being safe and free from danger.
Meaning_Translation: 「安全」是指處於無危險的狀態。
Example: For his own safety, he was placed in a car seat.
Example_Translation: 為了安全起見，他被安置在汽車安全座椅上。

Meaning: To shoot is to fire something like a bullet at someone or something.
Meaning_Translation: 「射擊」是指發射子彈等物體攻擊人或物。
Example: The hunter raised his gun to shoot at the target.
Example_Translation: 獵人舉槍瞄準目標射擊。

Meaning: To sound means to make a noise.
Meaning_Translation: 「發出聲音」是指製造噪音。
Example: The alarm clock sounded and woke us all up.
Example_Translation: 鬧鐘響了，把我們全都吵醒。

Meaning: To swim is to move through water.
Meaning_Translation: 「游泳」是指在水中移動。
Example: I love to swim in the ocean.
Example_Translation: 我喜歡在海裡游泳。

Meaning: A web is a home made by a spider.
Meaning_Translation: 「蜘蛛網」是蜘蛛編織的家。
Example: Mom cleaned the spider webs out of the garage.
Example_Translation: 媽媽清理了車庫裡的蜘蛛網。

Meaning: A block is a solid piece of wood, stone, or ice.
Meaning_Translation: 「塊」是木頭、石頭或冰的固體。
Example: I saw a block of ice on the floor.
Example_Translation: 我看到地板上有一塊冰。

Meaning: When you bury something, you put it under the ground or under a lot of other things.
Meaning_Translation: 「埋葬」是指將某物放入地下或大量其他東西之下。
Example: My father was buried in his hometown when he died.
Example_Translation: 我父親過世後葬在故鄉。

Meaning: To cheer is to give a loud shout of approval or encouragement.
Meaning_Translation: 「歡呼」是指大聲喊叫以表達贊同或鼓勵。
Example: The crowd all cheered when the home team won.
Example_Translation: 主隊獲勝時，觀眾齊聲歡呼。

Meaning: If something is complex, it has many small parts. It is hard to understand.
Meaning_Translation: 「複雜的」事物有許多小部分，難以理解。
Example: A jigsaw puzzle can be complex because it has so many pieces.
Example_Translation: 拼圖很複雜，因為有很多片。

Meaning: A critic is someone who gives opinions about movies, books, plays, etc.
Meaning_Translation: 「評論家」是對電影、書籍、戲劇等發表意見的人。
Example: The wine critic tasted the wine so he could give his opinion.
Example_Translation: 酒評家品嚐葡萄酒後發表意見。

Meaning: A direction is the way to go.
Meaning_Translation: 「方向」是前行的路徑。
Example: Go in this direction for 10 minutes, and you will get to the river.
Example_Translation: 朝這個方向走十分鐘，就會到達河邊。

Meaning: An event is something that happens, especially something important.
Meaning_Translation: 「事件」是發生的事，尤其是重要的事。
Example: Finishing high school was a major event in his life.
Example_Translation: 高中畢業是他人生的重要大事。

Meaning: To exercise is to run or play sports so that you can be healthy.
Meaning_Translation: 「運動」是指跑步或從事體育活動以保持健康。
Example: You should exercise every day.
Example_Translation: 你應該每天運動。

Meaning: Friendship is the relationship between people who are friends.
Meaning_Translation: 「友誼」是朋友之間的關係。
Example: Michael and Lisa have a very strong friendship with each other.
Example_Translation: 麥可和麗莎有很深厚的友誼。

Meaning: A guide is someone who shows you where to go.
Meaning_Translation: 「導遊」是帶你去某地的人。
Example: We followed a guide at the park.
Example_Translation: 我們在公園跟著導遊。

Meaning: If there is a lack of something, there is not enough of it.
Meaning_Translation: 「缺乏」是指某物不足。
Example: His only problem is a lack of money.
Example_Translation: 他唯一的問題是缺錢。

Meaning: To perform is to do something in front of people who watch.
Meaning_Translation: 「表演」是指在觀眾面前做某事。
Example: He will perform a song for the class.
Example_Translation: 他要為全班表演一首歌。

Meaning: Pressure is what you apply to make someone do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「壓力」是促使某人做某事的力量。
Example: They put pressure on him to change his mind.
Example_Translation: 他們施壓要他改變主意。

Meaning: If something will probably happen, it is likely to happen.
Meaning_Translation: 「很可能」是指事情有可能發生。
Example: You will probably get a good grade if you study for the test.
Example_Translation: 如果你用功讀書，很可能會考好。

Meaning: If something is public, it is meant for everyone to use.
Meaning_Translation: 「公共的」事物是供所有人使用的。
Example: I went to the public park to play with my friends.
Example_Translation: 我去公園和朋友玩。

Meaning: Smart means intelligent.
Meaning_Translation: 「聰明的」是指有智慧的。
Example: Mary is a smart student.
Example_Translation: 瑪麗是個聰明的學生。

Meaning: To strike people or things is to hit them.
Meaning_Translation: 「打擊」是指擊打人或物。
Example: She struck the other girl in the face.
Example_Translation: 她打了另一個女孩的臉。

Meaning: To support something is to like it and help it be successful.
Meaning_Translation: 「支持」是指喜歡某事並幫助其成功。
Example: Everyone at work supports the new plan.
Example_Translation: 所有同事都支持新計畫。

Meaning: A term is a word for something.
Meaning_Translation: 「術語」是某事物的專有名詞。
Example: I often use the term “oops” when I make a mistake.
Example_Translation: 我犯錯時常說「哎呀」。

Meaning: To unite is to get together to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「團結」是指聚集在一起做某事。
Example: If we unite, we can finish our project faster.
Example_Translation: 如果我們團結，就能更快完成專案。

Meaning: To associate means to connect something with a person or thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「聯想」是指將某事與人或物連結。
Example: Most people associate birthday parties with having fun.
Example_Translation: 大多數人把生日派對和玩樂聯想在一起。

Meaning: The environment is the place where people work or live.
Meaning_Translation: 「環境」是人們工作或生活的地方。
Example: Keeping our environment clean is important to our health.
Example_Translation: 保持環境清潔對健康很重要。

Meaning: A factory is a building where things are made or put together.
Meaning_Translation: 「工廠」是製造或組裝物品的建築物。
Example: We have only one factory in our town.
Example_Translation: 我們鎮上只有一家工廠。

Meaning: A feature is an important part of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「特色」是某物的重要部分。
Example: The cell phone has many features.
Example_Translation: 這支手機有很多功能。

Meaning: An instance is an example of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「例子」是某事的實例。
Example: I have never experienced an instance of hate. Have you?
Example_Translation: 我從未經歷過仇恨事件，你有嗎？

Meaning: To involve means to include as an active participant.
Meaning_Translation: 「涉及」是指包含為積極參與者。
Example: The whole family was involved in playing the game.
Example_Translation: 全家人都參與了遊戲。

Meaning: Medicine is something you take to feel better or treat an illness.
Meaning_Translation: 「藥物」是用來改善感覺或治療疾病的東西。
Example: The doctor gave me medicine for my cold.
Example_Translation: 醫生給我感冒藥。

Meaning: A mix is different things put together.
Meaning_Translation: 「混合物」是不同東西的組合。
Example: The green mix we made in science class spilled onto the table.
Example_Translation: 自然課做的綠色混合物灑到桌上。

Meaning: To organize is to plan or get ready for an event.
Meaning_Translation: 「組織」是指規劃或為活動做準備。
Example: Make a list to help you organize the things you need.
Example_Translation: 列清單幫助你整理所需物品。

Meaning: A period is an amount of time when something happens.
Meaning_Translation: 「時期」是某事發生的一段時間。
Example: In one period in Europe, there were many knights.
Example_Translation: 歐洲某個時期有很多騎士。

Meaning: If people populate an area, they live there.
Meaning_Translation: 「居住」是指人們住在某區域。
Example: Billions of people populate the Earth.
Example_Translation: 數十億人居住在地球上。

Meaning: To produce something is to make or grow it.
Meaning_Translation: 「生產」是指製造或種植某物。
Example: This tree produces apples every year.
Example_Translation: 這棵樹每年結蘋果。

Meaning: A range is a number or a set of similar things.
Meaning_Translation: 「範圍」是一組數字或類似事物。
Example: I saw a range of cars to choose from.
Example_Translation: 我看到一系列可選擇的車款。

Meaning: To recognize something is to know it because you have seen it before.
Meaning_Translation: 「認出」是指因先前見過而知道某物。
Example: I recognized an old friend from many years ago.
Example_Translation: 我認出一位多年不見的老朋友。

Meaning: If something is regular, it happens often and in equal amounts of time.
Meaning_Translation: 「規律的」事物經常發生且時間間隔相等。
Example: Our regular lunch time is around noon.
Example_Translation: 我們固定午餐時間是中午左右。

Meaning: A sign is an indication giving information, directions, a warning, etc.
Meaning_Translation: 「標誌」是提供資訊、指示、警告等的標示。
Example: The sign indicated that today would be a bad day.
Example_Translation: 標誌顯示今天會是糟糕的一天。

Meaning: A tip is a pointed end of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「尖端」是某物的尖銳末端。
Example: The tip of his pen was very sharp.
Example_Translation: 他筆尖很尖。

Meaning: A tradition is something people have been doing for a long time.
Meaning_Translation: 「傳統」是人們長期以來的做法。
Example: Marriage is a tradition all over the world.
Example_Translation: 婚姻是全世界的傳統。

Meaning: Trash is waste material or unwanted or worthless things.
Meaning_Translation: 「垃圾」是廢棄物或不需要、無價值的東西。
Example: Please take out the trash; it smells bad.
Example_Translation: 請把垃圾拿出去，聞起來很臭。

Meaning: If something is wide, it is large from side to side.
Meaning_Translation: 「寬的」事物左右距離大。
Example: The door was as wide as my arms.
Example_Translation: 門和我張開的手臂一樣寬。

Meaning: Advice is an opinion about what to do.
Meaning_Translation: 「建議」是關於該做什麼的意見。
Example: I don’t know how to study for my exams. Can you give me some advice?
Example_Translation: 我不知道怎麼準備考試，你能給我一些建議嗎？

Meaning: Along means down the length of a road, river, etc.
Meaning_Translation: 「沿著」是指順著道路、河流等的長度方向。
Example: Walk along this tunnel for ten minutes, and you’ll see a door on the left.
Example_Translation: 沿這條隧道走十分鐘，左邊會看到一扇門。

Meaning: Attention is the notice, thought, or consideration of someone.
Meaning_Translation: 「注意力」是對某人的注意、思考或關注。
Example: His work got the attention of two of his co-workers.
Example_Translation: 他的工作引起兩位同事注意。

Meaning: To attract means to make a person or thing come closer or be interested.
Meaning_Translation: 「吸引」是指使人或物靠近或產生興趣。
Example: The magnet attracted the metal.
Example_Translation: 磁鐵吸住了金屬。

Meaning: To climb means to use your hands and feet to go up something.
Meaning_Translation: 「攀爬」是指用手腳登上某物。
Example: The girls climbed to the top of the mountain.
Example_Translation: 女孩們爬上山頂。

Meaning: To drop is to fall or allow something to fall.
Meaning_Translation: 「掉落」是指落下或讓某物落下。
Example: A small amount of water dropped from the bottle.
Example_Translation: 少量水從瓶子滴下。

Meaning: If something is final, it is the last part.
Meaning_Translation: 「最終的」是指最後的部分。
Example: In the final part of the film, the man and the woman got married.
Example_Translation: 電影最後一幕，男女主角結婚了。

Meaning: Further means at or from a greater distance or time.
Meaning_Translation: 「更遠的」是指距離或時間更長。
Example: The escalator is further than I thought.
Example_Translation: 電扶梯比我以為的更遠。

Meaning: To imply something is to suggest it without saying it.
Meaning_Translation: 「暗示」是指不直接說出而表示某事。
Example: The man implied that he wanted the job, but he didn’t say so.
Example_Translation: 他暗示想要這份工作，但沒明說。

Meaning: To maintain means to make something stay the same.
Meaning_Translation: 「維持」是指使某物保持不變。
Example: The balls maintain constant movement.
Example_Translation: 球持續不斷地移動。

Meaning: You use neither to connect two negative possibilities.
Meaning_Translation: 「兩者都不」是用來連接兩個否定可能性。
Example: Neither the path on the left nor the path on the right will lead us home.
Example_Translation: 左邊和右邊的路都不會帶我們回家。

Meaning: Otherwise means in another way if you don’t do this.
Meaning_Translation: 「否則」是指如果不這樣做，就用另一種方式。
Example: It’s good to stay active; otherwise, you’ll gain weight.
Example_Translation: 保持活動很好，否則會變胖。

Meaning: If something is physical, it is related to your body and not your mind.
Meaning_Translation: 「身體的」事物與身體有關，而非心智。
Example: Biking is good for your physical health.
Example_Translation: 騎腳踏車有益身體健康。

Meaning: To prove something is to show that it is true.
Meaning_Translation: 「證明」是指顯示某事為真。
Example: My teacher proved the answer on the board.
Example_Translation: 老師在黑板上證明了答案。

Meaning: To react is to respond by acting in a certain way.
Meaning_Translation: 「反應」是指以特定方式回應。
Example: James reacted badly to the news.
Example_Translation: 詹姆斯對這消息反應很差。

Meaning: To ride something is to travel on it. You can ride an animal, a bike, etc.
Meaning_Translation: 「騎乘」是指乘坐動物、自行車等移動。
Example: I will ride a roller coaster for the first time today.
Example_Translation: 我今天第一次坐雲霄飛車。

Meaning: If something is situated somewhere, it is in that place.
Meaning_Translation: 「位於」是指某物在某地。
Example: The whiteboard is situated between the two men.
Example_Translation: 白板位於兩個男人之間。

Meaning: Society is a group of people who interact and share a culture.
Meaning_Translation: 「社會」是互動並共享文化的群體。
Example: Society expects people to be good and honest.
Example_Translation: 社會期望人們善良誠實。

Meaning: A standard is what people consider normal or good.
Meaning_Translation: 「標準」是人們認為正常或良好的準則。
Example: This older model TV is below our store’s standards.
Example_Translation: 這台舊型號電視不符合我們店的標準。

Meaning: To suggest something means to give an idea or plan about it.
Meaning_Translation: 「建議」是指提出想法或計畫。
Example: He suggested that we go to see his boss.
Example_Translation: 他建議我們去見他的老闆。

Meaning: Actually means in fact or really.
Meaning_Translation: 「實際上」是指事實上或真的。
Example: My dad looks a little mean, but actually he’s very kind.
Example_Translation: 我爸看起來有點兇，其實他很善良。

Meaning: Bite is the act of using your teeth to cut and tear into something.
Meaning_Translation: 「咬」是用牙齒切開或撕裂某物的動作。
Example: The boy took a big bite of his hamburger.
Example_Translation: 男孩大口咬下漢堡。

Meaning: The coast is the land by an ocean.
Meaning_Translation: 「海岸」是靠海的土地。
Example: I stayed on the southern coast of Australia.
Example_Translation: 我待在澳洲南海岸。

Meaning: A deal is an agreement that you have with another person.
Meaning_Translation: 「協議」是你與他人達成的約定。
Example: I made a deal with the other company to give us some money.
Example_Translation: 我和另一家公司達成協議，讓他們給我們一些錢。

Meaning: The desert is an area of land without many plants or water.
Meaning_Translation: 「沙漠」是缺乏植物和水的土地區域。
Example: Not many plants grow in the desert.
Example_Translation: 沙漠裡植物不多。

Meaning: If something is effective, it works well.
Meaning_Translation: 「有效的」事物是運作良好的。
Example: Swimming is an effective way to stay healthy.
Example_Translation: 游泳是保持健康的有效方式。

Meaning: To examine something is to look at it carefully.
Meaning_Translation: 「檢查」是指仔細查看某物。
Example: The doctor examined my eyes today.
Example_Translation: 醫生今天檢查了我的眼睛。

Meaning: If something is false, it is not correct.
Meaning_Translation: 「錯誤的」事物是不正確的。
Example: If you think the answer is false, press the red button.
Example_Translation: 如果你認為答案是錯的，按紅色按鈕。

Meaning: When you figure something out, you come to understand it and find an answer.
Meaning_Translation: 「弄清楚」是指理解某事並找到答案。
Example: I couldn’t figure out what he wanted me to do.
Example_Translation: 我搞不懂他要我做什麼。

Meaning: A gift is something you give someone.
Meaning_Translation: 「禮物」是你送給別人的東西。
Example: Dave received many gifts for Christmas.
Example_Translation: 戴夫聖誕節收到很多禮物。

Meaning: Hunger is the feeling that you get when you need to eat.
Meaning_Translation: 「飢餓」是需要進食時的感受。
Example: After playing all day long, he was filled with hunger.
Example_Translation: 玩了一整天後，他非常餓。

Meaning: To imagine something is to think of it in your mind.
Meaning_Translation: 「想像」是指在腦中構思某事。
Example: Sally imagined herself winning lots of money.
Example_Translation: 莎莉想像自己贏了很多錢。

Meaning: A journey is a long trip.
Meaning_Translation: 「旅程」是長途旅行。
Example: I went on a journey across the country with my parents.
Example_Translation: 我和父母橫跨全國旅行。

Meaning: A puzzle is something that is hard to understand.
Meaning_Translation: 「謎題」是難以理解的事物。
Example: The question was a puzzle to him.
Example_Translation: 這個問題對他來說是個謎。

Meaning: Quite means that something is a certain way completely or very much.
Meaning_Translation: 「相當」是指某事完全或非常如此。
Example: I think typing on a keyboard is quite easy.
Example_Translation: 我覺得用鍵盤打字蠻簡單的。

Meaning: Rather is used when you want to do one thing but not the other.
Meaning_Translation: 「寧可」是用於想做一件事而不做另一件時。
Example: I would rather have the red one than the blue one.
Example_Translation: 我寧願要紅色的，不要藍色的。

Meaning: If something is specific, it is precise or exact.
Meaning_Translation: 「具體的」事物是精確或明確的。
Example: Please choose a specific place on the map.
Example_Translation: 請在地圖上選一個具體地點。

Meaning: A spider is a small creature with eight legs.
Meaning_Translation: 「蜘蛛」是有八隻腳的小型生物。
Example: Some adults have a fear of little creatures such as spiders.
Example_Translation: 有些大人害怕蜘蛛等小生物。

Meaning: A tour is a short trip in which you see many sights.
Meaning_Translation: 「旅遊」是參觀多個景點的短期旅行。
Example: I took a tour of Asia and Europe.
Example_Translation: 我去了亞洲和歐洲旅遊。

Meaning: A trip is a journey to a certain place.
Meaning_Translation: 「旅行」是前往某地的行程。
Example: Ken took a trip to the city yesterday.
Example_Translation: 肯昨天去城市旅行。

Meaning: A band is a group of people who play music.
Meaning_Translation: 「樂團」是演奏音樂的一群人。
Example: My brother is in a rock band.
Example_Translation: 我哥哥在一個搖滾樂團。

Meaning: Barely means by the smallest amount, almost not.
Meaning_Translation: 「幾乎不」是指程度極低，幾乎沒有。
Example: I barely had enough money to pay for my bus ticket.
Example_Translation: 我幾乎沒錢付公車票。

Meaning: If something is boring, it is not fun.
Meaning_Translation: 「無聊的」事物是不好玩的。
Example: I think the Internet is boring.
Example_Translation: 我覺得網際網路很無聊。

Meaning: To cancel means to decide that an event or a request will not happen.
Meaning_Translation: 「取消」是指決定不讓活動或請求發生。
Example: She canceled the rest of her plans because of the rain.
Example_Translation: 因為下雨，她取消了剩下的計畫。

Meaning: A driveway is a short private road that leads to a person’s home.
Meaning_Translation: 「車道」是通往住宅的私人短路。
Example: The long driveway led us to their new house.
Example_Translation: 長長的車道帶我們到他們的新家。

Meaning: Garbage is waste material like unwanted or spoiled food, bottles, paper, etc.
Meaning_Translation: 「垃圾」是廢棄物，如不要或腐壞的食物、瓶子、紙張等。
Example: The boy cleaned up the garbage around his house.
Example_Translation: 男孩清理了家附近的垃圾。

Meaning: An instrument is something designed to do a certain task like play music.
Meaning_Translation: 「器具」是設計來執行特定任務的工具，如演奏音樂。
Example: My favorite musical instrument is the piano.
Example_Translation: 我最喜歡的樂器是鋼琴。

Meaning: A list is a record of information printed with an item on each line.
Meaning_Translation: 「清單」是每行列出一項資訊的記錄。
Example: My mom makes a list of groceries to buy.
Example_Translation: 我媽列出要買的雜貨清單。

Meaning: Magic is the power to do impossible things.
Meaning_Translation: 「魔法」是實現不可能之事的力量。
Example: The magician used magic to pull a rabbit out of his hat.
Example_Translation: 魔術師用魔法從帽子裡變出兔子。

Meaning: A message is a set of words that you send to someone.
Meaning_Translation: 「訊息」是你傳送給他人的文字內容。
Example: I left a message for you in the envelope.
Example_Translation: 我在信封裡留了訊息給你。

Meaning: To notice something is to see it for the first time.
Meaning_Translation: 「注意到」是指第一次看見某物。
Example: Did you notice the view?
Example_Translation: 你注意到那景色了嗎？

Meaning: To own something means to have it. That thing belongs to you.
Meaning_Translation: 「擁有」是指持有某物，那東西屬於你。
Example: My grandfather owns that house.
Example_Translation: 我爺爺擁有那棟房子。

Meaning: To predict something is to say that it will happen.
Meaning_Translation: 「預測」是指說某事將會發生。
Example: She predicted that I would get married next year.
Example_Translation: 她預測我明年會結婚。

Meaning: A professor is a person who teaches in college.
Meaning_Translation: 「教授」是在大學任教的人。
Example: Mike’s science professor knows a lot about physics.
Example_Translation: 麥可的自然教授很懂物理。

Meaning: To rush is to go somewhere or do something very quickly.
Meaning_Translation: 「匆忙」是指非常快速地去某地或做某事。
Example: Nancy rushed to finish her homework.
Example_Translation: 南希趕著寫完功課。

Meaning: A schedule is a plan that tells you when to do things.
Meaning_Translation: 「行程表」是告訴你何時做事的計畫。
Example: What is your class schedule for today?
Example_Translation: 你今天的課表是什麼？

Meaning: To share something is to give some of it to another person.
Meaning_Translation: 「分享」是指將部分東西給他人。
Example: Jimmy shared his apple with me.
Example_Translation: 吉米把他的蘋果分給我。
