Meaning: A stage is a place where actors or musicians act or sing.
Meaning_Translation: 「舞台」是演員或音樂家表演的地方。
Example: A large screen was on the stage.
Example_Translation: 舞台上有一個大螢幕。

Meaning: A storm is very bad weather. There is a lot of rain or snow.
Meaning_Translation: 「暴風雨」是非常惡劣的天氣，伴隨大量雨或雪。
Example: Did that storm wake you up last night?
Example_Translation: 昨晚那場暴風雨把你吵醒了嗎？

Meaning: You use within to say that something is inside another thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「在……之內」是用來表示某物在另一物內部。
Example: Within the box, there was a pizza.
Example_Translation: 盒子裡有一個披薩。

Meaning: A burden is a serious or difficult responsibility.
Meaning_Translation: 「負擔」是嚴重或困難的責任。
Example: Children who do not behave are a burden to their parents.
Example_Translation: 不乖的孩子是父母的負擔。

Meaning: To compromise is to agree to something that is not exactly what you want.
Meaning_Translation: 「妥協」是指同意不完全符合你期望的事。
Example: We both compromised about the game we decided to play.
Example_Translation: 我們互相妥協，決定玩哪個遊戲。

Meaning: To craft something is to make it using skill.
Meaning_Translation: 「製作」是指運用技巧製造某物。
Example: She crafted the bookcase out of solid pine wood and then painted it.
Example_Translation: 她用實心松木打造書櫃，然後上漆。

Meaning: When you dive into water, you go down head first into the water.
Meaning_Translation: 「跳水」是指頭先入水潛入水中。
Example: I like sky-diving from an airplane.
Example_Translation: 我喜歡從飛機跳傘。

Meaning: When people or things are fragile, they are not strong and can be damaged easily.
Meaning_Translation: 「脆弱的」人或物不堅強，容易受損。
Example: The fragile glassware was carefully packed into boxes.
Example_Translation: 易碎的玻璃器皿被小心地裝箱。

Meaning: If you cut something into two parts that are the same size, you cut it half.
Meaning_Translation: 「一半」是指將某物切成兩個相同大小的部分。
Example: The machine can divide the book in half.
Example_Translation: 這機器能把書分成兩半。

Meaning: Innocence is a lack of experience of difficult or complex things in life.
Meaning_Translation: 「天真」是缺乏對生活中困難或複雜事物的經驗。
Example: Everyone who met her found her innocence to be charming.
Example_Translation: 每個見過她的人都覺得她的天真很迷人。

Meaning: When you lead something, you go first and it follows you.
Meaning_Translation: 「帶領」是指你走在前面，後面的人跟隨。
Example: I will lead you to the right place.
Example_Translation: 我會帶你到正確的地方。

Meaning: When you have a meeting, you are with other people.
Meaning_Translation: 「會議」是與其他人聚在一起。
Example: We have lots of meetings at our school to plan what to do.
Example_Translation: 我們學校開很多會來規劃事情。

Meaning: To merge two things is to combine them into one whole thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「合併」是指將兩物結合為一個整體。
Example: The storm clouds merged into one large menacing cloud that filled the sky.
Example_Translation: 暴風雲融合成一大片烏雲，籠罩天空。

Meaning: When something is moderate, it is not too big or too small in size or amount.
Meaning_Translation: 「適中的」事物在大小或數量上不過大也不過小。
Example: It takes a moderate amount of patience to be around small children all day.
Example_Translation: 整天陪小孩需要適度的耐心。

Meaning: To overwhelm is to exist in such a large amount that someone cannot deal with it.
Meaning_Translation: 「壓倒」是指數量大到讓人無法應付。
Example: The amount of homework her teacher assigned has overwhelmed her.
Example_Translation: 老師指派的大量作業讓她喘不過氣。

Meaning: When you make a payment, you give someone some money for what you get.
Meaning_Translation: 「付款」是指為所獲得的東西付錢給他人。
Example: I made the last payment on my car yesterday. Now I am really the owner.
Example_Translation: 我昨天付清車款，現在真的是車主了。

Meaning: A perception of a situation is a way of thinking about it or understanding it.
Meaning_Translation: 「認知」是對情況的思考或理解方式。
Example: Since he couldn’t see, his perception of life was much different than mine.
Example_Translation: 因為他看不見，他對生活的感受和我很不同。

Meaning: When you settle something, you reach an agreement.
Meaning_Translation: 「解決」是指達成協議。
Example: We settled the argument by looking up the answer on the web.
Example_Translation: 我們上網查答案解決了爭論。

Meaning: A shiver is a shaking movement the body makes when someone is cold or scared.
Meaning_Translation: 「顫抖」是身體因寒冷或害怕而產生的抖動。
Example: I got shivers on my way home because it was so cold.
Example_Translation: 回家路上太冷，我直發抖。

Meaning: When someone is sociable, they are friendly.
Meaning_Translation: 「友善的」人是喜歡社交的。
Example: Many of my good friends are sociable, but I am shy.
Example_Translation: 我很多好朋友都很外向，但我很害羞。

Meaning: When you speed, you go very fast.
Meaning_Translation: 「加速」是指快速前進。
Example: Speeding is the cause of most car accidents.
Example_Translation: 超速是大多數車禍的原因。

Meaning: When someone is talkative, he or she talks a lot.
Meaning_Translation: 「健談的」人話很多。
Example: My aunt is very talkative whenever she is on the phone.
Example_Translation: 我阿姨一講電話就很愛聊天。

Meaning: When something is usual, it is what we expect.
Meaning_Translation: 「平常的」事物是我們預期的。
Example: It was just the usual people who came.
Example_Translation: 來的都是平常那些人。

Meaning: If something is above, it is at a higher level than something else.
Meaning_Translation: 「在……之上」是指位置高於其他東西。
Example: He straightened the sign that was above the crowd.
Example_Translation: 他扶正人群上方的標誌。

Meaning: If something is ahead of something else, it is in front of it.
Meaning_Translation: 「在……前面」是指位置在其他東西前方。
Example: The blue car drove on ahead of us.
Example_Translation: 藍色車子開在我們前面。

Meaning: An amount is how much there is of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「數量」是某物有多少。
Example: Can I use my card to pay for the entire amount?
Example_Translation: 我可以用卡付全部金額嗎？

Meaning: A belief is a strong feeling that something is correct or true.
Meaning_Translation: 「信念」是強烈覺得某事正確或真實。
Example: A preacher or priest should have a strong belief in God.
Example_Translation: 傳教士或神父應該對上帝有堅定信仰。

Meaning: The center of something is the middle of it.
Meaning_Translation: 「中心」是某物的中間。
Example: The center of a dart board is the most important spot.
Example_Translation: 飛鏢靶中心是最重要的位置。

Meaning: If something is common, it happens often or there is much of it.
Meaning_Translation: 「常見的」事物經常發生或數量很多。
Example: It is common for snow to fall in the winter.
Example_Translation: 冬天下雪很常見。

Meaning: To cost is to require payment.
Meaning_Translation: 「花費」是指需要付款。
Example: These designer shoes cost more than the regular ones.
Example_Translation: 這些設計師鞋比普通鞋貴。

Meaning: To demonstrate something is to show how it is done.
Meaning_Translation: 「示範」是指展示如何做某事。
Example: She demonstrated her plan to her co-workers.
Example_Translation: 她向同事展示她的計畫。

Meaning: Different describes someone or something that is not the same as others.
Meaning_Translation: 「不同的」人或物與其他不一樣。
Example: Each of my sisters has a different hair style.
Example_Translation: 我每個姊妹都有不同的髮型。

Meaning: Evidence is a fact or thing that you use to prove something.
Meaning_Translation: 「證據」是用來證明某事的事實或物品。
Example: He used the pictures as evidence that UFOs are real.
Example_Translation: 他用照片當證據證明幽浮存在。

Meaning: Honesty means the quality of being truthful or honest.
Meaning_Translation: 「誠實」是指說實話或誠實的品質。
Example: A courtroom should be a place of honesty.
Example_Translation: 法庭應該是誠實的地方。

Meaning: An idiom is a phrase with a meaning different from its words.
Meaning_Translation: 「成語」是意思與字面不同的片語。
Example: The idiom “when pigs fly” means that something will never happen.
Example_Translation: 「豬飛上天」這個成語意思是某事永遠不會發生。

Meaning: If something is independent, it is not controlled by something else.
Meaning_Translation: 「獨立的」事物不受其他控制。
Example: She chose to live an independent life in the country.
Example_Translation: 她選擇在鄉下過獨立生活。

Meaning: Inside means the inner part, space or side of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「內部」是指某物的內側、空間或邊。
Example: The inside of the box was empty.
Example_Translation: 盒子裡面是空的。

Meaning: A jail is a place to keep bad people.
Meaning_Translation: 「監獄」是關押壞人的地方。
Example: He was sent to jail for taking other people’s cars.
Example_Translation: 他因偷別人的車被關進監獄。

Meaning: A master is a person who is very good at something.
Meaning_Translation: 「大師」是某方面非常擅長的人。
Example: My brother is a master of taekwondo.
Example_Translation: 我哥哥是跆拳道高手。

Meaning: A memory is something you remember.
Meaning_Translation: 「記憶」是你記得的事情。
Example: The memory of my first time in the city will always be the best.
Example_Translation: 我第一次進城的回憶永遠最美好。

Meaning: A pocket is a part of your clothing where you can keep things.
Meaning_Translation: 「口袋」是衣服中可放東西的部分。
Example: She always had her hands in her pockets.
Example_Translation: 她總是把手插在口袋裡。

Meaning: If something is proper, it is right.
Meaning_Translation: 「恰當的」事物是正確的。
Example: It is not proper to throw your garbage on the road.
Example_Translation: 把垃圾扔在路上是不恰當的。

Meaning: If something is for sale, you can buy it.
Meaning_Translation: 「出售」是指可以購買某物。
Example: Everything for sale here is the same price.
Example_Translation: 這裡所有商品售價相同。

Meaning: Because introduces a reason for something.
Meaning_Translation: 「因為」是引出原因的連接詞。
Example: We need to study because we have a test tomorrow.
Example_Translation: 我們要讀書，因為明天有考試。

Meaning: East is the direction the sun rises from.
Meaning_Translation: 「東方」是太陽升起的方向。
Example: My window looks to the east, so I can watch the sunrise every morning.
Example_Translation: 我的窗戶朝東，每天早上都能看日出。

Meaning: Expensive things cost a lot of money.
Meaning_Translation: 「昂貴的」事物花很多錢。
Example: My friend drives an expensive sports car.
Example_Translation: 我朋友開昂貴的跑車。

Meaning: A flower is the colored part of a plant.
Meaning_Translation: 「花朵」是植物的彩色部分。
Example: She gave pink flowers to her grandmother.
Example_Translation: 她送粉紅色花給奶奶。

Meaning: A garden is an area where people grow plants.
Meaning_Translation: 「花園」是人們種植植物的區域。
Example: The garden is very bright and colorful in the spring.
Example_Translation: 春天花園明亮多彩。

Meaning: A holiday is a special day of celebration.
Meaning_Translation: 「假日」是特別的慶祝日子。
Example: Monday was a holiday, so there was no school or work.
Example_Translation: 週一是假日，所以不用上學或上班。

Meaning: Many shows that there is a large number of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「許多」表示某物數量很大。
Example: There are many people on the street.
Example_Translation: 街上有很多人。

Meaning: A million is another way to write the number 1,000,000.
Meaning_Translation: 「百萬」是數字 1,000,000 的另一種寫法。
Example: Almost 19 million people live in Delhi, India.
Example_Translation: 印度德里有近一千九百萬人。

Meaning: A mountain is a very high hill.
Meaning_Translation: 「山」是非常高的丘陵。
Example: Mount Everest is the highest mountain in the world.
Example_Translation: 聖母峰是世界最高峰。

Meaning: A place is a space or area.
Meaning_Translation: 「地方」是空間或區域。
Example: A library is a place where people can read books.
Example_Translation: 圖書館是人們可以看書的地方。

Meaning: A popular thing is liked by many people.
Meaning_Translation: 「受歡迎的」事物被許多人喜歡。
Example: These people are listening to a popular man speak.
Example_Translation: 這些人在聽一位受歡迎的人演講。

Meaning: To ski is to glide on long pieces of wood or metal over snow.
Meaning_Translation: 「滑雪」是指在雪上滑行長木板或金屬板。
Example: The man likes to ski and goes every weekend.
Example_Translation: 這男人喜歡滑雪，每週末都去。

Meaning: Such means “like this”.
Meaning_Translation: 「如此」是指「像這樣」。
Example: I have never seen such a beautiful sunset before.
Example_Translation: 我從沒看過這麼美的日落。

Meaning: Total shows that everyone or everything has been counted.
Meaning_Translation: 「總共」表示所有人或事物都已計算在內。
Example: The total cost of the items she bought was $52.
Example_Translation: 她買的東西總共52美元。

Meaning: A tower is a tall, narrow building.
Meaning_Translation: 「塔」是高而窄的建築物。
Example: This is a very famous tower in Italy.
Example_Translation: 這是義大利一座很有名的塔。

Meaning: A town is a place where people live and work, and is smaller than a city.
Meaning_Translation: 「城鎮」是人們生活和工作的地方，比城市小。
Example: I come from a small town, and everyone there knows each other.
Example_Translation: 我來自小鎮，那裡的人都互相認識。

Meaning: A train is a group of railway cars connected together.
Meaning_Translation: 「火車」是一組連接在一起的鐵路車廂。
Example: The train is very fast, so we can get home in one hour.
Example_Translation: 火車很快，一小時就能到家。

Meaning: To walk is to move forward using legs, but it is slower than running.
Meaning_Translation: 「走路」是指用腿向前移動，但比跑步慢。
Example: The children walk to school in the morning.
Example_Translation: 孩子們早上走路去上學。

Meaning: To watch is to look at someone or something for a period of time.
Meaning_Translation: 「觀看」是指一段時間內看著某人或某物。
Example: My friend came over to watch a movie with me.
Example_Translation: 朋友來我家一起看電影。

Meaning: The world is the Earth and all the people and things in it.
Meaning_Translation: 「世界」是地球及其中所有人與事物。
Example: What are the names of the five oceans of the world?
Example_Translation: 世界五大洋的名字是什麼？

Meaning: Anxious means feeling worried or nervous.
Meaning_Translation: 「焦慮的」是指感到擔憂或緊張。
Example: She was anxious about not making her appointment on time.
Example_Translation: 她擔心趕不上約會。

Meaning: An awful thing is very bad.
Meaning_Translation: 「可怕的」事物是非常糟糕的。
Example: Her performance last night was awful.
Example_Translation: 她昨晚的表現很糟。

Meaning: To consist of certain is to be made of parts or things them.
Meaning_Translation: 「由……組成」是指由某些部分或事物構成。
Example: Today’s choices for lunch consisted of pizza, hamburgers, and hot dogs.
Example_Translation: 今天的午餐選擇有披薩、漢堡和熱狗。

Meaning: To desire is to want something.
Meaning_Translation: 「渴望」是指想要某物。
Example: My sister desires a big house and lots of money.
Example_Translation: 我妹妹想要大房子和很多錢。

Meaning: Eager shows excitement about something.
Meaning_Translation: 「熱切的」是指對某事感到興奮。
Example: The man was eager to talk about the good news.
Example_Translation: 這男人急著談論好消息。

Meaning: A household is all the people who live in one house.
Meaning_Translation: 「家庭」是住在同一屋簷下的所有人。
Example: Our household is made up of my father, my mother, and me.
Example_Translation: 我們家由爸爸、媽媽和我組成。

Meaning: An intent is a plan to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「意圖」是做某事的計畫。
Example: Her intent is to visit Italy next summer.
Example_Translation: 她打算明年夏天去義大利。

Meaning: A landscape is how an area of land looks.
Meaning_Translation: 「風景」是土地區域的外觀。
Example: The landscape of the country is very green.
Example_Translation: 這個國家的風景非常翠綠。

Meaning: To lift something is to move it higher.
Meaning_Translation: 「舉起」是指將某物抬高。
Example: The man tried to lift the box.
Example_Translation: 這男人試著抬起箱子。

Meaning: To load is to put objects into something.
Meaning_Translation: 「裝載」是指將物品放入某物中。
Example: The man loaded the boxes into a truck.
Example_Translation: 這男人把箱子裝上卡車。

Meaning: A lung is a part of the body that fills with air when breathing.
Meaning_Translation: 「肺」是呼吸時充滿空氣的身體器官。
Example: Having strong lungs is necessary for a healthy life.
Example_Translation: 強健的肺對健康生活很重要。

Meaning: A motion is a movement that someone makes.
Meaning_Translation: 「動作」是人做出的移動。
Example: The police officer made a motion with his hand.
Example_Translation: 警察用手做了個手勢。

Meaning: The pace of something is the speed at which it happens.
Meaning_Translation: 「速度」是某事發生的快慢。
Example: I ran the race at a slower pace than my friend.
Example_Translation: 我比賽跑得比我朋友慢。

Meaning: Polite shows a thoughtful and kind behavior.
Meaning_Translation: 「有禮貌的」是指體貼且善良的行為。
Example: The boy was very polite; he behaved very thoughtfully.
Example_Translation: 這男孩很有禮貌，行為很體貼。

Meaning: To possess something is to have it or own it.
Meaning_Translation: 「擁有」是指持有或擁有任何東西。
Example: My uncle possesses three sheep, a chicken, a cow, and a dog.
Example_Translation: 我叔叔養了三隻羊、一隻雞、一頭牛和一隻狗。

Meaning: Rapidly means happening very fast.
Meaning_Translation: 「迅速地」是指發生得非常快。
Example: The train moved rapidly on the tracks.
Example_Translation: 火車快速在軌道上行駛。

Meaning: To remark is to say something.
Meaning_Translation: 「評論」是指說出某事。
Example: The teacher remarked on how quickly the students were learning.
Example_Translation: 老師提到學生學得多快。

Meaning: To seek is to look for something.
Meaning_Translation: 「尋找」是指搜尋某物。
Example: If I have a problem, I seek my sister’s advice.
Example_Translation: 我有問題時會尋求妹妹的建議。

Meaning: To shine is to make a bright light.
Meaning_Translation: 「發光」是指發出明亮的光。
Example: The candles are shining in the dark room.
Example_Translation: 蠟燭在黑暗房間裡發光。

Meaning: To spill is to accidentally make something fall out of its container.
Meaning_Translation: 「溢出」是指不小心讓某物從容器中掉出。
Example: I spilled the coffee on the table.
Example_Translation: 我把咖啡灑在桌上。

Meaning: An arrow is a thin, straight stick shot from a bow.
Meaning_Translation: 「箭」是從弓射出的細長直棍。
Example: The arrow flew through the air and hit the target.
Example_Translation: 箭飛過空中命中目標。

Meaning: A battle is a fight between two armies during a war.
Meaning_Translation: 「戰役」是戰爭中兩支軍隊的戰鬥。
Example: The battle lasted for many days.
Example_Translation: 戰鬥持續了好幾天。

Meaning: A bow is a weapon made of curved wood and string that shoots arrows.
Meaning_Translation: 「弓」是用彎曲木頭和弦製成、可射箭的武器。
Example: He went hunting with a bow and arrow.
Example_Translation: 他帶著弓箭去打獵。

Meaning: A brave person is not afraid to face pain or danger.
Meaning_Translation: 「勇敢的」人不怕面對痛苦或危險。
Example: The brave firefighter saved the girl from the burning building.
Example_Translation: 勇敢的消防員從火場救出女孩。

Meaning: A chief is the leader of a group of people.
Meaning_Translation: 「首領」是一群人的領導者。
Example: The chief led the people through the mountains.
Example_Translation: 酋長帶領族人穿越山脈。

Meaning: A disadvantage is a situation that makes it hard to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「劣勢」是使事情難以進行的情況。
Example: Mike had a disadvantage in the race since he hurt his knee.
Example_Translation: 麥克因膝蓋受傷而在比賽中處於劣勢。

Meaning: An enemy is a country that is fighting another country during a war.
Meaning_Translation: 「敵人」是在戰爭中與另一國作戰的國家。
Example: The enemy prepared to attack the kingdom.
Example_Translation: 敵人準備攻打王國。

Meaning: An entrance is a place where someone can enter an area.
Meaning_Translation: 「入口」是進入某區域的地方。
Example: The gate was locked, so Bill had to find a different entrance.
Example_Translation: 大門鎖了，比爾得找其他入口。

Meaning: Hardly shows that something happens in a very small way.
Meaning_Translation: 「幾乎不」表示某事發生的程度極低。
Example: I hardly saw the concert since I had to leave early.
Example_Translation: 我得早走，幾乎沒看到演唱會。

Meaning: To intend to do something means to plan to do it.
Meaning_Translation: 「打算」是指計畫做某事。
Example: I intend to finish college in three years.
Example_Translation: 我打算三年內畢業。

Meaning: Laughter is the sound produced by laughing about something funny.
Meaning_Translation: 「笑聲」是因有趣事情而發出的聲音。
Example: Susan’s joke made her classmates burst into laughter.
Example_Translation: 蘇珊的笑話讓同學哄堂大笑。

Meaning: A log is a thick piece of wood that is cut from a tree.
Meaning_Translation: 「原木」是從樹上砍下的厚木塊。
Example: The fire was too small, so we added another log to it.
Example_Translation: 火太小，我們又加了一根木柴。

Meaning: The military is the armed forces of a country.
Meaning_Translation: 「軍隊」是一個國家的武裝部隊。
Example: I joined the military after I finished high school.
Example_Translation: 我高中畢業後加入軍隊。

Meaning: To obey means to follow what a law or a person says to do.
Meaning_Translation: 「服從」是指遵守法律或他人指示。
Example: My little sister did not obey my mother. Now, she is in trouble.
Example_Translation: 我妹妹不聽媽媽的話，現在有麻煩了。

Meaning: To secure something means to get it after a lot of effort.
Meaning_Translation: 「確保」是指經過大量努力獲得某物。
Example: I was able to secure a good grade on my test after weeks of studying.
Example_Translation: 經過幾週苦讀，我考試拿到好成績。

Meaning: Steady shows that someone or something does not change much.
Meaning_Translation: 「穩定的」是指人或事物變化不大。
Example: The problem was hard, but she remained steady and solved it.
Example_Translation: 問題很難，但她沉著應對並解決了。

Meaning: To trust is to believe that someone is honest and will do what is right.
Meaning_Translation: 「信任」是指相信他人誠實且會做正確的事。
Example: I trust my friends; they don’t tell my secrets to other people.
Example_Translation: 我相信朋友，他們不會把我的秘密告訴別人。

Meaning: When we twist something we turn it around and around.
Meaning_Translation: 「扭轉」是指將某物反覆旋轉。
Example: She twisted the spaghetti around her fork.
Example_Translation: 她把義大利麵纏在叉子上。

Meaning: Unless means if not or except when.
Meaning_Translation: 「除非」是指「如果不」或「除了當……時」。
Example: Unless you clean your room, you cannot play with your friends.
Example_Translation: 除非你打掃房間，否則不能和朋友玩。

Meaning: A weapon is an object used to hurt people.
Meaning_Translation: 「武器」是用來傷害人的工具。
Example: Swords have been used as weapons for thousands of years.
Example_Translation: 劍被當作武器已有數千年歷史。

Meaning: The chest is the front part of a body between the neck and stomach.
Meaning_Translation: 「胸部」是頸部與腹部之間身體的前側。
Example: The water in the lake was as high as my chest.
Example_Translation: 湖水高到我的胸口。

Meaning: Confidence is a feeling of certainty or ability.
Meaning_Translation: 「自信」是對自身能力或確定性的感覺。
Example: I have confidence that I did well on the test.
Example_Translation: 我相信我考試考得很好。

Meaning: A consequence is a result of a choice or action.
Meaning_Translation: 「後果」是選擇或行動的結果。
Example: As a consequence of missing my bus, I had to find another way to work.
Example_Translation: 因為錯過公車，我得另找方法上班。

Meaning: A disaster is a really bad thing that happens.
Meaning_Translation: 「災難」是發生的極壞事情。
Example: When the car crashed, it was a disaster.
Example_Translation: 車子撞毀時真是災難。

Meaning: To disturb someone means to upset that person.
Meaning_Translation: 「打擾」是指讓某人煩惱。
Example: The loud noise disturbed me while I was working.
Example_Translation: 我工作時被大聲噪音打擾。

Meaning: To estimate something means to make a guess about it.
Meaning_Translation: 「估計」是指對某事做出猜測。
Example: The boy estimated that he was one meter tall.
Example_Translation: 男孩估計自己身高一公尺。

Meaning: To honor is to show respect for someone or something.
Meaning_Translation: 「尊敬」是指對人或事物表示尊重。
Example: Each year we honor those who died fighting for their country.
Example_Translation: 每年我們紀念為國捐軀的人。

Meaning: To impress someone means to make that person proud or amazed.
Meaning_Translation: 「留下深刻印象」是指讓某人感到驕傲或驚訝。
Example: He was able to impress the girls with his new dance.
Example_Translation: 他用新舞步讓女孩們印象深刻。

Meaning: A narrow object or space is thin, not wide.
Meaning_Translation: 「窄的」物體或空間是細長而非寬闊的。
Example: The bridge is too narrow for a car to drive across it.
Example_Translation: 這座橋太窄，車子無法通過。

Meaning: Pale means that a color or thing is not bright.
Meaning_Translation: 「蒼白的」是指顏色或事物不鮮豔。
Example: The girl’s skin was very pale.
Example_Translation: 女孩的皮膚很蒼白。

Meaning: A rough thing is not even or smooth.
Meaning_Translation: 「粗糙的」事物不平整或不光滑。
Example: The rough ground hurt my feet.
Example_Translation: 粗糙的地面弄痛我的腳。

Meaning: To satisfy someone means to make that person happy.
Meaning_Translation: 「滿足」是指讓某人開心。
Example: It will satisfy my teacher if I finish all my homework.
Example_Translation: 如果我寫完所有功課，老師會滿意。

Meaning: To scream means to make a loud noise with your mouth.
Meaning_Translation: 「尖叫」是指用嘴巴發出大聲。
Example: The girl saw a spider and screamed.
Example_Translation: 女孩看到蜘蛛尖叫起來。

Meaning: A sensitive person or thing is easily hurt.
Meaning_Translation: 「敏感的」人或物容易受傷。
Example: My teeth are sensitive to cold things.
Example_Translation: 我的牙齒對冷的東西敏感。

Meaning: Shade is a dark area that something makes when it blocks the sun.
Meaning_Translation: 「陰影」是某物遮擋陽光形成的暗區。
Example: It was hot outside, so the boy sat in the shade of a tree.
Example_Translation: 外面很熱，男孩坐在樹蔭下。

Meaning: Strength is the ability to do hard work or exercise.
Meaning_Translation: 「力量」是從事艱苦工作或運動的能力。
Example: Eating good food builds up your strength.
Example_Translation: 吃好食物能增強體力。

Meaning: To supplement something is to add something else to it in a good way.
Meaning_Translation: 「補充」是指以良好方式添加其他東西。
Example: He supplements his diet with fresh fruits.
Example_Translation: 他用新鮮水果補充飲食。

Meaning: Terror is a feeling of very strong fear.
Meaning_Translation: 「恐怖」是非常強烈的恐懼感。
Example: I felt a sense of terror when the tiger chased me.
Example_Translation: 老虎追我時我感到恐懼。

Meaning: A threat is something bad that might happen.
Meaning_Translation: 「威脅」是可能發生的壞事。
Example: Due to the dark clouds, there was a threat of a bad storm.
Example_Translation: 烏雲密佈，有暴風雨的威脅。

Meaning: A victim is a person who is hurt by a bad action.
Meaning_Translation: 「受害者」是因惡劣行為而受傷的人。
Example: I was a victim of a robbery.
Example_Translation: 我是搶劫案的受害者。

Meaning: An ancestor is a family member from the past.
Meaning_Translation: 「祖先」是過去的家族成員。
Example: My ancestors came from Germany.
Example_Translation: 我的祖先來自德國。

Meaning: An angle is the direction from which something is looked at.
Meaning_Translation: 「角度」是觀察某物的方向。
Example: The giraffe turned its head to see from another angle.
Example_Translation: 長頸鹿轉頭從另一個角度觀看。

Meaning: A boot is a heavy shoe that goes up above a person’s ankle.
Meaning_Translation: 「靴子」是蓋過腳踝的厚重鞋子。
Example: He wore boots so that his feet wouldn’t get wet.
Example_Translation: 他穿靴子以免腳弄濕。

Meaning: A border is the edge of an area.
Meaning_Translation: 「邊界」是區域的邊緣。
Example: The postcard had a pretty green border of pine needles.
Example_Translation: 明信片有漂亮的松針綠色邊框。

Meaning: To congratulate someone is to tell them that you are happy for them.
Meaning_Translation: 「恭喜」是指告訴某人你為他們感到開心。
Example: Bill and Angela congratulated each other on a job well done.
Example_Translation: 比爾和安琪拉互相恭喜任務完成得好。

Meaning: A frame is a border for a picture or mirror.
Meaning_Translation: 「框」是圖片或鏡子的邊框。
Example: I have to get a frame for my friend’s picture.
Example_Translation: 我得為朋友的照片買個相框。

Meaning: Heaven is the place that some believe people go to after they die.
Meaning_Translation: 「天堂」是某些人相信人死後去的地方。
Example: When I die, I hope that I go to heaven.
Example_Translation: 我希望死後能上天堂。

Meaning: An incredible thing is so amazing that it is hard to believe.
Meaning_Translation: 「難以置信的」事物令人驚奇到難以相信。
Example: I have an incredible story to tell you about my vacation.
Example_Translation: 我有個不可思議的度假故事要告訴你。

Meaning: A legend is a story from the past.
Meaning_Translation: 「傳說」是來自過去的故事。
Example: There is a well-known legend about a king and his queen.
Example_Translation: 有個著名的傳說關於國王和王后。

Meaning: To praise is to show that you like someone or something.
Meaning_Translation: 「讚美」是指表示喜歡某人或某物。
Example: The coach praised the athletes after a good practice.
Example_Translation: 教練在訓練後讚美運動員。

Meaning: To proceed is to go somewhere or to continue doing something.
Meaning_Translation: 「繼續」是指前往某地或持續做某事。
Example: My son and I proceeded to the beach so we could go fishing.
Example_Translation: 我和兒子前往海邊釣魚。

Meaning: A pure thing is very clear and beautiful.
Meaning_Translation: 「純淨的」事物非常清澈美麗。
Example: The rose was pure. It had no dirt or imperfections.
Example_Translation: 這朵玫瑰很純淨，沒有污垢或瑕疵。

Meaning: A relative is a family member.
Meaning_Translation: 「親戚」是家族成員。
Example: My relatives came by to see the new baby.
Example_Translation: 親戚來看新生兒。

Meaning: A senior person is older or more experienced.
Meaning_Translation: 「年長的」人是年紀較大或經驗較豐富的。
Example: Because he got his job first, Bob is the senior chef.
Example_Translation: 因為他先進公司，鮑伯是資深主廚。

Meaning: A silent person or thing makes no sound.
Meaning_Translation: 「安靜的」人或物不發出聲音。
Example: Since no one was home, the house was silent.
Example_Translation: 沒人在家，屋子很安靜。

Meaning: To sink into something is to slowly fall into it.
Meaning_Translation: 「沉入」是指緩慢落入某物中。
Example: The boat had a hole in it, and it sank into the ocean.
Example_Translation: 船上有個洞，沉入大海。

Meaning: A superior person or thing is better than another.
Meaning_Translation: 「優越的」人或物比另一個更好。
Example: I think cooking outdoors is superior to cooking indoors.
Example_Translation: 我覺得戶外烹飪比室內好。

Meaning: To surround something is to close in on it from all sides.
Meaning_Translation: 「包圍」是指從各方向靠近某物。
Example: We surrounded the suspect on all four sides.
Example_Translation: 我們從四面包圍嫌犯。

Meaning: A thick thing is wide and solid.
Meaning_Translation: 「厚的」事物寬且堅實。
Example: The fog was so thick that I couldn’t see through it.
Example_Translation: 霧太濃，我什麼都看不見。

Meaning: To wrap is to cover something on all sides.
Meaning_Translation: 「包裝」是指從各面覆蓋某物。
Example: I wrapped his gift and put a bow on it.
Example_Translation: 我包好他的禮物並繫上蝴蝶結。

Meaning: Also means in addition to or too.
Meaning_Translation: 「也」是指此外或同樣地。
Example: I like blue, and I also like yellow.
Example_Translation: 我喜歡藍色，也喜歡黃色。

Meaning: If an action happens automatically, it happens without thinking or planning.
Meaning_Translation: 「自動地」是指行動未經思考或計畫就發生。
Example: The man automatically smiled when he thought about his friend.
Example_Translation: 他想到朋友就自動微笑。

Meaning: A busy person has a lot of things to do.
Meaning_Translation: 「忙碌的」人有很多事要做。
Example: Everyone is busy at the office today.
Example_Translation: 今天辦公室每個人都很忙。

Meaning: Can shows that a person or thing has the ability to do an action.
Meaning_Translation: 「能」表示人或物有能力做某事。
Example: Sad news can make her cry.
Example_Translation: 壞消息會讓她哭。

Meaning: To clear is to remove everything from a place.
Meaning_Translation: 「清理」是指從某地移除所有東西。
Example: I need to clear my desk because it is too messy.
Example_Translation: 我得整理桌面，因為太亂了。

Meaning: To close is to shut something or cover up an opening.
Meaning_Translation: 「關閉」是指關上某物或遮蓋開口。
Example: The man wanted to close the door tightly.
Example_Translation: 這男人想把門關緊。

Meaning: To discuss is to talk about something with another person.
Meaning_Translation: 「討論」是指與他人談論某事。
Example: James began to discuss his report with his teacher.
Example_Translation: 詹姆斯開始和老師討論報告。

Meaning: To feel is to experience an emotion or feeling.
Meaning_Translation: 「感覺」是指體驗情緒或感受。
Example: The girl must feel happy because it is her birthday today.
Example_Translation: 今天是她生日，她一定很開心。

Meaning: To listen is to pay attention to a sound that you can hear.
Meaning_Translation: 「聆聽」是指專注於你能聽到的聲音。
Example: Lisa wanted to listen carefully to her friend.
Example_Translation: 麗莎想仔細聽朋友說話。

Meaning: To meet is to come together so that you can talk or do something together.
Meaning_Translation: 「見面」是指聚在一起以便交談或共同做事。
Example: Ken’s mother wanted to meet his teacher today.
Example_Translation: 肯的媽媽今天想見他的老師。

Meaning: Music is the sound made by singing or playing musical instruments.
Meaning_Translation: 「音樂」是唱歌或演奏樂器所產生的聲音。
Example: The boy makes music by playing a guitar.
Example_Translation: 男孩彈吉他演奏音樂。

Meaning: A normal thing is usual and not strange.
Meaning_Translation: 「正常的」事物是平常而不奇怪的。
Example: It is normal to wear school uniforms in private schools.
Example_Translation: 私立學校穿制服很正常。

Meaning: If something is quiet, it does not make much sound.
Meaning_Translation: 「安靜的」事物不會發出太多聲音。
Example: The man told the children to be quiet.
Example_Translation: 男人叫孩子們安靜。

Meaning: To relax is to rest or do something enjoyable.
Meaning_Translation: 「放鬆」是指休息或做些愉快的事。
Example: Nicole likes to relax by reading books.
Example_Translation: 妮可喜歡看書放鬆。

Meaning: To sleep is to rest your mind and body, usually at night in bed.
Meaning_Translation: 「睡覺」是指讓身心休息，通常在夜間床上進行。
Example: The child goes to sleep in her bedroom at night.
Example_Translation: 孩子晚上在臥室睡覺。

Meaning: Stress is a strong feeling of worry caused by problems in life, work, etc.
Meaning_Translation: 「壓力」是因生活、工作等問題引起的強烈擔憂感。
Example: Dan has a lot of stress at work.
Example_Translation: 丹工作壓力很大。

Meaning: To study is to learn something by reading, memorizing, or going to school.
Meaning_Translation: 「學習」是指透過閱讀、記憶或上學來獲取知識。
Example: The woman needed a quiet place to study for a big test.
Example_Translation: 這女人需要安靜的地方準備大考。

Meaning: To talk is to say words to express your thoughts, opinions, etc.
Meaning_Translation: 「說話」是指用言語表達想法、意見等。
Example: They went someplace to talk to each other.
Example_Translation: 他們去某處談話。

Meaning: To work is to do a job that you get paid for.
Meaning_Translation: 「工作」是指從事有薪職務。
Example: They need to work together to finish an important project.
Example_Translation: 他們需要合作完成重要專案。

Meaning: To write is to use a pen or keyboard to make letters and numbers on paper or a screen.
Meaning_Translation: 「寫作」是指用筆或鍵盤在紙上或螢幕上寫出文字與數字。
Example: I need to write a story for my homework.
Example_Translation: 我得寫一篇故事當功課。

Meaning: The basis of something is the main part of amount of it.
Meaning_Translation: 「基礎」是某物的主要部分或數量。
Example: My grandfather gets his hearing checked on a yearly basis.
Example_Translation: 我爺爺每年定期檢查聽力。

Meaning: Biology is the study of living things.
Meaning_Translation: 「生物學」是對生物的研究。
Example: We learned about the human heart in biology class.
Example_Translation: 我們在生物課學了人類心臟。

Meaning: A cage is something that holds an animal so it cannot leave.
Meaning_Translation: 「籠子」是關住動物使其無法離開的容器。
Example: We put the parrots in their cage at night.
Example_Translation: 我們晚上把鸚鵡關進籠子。

Meaning: A colleague is somebody you work with.
Meaning_Translation: 「同事」是與你一起工作的人。
Example: My colleague helped me finish the job.
Example_Translation: 同事幫我完成工作。

Meaning: A colony is a country controlled by another country.
Meaning_Translation: 「殖民地」是受另一國控制的地區。
Example: The USA was at one time a colony of Great Britain.
Example_Translation: 美國曾是英國的殖民地。

Meaning: To debate is to seriously discuss something with someone.
Meaning_Translation: 「辯論」是指與他人嚴肅討論某事。
Example: The husband and wife debated which TV to buy.
Example_Translation: 夫妻倆辯論要買哪台電視。

Meaning: To depart is to leave some place so you can go to another place.
Meaning_Translation: 「出發」是指離開某地前往另一地。
Example: The plane departed for Italy at 3:00 this afternoon.
Example_Translation: 飛機今天下午三點飛往義大利。

Meaning: To depress someone is to make that person sad.
Meaning_Translation: 「使沮喪」是指讓某人感到悲傷。
Example: The bad news from work depressed the man.
Example_Translation: 工作上的壞消息讓這男人心情低落。

Meaning: A factual report or message includes true details.
Meaning_Translation: 「事實的」報告或訊息包含真實的細節。
Example: John learns about history from factual books.
Example_Translation: 約翰從事實性書籍學習歷史。

Meaning: To fascinate someone is to make that person very interested.
Meaning_Translation: 「迷住」某人是指讓那個人非常感興趣。
Example: The kitten was fascinated by the ball of yarn.
Example_Translation: 小貓被毛線球迷住了。

Meaning: A mission is an important job that is sometimes far away.
Meaning_Translation: 「任務」是一項重要的工作，有時在很遠的地方進行。
Example: The woman’s mission was to help sick people.
Example_Translation: 這女人的使命是幫助病人。

Meaning: Nevertheless shows a difference to what is expected or known.
Meaning_Translation: 「然而」表示與預期或已知情況不同。
Example: He is usually friendly. Nevertheless, he wasn’t friendly this afternoon.
Example_Translation: 他通常很友善，但今天下午卻不然。

Meaning: An occupation is a person’s job.
Meaning_Translation: 「職業」是一個人的工作。
Example: My father’s occupation is a dentist.
Example_Translation: 我爸的職業是牙醫。

Meaning: Overseas shows an action happens in another country, across an ocean.
Meaning_Translation: 「海外」表示某行動發生在另一個國家，通常隔著海洋。
Example: John often goes overseas for vacations.
Example_Translation: 約翰常去海外度假。

Meaning: To persuade someone is to make that person agree to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「說服」某人是指讓那個人同意做某事。
Example: The children persuaded their parents to buy them gifts.
Example_Translation: 孩子們說服父母買禮物給他們。

Meaning: A route is the way you go from one place to another.
Meaning_Translation: 「路線」是從一個地方到另一個地方所走的路。
Example: I saw many new houses along the route to the city.
Example_Translation: 去城市的路上我看到很多新房子。

Meaning: Ruins are old buildings that are not used anymore.
Meaning_Translation: 「廢墟」是不再使用的古老建築。
Example: I visited some interesting ruins in Greece.
Example_Translation: 我參觀了希臘一些有趣的遺跡。

Meaning: A scholar is a person who studies something and knows a lot about it.
Meaning_Translation: 「學者」是研究某領域並對其了解很多的人。
Example: The scholar knew much about art history.
Example_Translation: 這位學者很懂藝術史。

Meaning: A significant person or thing is important.
Meaning_Translation: 「重要的」人或事物具有重大意義。
Example: I read many significant novels as a literature major in university.
Example_Translation: 我大學主修文學，讀了很多重要小說。

Meaning: A volcano is a mountain with a hole on top where hot liquid comes out.
Meaning_Translation: 「火山」是一座山頂有洞、會噴出熾熱液體的山。
Example: When the volcano erupted, smoke and heat filled the air.
Example_Translation: 火山爆發時，煙霧和熱氣充滿空中。

Meaning: Broad means that something is wide, not narrow.
Meaning_Translation: 「寬闊的」意思是某物很寬，不狹窄。
Example: The river is very long and broad.
Example_Translation: 這條河又長又寬。

Meaning: A bush is a woody plant that is smaller than a tree.
Meaning_Translation: 「灌木」是一種比樹小的木本植物。
Example: My dad and I planted some small bushes around the house.
Example_Translation: 我和爸爸在房子周圍種了些灌木。

Meaning: A capable person or thing can do an action.
Meaning_Translation: 「有能力的」人或事物能完成某項行動。
Example: The Olympic athlete is capable of lifting a lot of weight.
Example_Translation: 奧運選手能舉起很重的重量。

Meaning: To cheat is to be dishonest in order to win or do well.
Meaning_Translation: 「作弊」是為了獲勝或表現好而做出不誠實的行為。
Example: They cheated on the test by sharing answers.
Example_Translation: 他們考試作弊，互相抄答案。

Meaning: To concentrate is to give one’s full attention to something.
Meaning_Translation: 「專注」是指把全部注意力放在某件事上。
Example: I could not concentrate on my homework because the room was so loud.
Example_Translation: 房間太吵，我無法專心寫功課。

Meaning: To conclude is to arrive at a logical end by looking at evidence.
Meaning_Translation: 「得出結論」是指根據證據得到合乎邏輯的結果。
Example: I saw crumbs on my dog’s face, so I concluded that he ate my cookie.
Example_Translation: 我看到狗臉上有餅乾屑，推斷牠吃了我的餅乾。

Meaning: Confident people believe that they can do something without failing.
Meaning_Translation: 「自信的」人相信自己能成功完成某事而不失敗。
Example: She was confident she could climb the mountain due to her training.
Example_Translation: 她因訓練有素，自信能登上山頂。

Meaning: Considerable means large in size, amount, or extent.
Meaning_Translation: 「相當大的」指在大小、數量或範圍上很大。
Example: They paid a considerable amount of money for that car.
Example_Translation: 他們花了不少錢買那輛車。

Meaning: To convey is to communicate or make ideas known.
Meaning_Translation: 「傳達」是指溝通或讓人知道想法。
Example: That picture of a crying child conveys a feeling of sadness.
Example_Translation: 那張哭泣小孩的照片傳達出悲傷情緒。

Meaning: A definite thing is certain or sure to be true.
Meaning_Translation: 「明確的」事物是確定或肯定為真的。
Example: There is a definite connection between hard work and success.
Example_Translation: 努力和成功之間有明確關聯。

Meaning: Delight is a feeling of being very happy with something.
Meaning_Translation: 「喜悅」是對某事感到非常開心的感覺。
Example: He felt such delight after getting a promotion at work.
Example_Translation: 他升職後感到非常開心。

Meaning: A destination is the place where someone or something is going.
Meaning_Translation: 「目的地」是某人或某物要去的地方。
Example: The destination of this plane is Munich, Germany.
Example_Translation: 這班飛機的目的地是德國慕尼黑。

Meaning: The edge is the furthest part or side of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「邊緣」是某物最外側的部分。
Example: He ran to the edge of the cliff.
Example_Translation: 他跑到懸崖邊。

Meaning: A set of instructions explains how to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「指示」是一組說明如何做某事的步驟。
Example: Just follow the instructions and you will be OK.
Example_Translation: 只要照指示做就沒問題。

Meaning: A path is a way from one place to another that people can walk along.
Meaning_Translation: 「小徑」是人們可以行走、連接兩地的路。
Example: We followed a path through the woods.
Example_Translation: 我們沿著小徑穿過樹林。

Meaning: To resort to something is to depend on it in order to solve a problem.
Meaning_Translation: 「訴諸」某事是指依靠它來解決問題。
Example: I hope they don’t resort to violence to end the argument.
Example_Translation: 希望他們不要訴諸暴力解決爭執。

Meaning: A shadow is the dark area that is made when something blocks light.
Meaning_Translation: 「影子」是某物擋住光線時形成的暗區。
Example: The man’s shadow was taller than he was.
Example_Translation: 這男人的影子比他本人高。

Meaning: To succeed is to complete something as planned.
Meaning_Translation: 「成功」是指按計畫完成某事。
Example: He will continue to work on the robot until he succeeds.
Example_Translation: 他會繼續研究機器人直到成功。

Meaning: To suspect something is to believe that it might be true.
Meaning_Translation: 「懷疑」某事是指認為它可能是真的。
Example: I suspect that those kids stole the money.
Example_Translation: 我懷疑那些孩子偷了錢。

Meaning: A valley is a low area of land between two mountains or hills.
Meaning_Translation: 「山谷」是兩座山或丘陵之間的低窪地帶。
Example: We looked at the valley below from the top of the mountain.
Example_Translation: 我們從山頂俯瞰下方的山谷。

Meaning: To be against something is to be touching it or opposed to it.
Meaning_Translation: 「靠著」某物是指與之接觸；「反對」則表示不贊成。
Example: They both leaned against the wall.
Example_Translation: 他們都靠在牆上。

Meaning: The beach is a sandy or rocky place by the ocean.
Meaning_Translation: 「海灘」是海洋旁的沙地或岩石地。
Example: The little girl built a sandcastle on the beach.
Example_Translation: 小女孩在海灘堆沙堡。

Meaning: To damage something is to break it.
Meaning_Translation: 「損壞」某物是指把它弄壞。
Example: The car was damaged in the accident.
Example_Translation: 車子在事故中受損。

Meaning: To discover something is to find it for the first time.
Meaning_Translation: 「發現」某物是指第一次找到它。
Example: I discovered some new information in this book.
Example_Translation: 我在這本書發現新資訊。

Meaning: An emotion is how you feel.
Meaning_Translation: 「情緒」是你內心的感受。
Example: Anger is a common emotion that we all feel.
Example_Translation: 憤怒是我們都會有的常見情緒。

Meaning: To fix something is to make it work.
Meaning_Translation: 「修理」某物是指讓它恢復正常運作。
Example: My dad has many tools to help him fix broken things.
Example_Translation: 我爸有很多工具修理壞東西。

Meaning: To identify something is to find out what it is.
Meaning_Translation: 「辨認」某物是指弄清楚它是什麼。
Example: I used the file to identify his name.
Example_Translation: 我用檔案確認他的名字。

Meaning: An island is land in the middle of water.
Meaning_Translation: 「島嶼」是被水包圍的陸地。
Example: Japan is a group of islands.
Example_Translation: 日本是由群島組成。

Meaning: The ocean is all of the salt water that surrounds land.
Meaning_Translation: 「海洋」是環繞陸地的所有鹹水。
Example: The ocean can make powerful waves.
Example_Translation: 海洋能掀起巨浪。

Meaning: Perhaps is used when you say that something could happen.
Meaning_Translation: 「也許」用於表示某事可能發生。
Example: Perhaps I will eat an apple for lunch.
Example_Translation: 也許我午餐吃蘋果。

Meaning: If something is pleasant, you enjoy it.
Meaning_Translation: 「愉快的」事物會讓人感到享受。
Example: The character had a pleasant look on its face.
Example_Translation: 這角色臉上表情愉快。

Meaning: To prevent something is to stop it from happening.
Meaning_Translation: 「防止」某事是指阻止它發生。
Example: The handcuffs prevented me from moving my hands.
Example_Translation: 手銬阻止我移動雙手。

Meaning: A rock is a hard thing in the dirt.
Meaning_Translation: 「岩石」是泥土中堅硬的東西。
Example: I stacked rocks on top of one another.
Example_Translation: 我把石頭疊起來。

Meaning: To save something is to keep it from being hurt.
Meaning_Translation: 「拯救」某物是指保護它免受傷害。
Example: I want to help save the world.
Example_Translation: 我想幫忙拯救世界。

Meaning: To smile is to show happiness with your mouth.
Meaning_Translation: 「微笑」是用嘴巴表現快樂。
Example: The baby smiled at me.
Example_Translation: 嬰兒對我微笑。

Meaning: To step is to walk.
Meaning_Translation: 「踏步」就是走路。
Example: Be careful where you step.
Example_Translation: 小心你踩的地方。

Meaning: Still is used when you say that a situation keeps going on.
Meaning_Translation: 「仍然」用於表示某情況持續進行。
Example: They are still waiting in line to get tickets.
Example_Translation: 他們還在排隊買票。

Meaning: A taste is the flavor something makes in your mouth.
Meaning_Translation: 「味道」是某物在口中產生的風味。
Example: The taste of the fruit was sweet.
Example_Translation: 這水果味道很甜。

Meaning: To throw something is to use your hand to make it go through the air.
Meaning_Translation: 「投擲」某物是指用手讓它飛過空中。
Example: The pitcher can throw the baseball very fast.
Example_Translation: 投手能快速投出棒球。

Meaning: A wave is a line of water that moves higher than the rest of the water.
Meaning_Translation: 「海浪」是比其他水面更高的移動水線。
Example: The water was filled with large blue waves.
Example_Translation: 水面充滿巨大的藍色波浪。

Meaning: A citizen is someone who lives in a certain place.
Meaning_Translation: 「公民」是居住在某個地方的人。
Example: Carlos was born in Spain. He is a Spanish citizen.
Example_Translation: 卡洛斯出生於西班牙，是西班牙公民。

Meaning: A council is a group of people who run a city or town.
Meaning_Translation: 「議會」是一群管理城市或城鎮的人。
Example: The council met to discuss the new laws for the city.
Example_Translation: 議會開會討論城市新法規。

Meaning: To declare is to say something officially.
Meaning_Translation: 「宣布」是指正式地說出某事。
Example: I declared my love for him.
Example_Translation: 我向他表白愛意。

Meaning: Enormous people or things are very large.
Meaning_Translation: 「巨大的」人或事物非常大。
Example: My dog looks enormous next to yours.
Example_Translation: 我的狗跟你的一比顯得巨大。

Meaning: Extraordinary things are amazing.
Meaning_Translation: 「非凡的」事物令人驚嘆。
Example: The fireman who rescued the girl was extraordinary.
Example_Translation: 救出女孩的消防員非常英勇。

Meaning: Fog is a thick cloud that is near the ground or water.
Meaning_Translation: 「霧」是靠近地面或水面的濃厚雲氣。
Example: I did not want to drive in the thick fog.
Example_Translation: 我不想在濃霧中開車。

Meaning: A funeral is a ceremony that takes place after a person dies.
Meaning_Translation: 「葬禮」是在人死後舉行的儀式。
Example: They had a funeral for the soldier who died during the war.
Example_Translation: 他們為戰爭中陣亡的士兵舉辦葬禮。

Meaning: Giant means very big.
Meaning_Translation: 「巨大的」意思是非常大。
Example: The giant truck got in my way.
Example_Translation: 巨型卡車擋住我的路。

Meaning: An impression is the way of thinking about someone or something.
Meaning_Translation: 「印象」是對某人或某事的看法。
Example: Most people’s first impression of Dr. Giani is that he is mean.
Example_Translation: 多數人對吉安尼醫生的第一印象是他很兇。

Meaning: An intention is what a person plans to do.
Meaning_Translation: 「意圖」是某人打算做的事。
Example: Do you have good intentions?
Example_Translation: 你有善意嗎？

Meaning: A mad person or animal is angry.
Meaning_Translation: 「生氣的」人或動物很憤怒。
Example: Mother got mad when I didn’t listen to her.
Example_Translation: 我不聽話時，媽媽生氣了。

Meaning: If you ought to do an action, it is the right thing to do.
Meaning_Translation: 「應該」做某事表示那是正確的事。
Example: I ought to take my library books back.
Example_Translation: 我該把圖書館的書還回去。

Meaning: To resist something is to fight against it.
Meaning_Translation: 「抵抗」某事是指與之對抗。
Example: He resisted the treatment at the hospital.
Example_Translation: 他抗拒醫院的治療。

Meaning: To reveal is to show something.
Meaning_Translation: 「揭露」是指展示某事。
Example: I will reveal where I hid the candy bar.
Example_Translation: 我會透露我把巧克力棒藏在哪裡。

Meaning: To rid is to make a place free from something or someone.
Meaning_Translation: 「擺脫」是指讓某地不再有某物或某人。
Example: We rid our home of mice by using traps.
Example_Translation: 我們用捕鼠器清除家裡的老鼠。

Meaning: A sword is a long sharp weapon.
Meaning_Translation: 「劍」是一種長而鋒利的武器。
Example: They used to use swords in battles in ancient times.
Example_Translation: 古人打仗時用劍。

Meaning: A tale is a story.
Meaning_Translation: 「故事」是一則敘述。
Example: She told her two friends about the wild tale of her day.
Example_Translation: 她告訴兩個朋友她今天瘋狂的經歷。

Meaning: To trap people or animals is to capture them so they cannot get away.
Meaning_Translation: 「設陷阱捕捉」人或動物是指抓住他們使其無法逃脫。
Example: We trapped butterflies in a net.
Example_Translation: 我們用網子捕捉蝴蝶。

Meaning: A trial is the way a court discovers if a person is guilty or innocent.
Meaning_Translation: 「審判」是法庭判斷某人有罪或無罪的過程。
Example: He went on trial for robbing the bank.
Example_Translation: 他因搶銀行而受審。

Meaning: A violent person or animal uses force to hurt others.
Meaning_Translation: 「暴力的」人或動物會用武力傷害他人。
Example: The man was put into jail because he was violent.
Example_Translation: 這男人因暴力行為被關進監獄。

Meaning: Admission is the act of allowing to enter a place.
Meaning_Translation: 「入場」是指允許進入某地的行為。
Example: The admission ticket to the movie was $5.
Example_Translation: 電影門票五美元。

Meaning: Astronomy is the study of the stars and planets.
Meaning_Translation: 「天文學」是研究恆星和行星的學科。
Example: Harold loved looking at the stars, so he decided to study astronomy.
Example_Translation: 哈羅德喜歡看星星，決定學天文學。

Meaning: To blame someone for something bad is to say they did it.
Meaning_Translation: 「責怪」某人做壞事是指說是他們做的。
Example: My mom blamed me for something I didn’t do.
Example_Translation: 我媽怪我做了沒做的事。

Meaning: Chemistry is the study of substances and reactions between them.
Meaning_Translation: 「化學」是研究物質及其反應的學科。
Example: In chemistry class, the professor taught us about chemical reactions.
Example_Translation: 化學課上，教授教我們化學反應。

Meaning: Despite shows a difference from what is expected.
Meaning_Translation: 「儘管」表示與預期情況不同。
Example: We still played the game despite the cold weather.
Example_Translation: 儘管天氣冷，我們還是玩了遊戲。

Meaning: A dinosaur is a very big animal that lived millions of years ago.
Meaning_Translation: 「恐龍」是數百萬年前生活過的巨大動物。
Example: I like to see the dinosaur bones at the museum.
Example_Translation: 我喜歡在博物館看恐龍骨頭。

Meaning: To exhibit is to show something so that people can go look at it.
Meaning_Translation: 「展出」是指展示某物供人觀看。
Example: My painting will be exhibited at the fair.
Example_Translation: 我的畫會在博覽會展出。

Meaning: Fame is a reputation one has gained among the public.
Meaning_Translation: 「名聲」是公眾對某人的評價。
Example: He had fame and fortune, but he was not happy.
Example_Translation: 他有名又有錢，但並不快樂。

Meaning: A forecast is an idea about what the weather will be like in the future.
Meaning_Translation: 「預報」是對未來天氣的預測。
Example: The forecast says that it will rain all week.
Example_Translation: 預報說這週都會下雨。

Meaning: A genius is a very smart person.
Meaning_Translation: 「天才」是非常聰明的人。
Example: Since she was a genius, she easily passed all of her school exams.
Example_Translation: 她是天才，輕鬆通過所有考試。

Meaning: Someone who is gentle is kind and calm.
Meaning_Translation: 「溫柔的」人善良且平靜。
Example: He is very gentle with the baby.
Example_Translation: 他對嬰兒很溫柔。

Meaning: Geography is the study of the Earth, its land, weather, etc.
Meaning_Translation: 「地理學」是研究地球、陸地、天氣等的學科。
Example: I had to draw a map for geography class.
Example_Translation: 我得為地理課畫地圖。

Meaning: To interfere is to cause problems and keep something from happening.
Meaning_Translation: 「干涉」是指製造問題並阻止某事發生。
Example: My little sister always interferes when I’m trying to study.
Example_Translation: 我妹妹總在我讀書時打擾我。

Meaning: To do something lightly is to not push very hard.
Meaning_Translation: 「輕輕地」做某事是指不用太大力。
Example: Draw lightly so you do not tear your paper.
Example_Translation: 輕輕畫，以免撕破紙。

Meaning: A principal is a person in charge of a school.
Meaning_Translation: 「校長」是負責學校的人。
Example: My school’s principal can be very strict with the rules.
Example_Translation: 我們校長對校規很嚴格。

Meaning: A row is a line of things.
Meaning_Translation: 「一排」是一列排列的東西。
Example: James put all of his toy soldiers into neat rows.
Example_Translation: 詹姆斯把玩具兵排成整齊的行列。

Meaning: A shelf is a place on a wall where you put things.
Meaning_Translation: 「架子」是牆上用來放置物品的地方。
Example: I keep my clothes on a shelf in my closet.
Example_Translation: 我把衣服放在衣櫃的架子上。

Meaning: Spite is the desire to be mean.
Meaning_Translation: 「惡意」是想對人刻薄的慾望。
Example: He snuck into his sister’s room and stole her bag out of spite.
Example_Translation: 他出於惡意偷偷進妹妹房間偷走她的包包。

Meaning: Super means really good.
Meaning_Translation: 「超棒的」意思是真的很棒。
Example: My dad said I did a super job cleaning the house.
Example_Translation: 我爸說我打掃房子做得超棒。

Meaning: A wet thing has water on it.
Meaning_Translation: 「濕的」東西上面有水。
Example: Since my dog was wet, he tried to shake all the water off his body.
Example_Translation: 我的狗濕了，試著甩掉身上的水。

Meaning: To abuse means to hurt someone or something on purpose.
Meaning_Translation: 「虐待」是指故意傷害某人或某物。
Example: The mean man abused his dog when it barked too loudly.
Example_Translation: 這壞人因狗叫太大聲而虐待牠。

Meaning: To afford something means to have enough money to pay for it.
Meaning_Translation: 「負擔得起」某物是指有足夠錢支付。
Example: I’ve been saving my money so I can afford to buy a new bike.
Example_Translation: 我省錢是為了買新腳踏車。

Meaning: To bake means to cook food in an oven.
Meaning_Translation: 「烘烤」是指在烤箱中烹煮食物。
Example: My sister is a good cook. She bakes delicious cakes.
Example_Translation: 我妹妹廚藝很好，會烤美味蛋糕。

Meaning: A bean is a plant seed that is good to eat.
Meaning_Translation: 「豆子」是一種可食用的植物種子。
Example: There are many different kinds of beans to eat.
Example_Translation: 有很多種豆子可以吃。

Meaning: A candle is a stick of wax that is lit on fire for light or heat.
Meaning_Translation: 「蠟燭」是一根點燃後可用來照明或取暖的蠟棒。
Example: When the lights went out, we lit some candles.
Example_Translation: 停電時我們點了蠟燭。

Meaning: To convert something means to change it into something else.
Meaning_Translation: 「轉換」某物是指把它變成別的東西。
Example: The man converted his messy field into a garden of flowers.
Example_Translation: 這男人把雜亂的田地改造成花園。

Meaning: A debt is an amount of money that a person owes.
Meaning_Translation: 「債務」是某人欠下的金額。
Example: I have not paid my gas bill. I owe a debt to the gas company.
Example_Translation: 我還沒付瓦斯費，欠瓦斯公司錢。

Meaning: To decrease something is to make it less than it was before.
Meaning_Translation: 「減少」某物是指讓它比以前少。
Example: Hiring more police officers has decreased crime in the city.
Example_Translation: 增加警力降低了城市犯罪率。

Meaning: A fault is responsibility for a mistake.
Meaning_Translation: 「過錯」是對錯誤的責任。
Example: It is my fault that the cat ran away. I left the door open.
Example_Translation: 貓跑掉是我的錯，我沒關門。

Meaning: A fund is an amount of money that people have.
Meaning_Translation: 「基金」是一筆人們擁有的資金。
Example: We all put money into our club’s fund.
Example_Translation: 我們都把錢投入社團基金。

Meaning: A generous person likes to give things to people.
Meaning_Translation: 「慷慨的」人喜歡把東西送給別人。
Example: The generous man donated several new computers to our school.
Example_Translation: 這位慷慨的人捐贈幾台新電腦給我們學校。

Meaning: An ingredient is something that is part of a food dish.
Meaning_Translation: 「食材」是構成一道菜的一部分。
Example: The main ingredients in cake are eggs, sugar, and flour.
Example_Translation: 蛋糕的主要原料是蛋、糖和麵粉。

Meaning: To insist means to be firm in telling people what to do.
Meaning_Translation: 「堅持」是指堅決地告訴別人該做什麼。
Example: I insist that you try some of these cookies.
Example_Translation: 我堅持要你試試這些餅乾。

Meaning: A mess is a condition that is not clean or neat.
Meaning_Translation: 「混亂」是不乾淨或不整齊的狀態。
Example: Heather’s room was a complete mess.
Example_Translation: 海瑟的房間亂七八糟。

Meaning: Metal is a strong material people use to build things.
Meaning_Translation: 「金屬」是一種人們用來建造東西的堅固材料。
Example: Steel is a common metal that is used to build buildings.
Example_Translation: 鋼鐵是常用來蓋建築的金屬。

Meaning: To monitor people or things is to watch them closely.
Meaning_Translation: 「監控」人或事物是指密切觀察他們。
Example: The teacher monitors the students when they take tests.
Example_Translation: 老師監考學生考試。

Meaning: To oppose something means to dislike it or act against it.
Meaning_Translation: 「反對」某事是指不喜歡或採取行動對抗。
Example: I want to be a police officer because I oppose crime.
Example_Translation: 我想當警察，因為我反對犯罪。

Meaning: A passive person does not take action to solve problems.
Meaning_Translation: 「被動的」人不會主動解決問題。
Example: Marcie is so passive that she never solves her own problems.
Example_Translation: 瑪西太被動，從不自己解決問題。

Meaning: A quantity is a certain amount of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「數量」是某物的特定份量。
Example: I have a small quantity of milk in my glass.
Example_Translation: 我杯裡牛奶不多。

Meaning: To sue is to take someone to court for some harmful action.
Meaning_Translation: 「起訴」是指因某人造成傷害而告上法院。
Example: I sued the company after I slipped on a banana peel in their hallway.
Example_Translation: 我在他們走廊踩到香蕉皮滑倒，於是告了公司。

Meaning: Something adequate is good enough.
Meaning_Translation: 「足夠的」東西是夠好的。
Example: This is adequate for my needs.
Example_Translation: 這對我來說夠用了。

Meaning: Anxiety is a feeling of worry and fear.
Meaning_Translation: 「焦慮」是擔憂和害怕的感覺。
Example: When I have to climb to high places, I’m filled with anxiety.
Example_Translation: 我爬高時會非常焦慮。

Meaning: An army is a large group of people who fight in wars.
Meaning_Translation: 「軍隊」是一大群參加戰爭的人。
Example: The army protects all the people in the country.
Example_Translation: 軍隊保護全國人民。

Meaning: A billion is a very large number: 1,000,000,000.
Example: There are billions of stars in outer space.
Example_Translation: 外太空有數十億顆星星。

Meaning: To carve means to cut into something.
Meaning_Translation: 「雕刻」是指在某物上切割。
Example: My father usually carves the turkey for Thanksgiving.
Example_Translation: 我爸通常在感恩節切火雞。

Meaning: To consult means to ask someone for help.
Meaning_Translation: 「諮詢」是指向某人求助。
Example: I will consult my accountant to find a way to pay my bills.
Example_Translation: 我會諮詢會計師，找出付帳單的方法。

Meaning: An emergency is a time when someone needs help right away.
Meaning_Translation: 「緊急情況」是某人需要立即幫助的時候。
Example: There is a huge fire in my house! This is an emergency!
Example_Translation: 我家大火！這是緊急狀況！

Meaning: Fortune means the things that happen but are not controlled by a person.
Meaning_Translation: 「命運」是指發生但不受人控制的事。
Example: I have good fortune when I play cards.
Example_Translation: 我打牌時運氣很好。

Meaning: I will guarantee that the loan will be repaid.
Meaning_Translation: 「保證」是指我承諾貸款會被償還。
Example: I guarantee that the sun will come up in the morning.
Example_Translation: 我保證太陽早上會升起。

Meaning: Initial shows that something is first.
Meaning_Translation: 「最初的」表示某事是第一個。
Example: The initial step when writing a paper is to find a good topic.
Example_Translation: 寫論文的第一步是找好主題。

Meaning: An intense thing is very strong.
Meaning_Translation: 「強烈的」事物非常強勁。
Example: The skunk made an intense odor that filled the air.
Example_Translation: 臭鼬散發出濃烈氣味，瀰漫空中。

Meaning: To lend something is to give it to someone for a short time.
Meaning_Translation: 「借出」某物是指短暫地給別人使用。
Example: My sister lost her pen, so I will lend her mine.
Example_Translation: 我妹妹弄丟筆，我借她我的。

Meaning: The peak is the very top of a mountain.
Meaning_Translation: 「山頂」是山的最高點。
Example: There is snow on the peaks of those mountains.
Example_Translation: 那些山峰上有積雪。

Meaning: Potential means capable of being but not yet actual or real.
Meaning_Translation: 「潛力」是指有能力實現，但尚未成為現實。
Example: I’ve thought of some potential problems with your idea.
Example_Translation: 我想過你這想法可能有幾個問題。

Meaning: Pride is a feeling of happiness about oneself or one’s things.
Meaning_Translation: 「自豪」是對自己或自己所有事物感到開心的感覺。
Example: I take pride in getting good grades.
Example_Translation: 我以拿到好成績為榮。

Meaning: Proof is a fact that shows something is real.
Meaning_Translation: 「證據」是證明某事為真的事實。
Example: They used his fingerprint for proof that he committed the crime.
Example_Translation: 他們用他的指紋證明他犯罪。

Meaning: To quit something means to stop doing it.
Meaning_Translation: 「放棄」某事是指停止做它。
Example: I quit running because I got tired.
Example_Translation: 我因疲累而停止跑步。

Meaning: To spin is to turn around in circles.
Meaning_Translation: 「旋轉」是指繞圈轉動。
Example: The boy kept spinning until he fell down.
Example_Translation: 男孩不停旋轉直到跌倒。

Meaning: A tiny thing is very small.
Meaning_Translation: 「微小的」東西非常小。
Example: A baby’s hand is tiny.
Example_Translation: 嬰兒的手很小。

Meaning: A tutor is someone who gives lessons to one student.
Meaning_Translation: 「家教」是給單一學生上課的人。
Example: My sister is bad at math. So my mother hired a tutor to help her.
Example_Translation: 我妹妹數學不好，所以媽請家教幫她。

Meaning: Apparent means clear or easy to see.
Meaning_Translation: 「明顯的」意思是清楚或容易看見。
Example: Her happiness was apparent from the smile on her face.
Example_Translation: 她臉上的笑容顯露出快樂。

Meaning: A blind person or animal cannot see.
Meaning_Translation: 「失明的」人或動物看不見。
Example: The blind man didn’t see the hole and almost fell in.
Example_Translation: 盲人沒看到洞，差點掉進去。

Meaning: To calculate is to find an answer using math.
Meaning_Translation: 「計算」是指用數學找出答案。
Example: I calculated how much money I would need to buy the car.
Example_Translation: 我計算買車需要多少錢。

Meaning: To chat is to talk with someone.
Meaning_Translation: 「聊天」是指與某人交談。
Example: Even though they were far apart, the couple chatted every day.
Example_Translation: 雖然相隔遙遠，這對情侶每天都聊天。

Meaning: To commit to something is to promise to do it.
Meaning_Translation: 「承諾」某事是指答應去做它。
Example: Seth wanted to go home, but he had committed to finishing the job.
Example_Translation: 賽斯想回家，但他已承諾完成工作。

Meaning: To compose something is to make it from smaller parts.
Meaning_Translation: 「創作」某物是指用較小的部分組成它。
Example: Tony composed his report using many sources of information.
Example_Translation: 東尼用許多資料來源撰寫報告。

Meaning: A dormitory is a school building where students live.
Meaning_Translation: 「宿舍」是學生居住的學校建築。
Example: I will move into the dormitory at the beginning of the school year.
Example_Translation: 我會在學年初搬進宿舍。

Meaning: To exhaust someone is to make that person tired.
Meaning_Translation: 「使筋疲力盡」是指讓人感到疲倦。
Example: John exhausted himself by swimming all day.
Example_Translation: 約翰整天游泳累壞了。

Meaning: A greenhouse is a small glass building that is used to grow plants.
Meaning_Translation: 「溫室」是用來種植植物的小型玻璃建築。
Example: We have a small greenhouse in our backyard where we grow plants.
Example_Translation: 我們後院有個小溫室種植物。

Meaning: To ignore something is to act like you do not see or hear it.
Meaning_Translation: 「忽略」某事是指假裝沒看到或沒聽到。
Example: I ignored the message he was making and kept studying.
Example_Translation: 我忽略他的暗示，繼續讀書。

Meaning: Obvious means clear or easy to see.
Meaning_Translation: 「顯而易見的」意思是清楚或容易看見。
Example: It was obvious that he was tired. He kept falling asleep.
Example_Translation: 他很累是顯而易見的，一直打瞌睡。

Meaning: Physics is a science that deals with energy and how it affects things.
Meaning_Translation: 「物理學」是研究能量及其如何影響事物的科學。
Example: In physics class, we used Newton’s Cradle to learn about energy.
Example_Translation: 物理課我們用牛頓擺學習能量。

Meaning: A portion of something is a part of it.
Meaning_Translation: 「一份」是某物的一部分。
Example: I only ate a small portion of the pizza.
Example_Translation: 我只吃了一小塊披薩。

Meaning: To remind is to tell someone to remember to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「提醒」是指告訴某人記得做某事。
Example: Nick’s dad reminded him to do his homework.
Example_Translation: 尼克的爸爸提醒他寫功課。

Meaning: A secretary is a person who works in an office.
Meaning_Translation: 「秘書」是在辦公室工作的人。
Example: Rebecca asked her secretary to type a report.
Example_Translation: 麗貝卡請秘書打報告。

Meaning: Severe means very bad or serious.
Meaning_Translation: 「嚴重的」意思是極壞或非常嚴重。
Example: After hitting his hand with the hammer, Sam was in severe pain.
Example_Translation: 山姆用槌子敲到手，劇痛不已。

Meaning: A talent is a natural ability to do something well.
Meaning_Translation: 「才華」是天生擅長做某事的能力。
Example: Maria has a talent for playing the piano.
Example_Translation: 瑪麗亞有彈鋼琴的天賦。

Meaning: A thesis is an idea that needs to be proved.
Meaning_Translation: 「論點」是需要被證明的想法。
Example: She did not support her thesis very well.
Example_Translation: 她沒能很好地支持她的論點。

Meaning: A uniform is a piece of clothing worn by people of the same group.
Meaning_Translation: 「制服」是同一群人穿的服裝。
Example: All the members of our marching band wear matching uniforms.
Example_Translation: 我們行進樂隊成員都穿統一制服。

Meaning: Vision is the ability to see.
Meaning_Translation: 「視力」是看見的能力。
Example: The eye doctor tested my vision.
Example_Translation: 眼科醫生檢查我的視力。

Meaning: To absorb a liquid means to take it inside.
Meaning_Translation: 「吸收」液體是指將其吸入內部。
Example: He used a sponge to absorb the water on the floor.
Example_Translation: 他用海綿吸地板上的水。

Meaning: A boss is a person in charge of other people at work.
Meaning_Translation: 「老闆」是在工作中負責其他人的人。
Example: My boss is a nice person.
Example_Translation: 我的老闆人很好。

Meaning: A charitable organization aims to help people.
Meaning_Translation: 「慈善的」組織旨在幫助人們。
Example: I give money each year to a charitable foundation.
Example_Translation: 我每年捐款給慈善基金會。

Meaning: A committee is a group of people who meet together to make decisions.
Meaning_Translation: 「委員會」是一群聚在一起做決定的人。
Example: The school’s committee agreed on a new dress code for students.
Example_Translation: 學校委員會同意學生新服裝規定。

Meaning: A contract is a written agreement between two people.
Meaning_Translation: 「合約」是兩人之間的書面協議。
Example: The woman signed a contract when she bought the house.
Example_Translation: 這女人買房子時簽了合約。

Meaning: A crew is a group of workers.
Meaning_Translation: 「工作團隊」是一群工作者。
Example: My father has a crew that helps him build houses.
Example_Translation: 我爸有個團隊幫他蓋房子。

Meaning: To devote time to something means to spend a lot of time doing it.
Meaning_Translation: 「投入」時間於某事是指花大量時間做它。
Example: She devotes two hours a day to playing the piano.
Example_Translation: 她每天花兩小時彈鋼琴。

Meaning: To dig is to make a hole in the ground.
Meaning_Translation: 「挖掘」是指在地上挖洞。
Example: My dog digs in the yard so he can hide his bones.
Example_Translation: 我的狗在院子挖洞藏骨頭。

Meaning: To dine means to eat dinner.
Meaning_Translation: 「用餐」是指吃晚餐。
Example: The young couple dined at their home.
Example_Translation: 這對年輕夫妻在家用餐。

Meaning: To donate is to give something to a charity or organization.
Meaning_Translation: 「捐贈」是指把東西送給慈善機構或組織。
Example: We donate money to charities every year.
Example_Translation: 我們每年捐款給慈善機構。

Meaning: Double means twice as much or twice as many.
Meaning_Translation: 「雙倍的」意思是兩倍的數量或份量。
Example: I paid almost double the amount for that shirt.
Example_Translation: 我買那件襯衫花了快兩倍的錢。

Meaning: A flavor is the taste of food or drinks.
Meaning_Translation: 「風味」是食物或飲料的味道。
Example: The flavor of the ice cream was very good.
Example_Translation: 這冰淇淋味道很好。

Meaning: A foundation is a group that provides money for research.
Meaning_Translation: 「基金會」是提供研究資金的團體。
Example: The foundation raised money to give scholarships to students.
Example_Translation: 基金會籌款提供學生獎學金。

Meaning: A generation is a group of people who live at the same time.
Meaning_Translation: 「世代」是同時代生活的一群人。
Example: My grandparents are from a different generation than me.
Example_Translation: 我祖父母和我屬於不同世代。

Meaning: A handle is the part of an object people hold while using it.
Meaning_Translation: 「把手」是使用物品時握持的部分。
Example: The pot is very hot, so pick it up by the handle.
Example_Translation: 鍋很燙，要用把手拿。

Meaning: A layer covers over something or is one of several pieces lying on top of each other.
Meaning_Translation: 「層」是覆蓋某物或疊在其他東西上的其中一片。
Example: There was a layer of snow on the tops of the houses this morning.
Example_Translation: 今早屋頂有一層雪。

Meaning: Mud is soft, wet dirt.
Meaning_Translation: 「泥巴」是柔軟潮濕的泥土。
Example: My brother played rugby in the mud. Now, he’s dirty.
Example_Translation: 我哥哥在泥巴裡打橄欖球，現在全身髒兮兮。

Meaning: A smooth thing has no bumps or rough parts.
Meaning_Translation: 「光滑的」東西沒有凸起或粗糙的部分。
Example: The baby’s skin felt very smooth.
Example_Translation: 嬰兒的皮膚摸起來很光滑。

Meaning: Soil is the top layer of land on the Earth.
Meaning_Translation: 「土壤」是地球表面的頂層土地。
Example: The boy planted flowers in the soil and watered them every day.
Example_Translation: 男孩把花種在土壤裡，每天澆水。

Meaning: A unique person or thing is not like others.
Meaning_Translation: 「獨特的」人或事物與其他不同。
Example: Her dog is unique. I’ve never seen one quite like it.
Example_Translation: 她的狗很特別，我從沒見過這樣的。

Meaning: An academy is a special type of school.
Meaning_Translation: 「學院」是一種特殊類型的學校。
Example: There are many courses taught at the academy that I go to.
Example_Translation: 我就讀的學院開設很多課程。

Meaning: If something is ancient, it is very old.
Meaning_Translation: 「古老的」東西非常老舊。
Example: I want to see the ancient buildings in Rome.
Example_Translation: 我想看羅馬的古建築。

Meaning: A board is a flat piece of wood.
Meaning_Translation: 「木板」是一塊扁平的木頭。
Example: The sign was made of a few wooden boards.
Example_Translation: 這標誌由幾塊木板製成。

Meaning: A century is one hundred years.
Meaning_Translation: 「世紀」是一百年。
Example: Our company is celebrating a century of business in London.
Example_Translation: 我們公司在倫敦慶祝百年業務。

Meaning: A clue is a fact or object that helps solve a mystery or crime.
Meaning_Translation: 「線索」是有助於破解謎團或犯罪的事實或物品。
Example: The detective found some clues on the sidewalk.
Example_Translation: 偵探在人行道發現線索。

Meaning: A concert is an event where you listen to people play music.
Meaning_Translation: 「音樂會」是聆聽人們演奏音樂的活動。
Example: I enjoyed the concert last night. The band was very good.
Example_Translation: 我昨晚很享受音樂會，樂團很棒。

Meaning: A county is the largest division of a state in a country.
Meaning_Translation: 「郡」是國家中州的最大行政區劃。
Example: He wanted to represent the citizens of his county.
Example_Translation: 他想代表他郡的居民。

Meaning: A dictionary is a book that tells you what words mean.
Meaning_Translation: 「字典」是告訴你單字意思的書。
Example: I use the dictionary to learn new words.
Example_Translation: 我用字典學新單字。

Meaning: To exist is to be real.
Meaning_Translation: 「存在」是指真實存在。
Example: Do you really think that unicorns ever existed?
Example_Translation: 你真的認為獨角獸存在過嗎？

Meaning: Flat describes something that is level and smooth with no curved parts.
Meaning_Translation: 「平坦的」形容某物水平光滑，沒有彎曲部分。
Example: My parents bought a new flat-screen TV on the weekend.
Example_Translation: 我父母週末買了新平面電視。

Meaning: A gentleman is a nice man.
Meaning_Translation: 「紳士」是個有禮貌的男人。
Example: My grandfather is a kind and helpful gentleman.
Example_Translation: 我爺爺是位善良又樂於助人的紳士。

Meaning: Hidden means not easily noticed or too hard to find.
Meaning_Translation: 「隱藏的」意思是不容易被注意到或很難找到。
Example: The hidden camera recorded everything in the parking lot.
Example_Translation: 隱藏攝影機錄下停車場的一切。

Meaning: Maybe is used to show that something is possible or may be true.
Meaning_Translation: 「也許」用於表示某事可能發生或為真。
Example: If I focus hard enough, maybe I can come up with the right answer.
Example_Translation: 如果我夠專注，或許能找到正確答案。

Meaning: An officer is a leader in the army.
Meaning_Translation: 「軍官」是軍隊中的領導者。
Example: The soldiers followed the orders of the officer.
Example_Translation: 士兵們服從軍官命令。

Meaning: If something is original, it is the first one of that thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「原創的」東西是該事物的第一個。
Example: This is the original painting of the Mona Lisa.
Example_Translation: 這是蒙娜麗莎的原畫。

Meaning: To pound something is to hit it many times with a lot of force.
Meaning_Translation: 「猛擊」某物是指用力多次打它。
Example: He pounded the nail with the hammer.
Example_Translation: 他用槌子敲釘子。

Meaning: A process is the steps to take to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「過程」是完成某事所需的步驟。
Example: Making a cake is a long process.
Example_Translation: 做蛋糕是個漫長的過程。

Meaning: To publish a book is to get it printed and ready to sell.
Meaning_Translation: 「出版」一本書是指將其印刷並準備銷售。
Example: That company publishes daily newspapers.
Example_Translation: 那家公司出版日報。

Meaning: A theater is a building where you watch plays, shows, and movies.
Meaning_Translation: 「劇院」是觀看戲劇、表演和電影的建築。
Example: We went to the theater to see a play.
Example_Translation: 我們去劇院看戲。

Meaning: Wealth is the total of one’s possessions (money, land, etc.).
Meaning_Translation: 「財富」是一個人所有財產（金錢、土地等）的總和。
Example: One of the most important things for some people is wealth.
Example_Translation: 對某些人來說，財富是最重要的事之一。

Meaning: An aim is a goal someone wants to make happen.
Meaning_Translation: 「目標」是某人想要實現的願望。
Example: My aim is to become a helicopter pilot.
Example_Translation: 我的目標是成為直升機飛行員。

Meaning: To attach is to put two things together.
Meaning_Translation: 「附上」是指把兩樣東西連在一起。
Example: I attached the socks to the clothesline to dry.
Example_Translation: 我把襪子掛在晾衣繩上晾乾。

Meaning: To bet is to risk money on the result of a game or a business.
Meaning_Translation: 「下注」是指拿錢賭遊戲或生意的結果。
Example: How much will you bet that your horse will win?
Example_Translation: 你賭多少錢你的馬會贏？

Meaning: A carriage is a vehicle pulled by a horse.
Meaning_Translation: 「馬車」是由馬拉的交通工具。
Example: We took a carriage ride in the park.
Example_Translation: 我們在公園坐馬車。

Meaning: A classic thing is something that is common from the past.
Meaning_Translation: 「經典的」東西是過去常見的。
Example: The athlete made a classic mistake-he started running too soon.
Example_Translation: 這運動員犯了典型錯誤——起步太快。

Meaning: To commute is to travel a long distance to get to work.
Meaning_Translation: 「通勤」是指長距離往返上班。
Example: I usually commute to work on the train.
Example_Translation: 我通常搭火車通勤上班。

Meaning: To confirm is to make sure something is correct.
Meaning_Translation: 「確認」是指確保某事正確。
Example: Winning the game confirmed that James was a good player.
Example_Translation: 贏得比賽證明詹姆斯是個好球員。

Meaning: To criticize is to say bad things about someone or something.
Meaning_Translation: 「批評」是指說某人或某事的壞話。
Example: He criticized his wife for spending too much money.
Example_Translation: 他批評妻子花太多錢。

Meaning: To differ is to not be the same as another person or thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「不同」是指與另一人或事物不一樣。
Example: I differ from my brother: he is short, while I am tall.
Example_Translation: 我和哥哥不同：他矮，我高。

Meaning: An expense is the money that people spend on something.
Meaning_Translation: 「開支」是人們花在某事上的錢。
Example: She wrote down all the expenses for her trip.
Example_Translation: 她寫下旅行的所有開支。

Meaning: A formal thing is official or serious.
Meaning_Translation: 「正式的」事物是官方或嚴肅的。
Example: It was a formal dinner, so we wore our best clothes.
Example_Translation: 這是正式晚宴，我們穿了最好的衣服。

Meaning: Height is how tall someone or something is.
Meaning_Translation: 「高度」是某人或某物有多高。
Example: My height is 168 centimeters.
Example_Translation: 我身高168公分。

Meaning: To invent is to create something that never existed before.
Meaning_Translation: 「發明」是指創造從未存在過的東西。
Example: My grandfather has invented some interesting things.
Example_Translation: 我爺爺發明了一些有趣東西。

Meaning: A junior person is younger or less experienced.
Meaning_Translation: 「資淺的」人比較年輕或經驗較少。
Example: When she started at the company, she was only a junior manager.
Example_Translation: 她剛進公司時只是初級主管。

Meaning: Labor is the act of doing or making something.
Meaning_Translation: 「勞動」是做或製造某物的行為。
Example: Building the house took a lot of labor.
Example_Translation: 蓋這棟房子花了很多人力。

Meaning: A mechanic is someone who fixes vehicles or machines.
Meaning_Translation: 「技工」是修理車輛或機器的人。
Example: We took the car to the mechanic to be fixed.
Example_Translation: 我們把車送去修車廠修理。

Meaning: Prime shows that something is the most important one.
Meaning_Translation: 「首要的」表示某事最重要。
Example: Dirty air is a prime cause of illness.
Example_Translation: 骯髒的空氣是致病主因。

Meaning: To shift is to move into a different place or direction.
Meaning_Translation: 「移動」是指改變位置或方向。
Example: He shifted to the other side of the table to eat his breakfast.
Example_Translation: 他移到桌子另一邊吃早餐。

Meaning: A signal is a sound or action that tells someone to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「信號」是告訴某人做某事的聲音或動作。
Example: The coach blew his whistle as a signal to begin the game.
Example_Translation: 教練吹哨示意比賽開始。

Meaning: A sincere person is honest, especially about emotions or opinions.
Meaning_Translation: 「真誠的」人是誠實的，特別是在情感或意見上。
Example: He sounded sincere when he apologized to me.
Example_Translation: 他向我道歉時聽起來很誠懇。

Meaning: Ability is the quality of a person being able to do something well.
Meaning_Translation: 「能力」是某人能做好某事的特質。
Example: His swimming abilities let him cross the entire lake.
Example_Translation: 他的游泳能力讓他游完整個湖。

Meaning: Agriculture is the growing of plants and raising of animals for food.
Meaning_Translation: 「農業」是種植植物和飼養動物以取得食物。
Example: The farmer studied agriculture in college.
Example_Translation: 這農夫在大學讀農業。

Meaning: A cartoon is a funny drawing.
Meaning_Translation: 「漫畫」是一幅有趣的圖畫。
Example: Sometimes, people draw cartoons for the newspaper.
Example_Translation: 有時人們為報紙畫漫畫。

Meaning: The ceiling is the top of a room.
Meaning_Translation: 「天花板」是房間的頂部。
Example: He painted the ceiling with a special roller.
Example_Translation: 他用特殊滾筒漆天花板。

Meaning: To convince someone means to make that person sure of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「說服」某人是指讓那個人確信某事。
Example: She convinced me to buy the house.
Example_Translation: 她說服我買這棟房子。

Meaning: A curious person or animals wants to know about something.
Meaning_Translation: 「好奇的」人或動物想了解某事。
Example: I opened up the clock because I was curious about how it worked.
Example_Translation: 我因好奇鐘怎麼運作而打開它。

Meaning: To delay means to wait to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「延遲」是指等待再做某事。
Example: I was delayed at the airport for over two hours.
Example_Translation: 我在機場耽誤了兩個多小時。

Meaning: A diary is a book in which people write their personal experiences.
Meaning_Translation: 「日記」是人們記錄個人經歷的書。
Example: I do not let anybody read my diary.
Example_Translation: 我不讓任何人看我的日記。

Meaning: An element of something is a particular part of it.
Meaning_Translation: 「元素」是某物的特定部分。
Example: Tackling an opponent is Johnny’s favorite element of American football.
Example_Translation: 擒抱對手是強尼最喜歡的美式足球元素。

Meaning: Faith is trust or belief without proof.
Meaning_Translation: 「信念」是在沒有證據的情況下信任或相信。
Example: The sick girl had faith in doctors. She knew they would make her better.
Example_Translation: 生病的女孩相信醫生，知道他們會治好她。

Meaning: A grain is a food crop such as wheat, corn, rice, or oats.
Meaning_Translation: 「穀物」是如小麥、玉米、稻米或燕麥等糧食作物。
Example: The farmer planted two fields of grain this year.
Example_Translation: 農夫今年種了兩塊穀物田。

Meaning: To greet someone means to meet and welcome that person.
Meaning_Translation: 「問候」某人是指見面並歡迎他。
Example: When my friend came over, I greeted him at the door.
Example_Translation: 朋友來訪時，我在門口迎接他。

Meaning: To investigate means to search for something or learn about it.
Meaning_Translation: 「調查」是指尋找或了解某事。
Example: The detective went to investigate the crime.
Example_Translation: 偵探去調查這起犯罪。

Meaning: Joy is a feeling of great happiness.
Meaning_Translation: 「喜悅」是極度快樂的感覺。
Example: I love baseball. I feel joy when I play.
Example_Translation: 我愛棒球，打球時感到快樂。

Meaning: A label is a tag that tells about something.
Meaning_Translation: 「標籤」是說明某物的牌子。
Example: The label on the back of your shirt will tell you what size it is.
Example_Translation: 你襯衫背面的標籤會告訴你尺寸。

Meaning: A monk is a religious person who lives a simple life.
Meaning_Translation: 「僧侶」是過簡樸生活的宗教人士。
Example: The monks knew a lot about religion.
Example_Translation: 僧侶對宗教很了解。

Meaning: Something odd is unusual.
Meaning_Translation: 「奇怪的」東西不尋常。
Example: Her cat is odd. It walks on two feet.
Example_Translation: 她的貓很奇怪，會用兩隻腳走路。

Meaning: To pause means to stop doing something for a while.
Meaning_Translation: 「暫停」是指暫時停止做某事。
Example: Since she was so hungry, she paused to make a snack.
Example_Translation: 她太餓了，暫停一下做點心。

Meaning: A priest is a person trained to perform religious duties.
Meaning_Translation: 「神父」是受訓執行宗教職務的人。
Example: The priest taught us about God.
Example_Translation: 神父教我們認識上帝。

Meaning: A profession is a person’s job.
Meaning_Translation: 「職業」是一個人的工作。
Example: He loved sailing, so he chose to work on ships as a profession.
Example_Translation: 他熱愛航海，因此選擇以船員為職業。

Meaning: A ball is a round object that is thrown, kicked, or hit in a game or sport.
Meaning_Translation: 「球」是在遊戲或運動中被投擲、踢或擊打的圓形物體。
Example: Seth bought a new soccer ball.
Example_Translation: 賽斯買了新足球。

Meaning: The bottom is the lowest part, point, or level of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「底部」是某物最低的部分、點或層級。
Example: Sarah is so tall that her feet can touch the bottom of the swimming pool.
Example_Translation: 莎拉很高，腳能碰到游泳池底。

Meaning: A company is a business or organization that makes or sells goods or services.
Meaning_Translation: 「公司」是製造或銷售商品或服務的企業或組織。
Example: I want to work for a small software company.
Example_Translation: 我想在小型軟體公司工作。

Meaning: To drink is to take liquid into the body through the mouth.
Meaning_Translation: 「喝」是指透過嘴巴將液體攝入體內。
Example: The woman likes to drink water after she exercises.
Example_Translation: 這女人運動後喜歡喝水。

Meaning: A few things is a small number of them.
Meaning_Translation: 「少數」東西是少量的。
Example: I have only a few coins.
Example_Translation: 我只有幾枚硬幣。

Meaning: A line is a row of people or things.
Meaning_Translation: 「一排」是一列的人或東西。
Example: This is the longest line I have ever seen.
Example_Translation: 這是我見過最長的隊伍。

Meaning: A pet is an animal such as a cat or dog that people keep and care for.
Meaning_Translation: 「寵物」是人們飼養和照顧的動物，如貓或狗。
Example: Tyler likes to spend time with his pet dog.
Example_Translation: 泰勒喜歡陪他的寵物狗。

Meaning: A product is something grown or made in a factory in order to be sold.
Meaning_Translation: 「產品」是為了銷售而在工廠生產或種植的東西。
Example: There’s no room for even one more product in Melissa’s bag.
Example_Translation: 梅麗莎的包包連一件商品都塞不下了。

Meaning: A responsible person is in charge of someone or something.
Meaning_Translation: 「負責任的」人是負責某人或某事的人。
Example: Peter is responsible for leading his department.
Example_Translation: 彼得負責領導他的部門。

Meaning: To sell is to give something to someone in exchange for money.
Meaning_Translation: 「賣」是指把東西給別人以換取金錢。
Example: This man’s job is to sell houses.
Example_Translation: 這男人的工作是賣房子。

Meaning: A snake is an animal with a long, thin body and no legs.
Meaning_Translation: 「蛇」是身體細長、沒有腿的動物。
Example: Be careful of the snake in the tree.
Example_Translation: 小心樹上的蛇。

Meaning: To stand is to use the legs and feet to hold the body upright.
Meaning_Translation: 「站立」是指用腿和腳支撐身體直立。
