Example: Allan prefers to stand and work at his desk.
Example_Translation: 艾倫喜歡站著在書桌工作。

Meaning: A strange thing is unusual or surprising.
Meaning_Translation: 「奇怪的」東西不尋常或令人驚訝。
Example: They are wearing strange masks.
Example_Translation: 他們戴著奇怪的面具。

Meaning: Tea is a drink made by pouring boiling water onto dried leaves.
Meaning_Translation: 「茶」是將沸水倒在乾葉上製成的飲料。
Example: Many people drink green tea because it has many health benefits.
Example_Translation: 很多人喝綠茶，因為它對健康有益。

Meaning: To test is to examine something to see if its quality is good.
Meaning_Translation: 「測試」是指檢查某物以確認其品質是否良好。
Example: His job is to test the electricity to make sure it works correctly.
Example_Translation: 他的工作是測試電力確保正常運作。

Meaning: A tongue is the movable muscle inside the mouth that is used to speak, eat, and drink.
Meaning_Translation: 「舌頭」是嘴裡可活動的肌肉，用於說話、吃東西和喝東西。
Example: The cat uses its tongue to drink water.
Example_Translation: 貓用舌頭喝水。

Meaning: They refers to two or more people or things.
Meaning_Translation: 「他們」指兩個或更多的人或事物。
Example: They are playing a fun game.
Example_Translation: 他們在玩有趣的遊戲。

Meaning: A type is a particular kind or group of things or people.
Meaning_Translation: 「類型」是特定種類或群組的人或事物。
Example: Tulips are a type of flower.
Example_Translation: 鬱金香是一種花。

Meaning: Very is used to emphasize an adjective or adverb.
Meaning_Translation: 「非常」用來加強形容詞或副詞。
Example: An elephant is a very big animal.
Example_Translation: 大象是非常大的動物。

Meaning: To wait is to stay in a place until an expected event happens.
Meaning_Translation: 「等待」是指待在某地直到預期事件發生。
Example: She has to wait for the airplane to arrive.
Example_Translation: 她得等飛機抵達。

Meaning: To accomplish something means to finish it.
Meaning_Translation: 「完成」某事是指把它做完。
Example: He accomplished his goal of running ten miles.
Example_Translation: 他達成跑十英里的目標。

Meaning: To approve of something means you like or agree with that thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「贊成」某事是指喜歡或同意它。
Example: Her co-workers approved her new plan.
Example_Translation: 同事贊成她的新計畫。

Meaning: Approximate means close to an exact amount, number, or time.
Meaning_Translation: 「近似的」意思是接近確切的數量、數字或時間。
Example: My approximate height is two meters.
Example_Translation: 我身高約兩公尺。

Meaning: A barrier is something that blocks a path or way.
Meaning_Translation: 「障礙」是阻擋道路或通道的東西。
Example: The Great Wall was a barrier between China and its enemies.
Example_Translation: 長城是中國與敵人之間的屏障。

Meaning: To detect means to notice or find something.
Meaning_Translation: 「察覺」是指注意到或發現某事。
Example: The boy ran to the kitchen when he detected the smell of cookies.
Example_Translation: 男孩聞到餅乾香味就跑向廚房。

Meaning: A duty is something that a person has to do.
Meaning_Translation: 「責任」是某人必須做的事。
Example: It is parents’ duty to take care of their children.
Example_Translation: 照顧孩子是父母的責任。

Meaning: An elementary thing is the first or most simple thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「基本的」東西是最先或最簡單的。
Example: Children go to elementary school before high school.
Example_Translation: 孩子上高中前先讀小學。

Meaning: A failure happens when something is not done right.
Meaning_Translation: 「失敗」是某事沒做好的情況。
Example: My cooking ended in failure because I burned the food.
Example_Translation: 我煮焦了食物，以失敗告終。

Meaning: Something gradual happens slowly.
Meaning_Translation: 「漸進的」事情是慢慢發生的。
Example: Children learn to read at a gradual pace. They do not learn right away.
Example_Translation: 孩子學閱讀是循序漸進的，不會立刻學會。

Meaning: An immigrant is a person who moves to a different country.
Meaning_Translation: 「移民」是搬到另一個國家的人。
Example: My parents were immigrants. They came from Poland.
Example_Translation: 我父母是移民，來自波蘭。

Meaning: To insert something means to put it in something else.
Meaning_Translation: 「插入」某物是指把它放進另一個東西裡。
Example: He inserted an extra sentence into the story.
Example_Translation: 他在故事中插入一句額外的話。

Meaning: An instant is a very short amount of time.
Meaning_Translation: 「瞬間」是非常短的時間。
Example: A microwave oven cooks food in an instant.
Example_Translation: 微波爐瞬間就能煮熟食物。

Meaning: Poverty is the state of being poor.
Meaning_Translation: 「貧窮」是處於貧困的狀態。
Example: Poverty is a problem in many countries around the world.
Example_Translation: 貧窮是全球許多國家的問題。

Meaning: To pretend means to make believe something is real.
Meaning_Translation: 「假裝」是指讓某事看起來像真的。
Example: The boy liked to pretend he was a king.
Example_Translation: 男孩喜歡假裝自己是國王。

Meaning: A rank is a person’s place in an order of people.
Meaning_Translation: 「等級」是某人在人群中的位置。
Example: The man got to the rank of captain in the navy.
Example_Translation: 這男人在海軍晉升到上尉。

Meaning: Recognition is the act of getting praise from other people.
Meaning_Translation: 「認可」是獲得他人讚揚的行為。
Example: The hero got recognition for his brave deed.
Example_Translation: 英雄因英勇行為獲得表彰。

Meaning: To refrigerate something means to make it cold.
Meaning_Translation: 「冷藏」某物是指讓它變冷。
Example: Supermarkets refrigerate fruit to make it last long.
Example_Translation: 超市冷藏水果以延長保存期限。

Meaning: Rent is the money people pay to live in a certain place.
Meaning_Translation: 「租金」是人們為住在某地所付的錢。
Example: To live in this house, I have to pay rent at the start of each month.
Example_Translation: 要住這房子，我每月初得付房租。

Meaning: To retire is to leave a job, usually because of old age.
Meaning_Translation: 「退休」是指離開工作，通常因年老。
Example: My father is sixty-five years old. He is about to retire from work.
Example_Translation: 我爸六十五歲，即將退休。

Meaning: A statistic is a number that tells a fact about something.
Meaning_Translation: 「統計數據」是說明某事實的數字。
Example: The statistics showed that we did just as well this year as last year.
Example_Translation: 統計數據顯示我們今年表現和去年一樣好。

Meaning: An accident is unexpected, and may cause some trouble.
Meaning_Translation: 「意外」是出乎意料的，可能會造成麻煩。
Example: He damaged the car in an accident.
Example_Translation: 他在意外中損壞了車子。

Meaning: An astronaut is a person who goes into outer space.
Meaning_Translation: 「太空人」是進入外太空的人。
Example: The astronaut was walking on the moon.
Example_Translation: 太空人走在月球上。

Meaning: A person who is awake is not asleep.
Meaning_Translation: 「醒著的」人沒有睡覺。
Example: Sometimes, I lay awake in bed because I am not tired.
Example_Translation: 有時我躺在床上清醒著，因為不累。

Meaning: Courage is the feeling of not being afraid.
Meaning_Translation: 「勇氣」是不害怕的感覺。
Example: The man had the courage to touch the lion.
Example_Translation: 這男人有勇氣觸摸獅子。

Meaning: To float is to move on top of water without sinking.
Meaning_Translation: 「漂浮」是指在水面上移動而不下沉。
Example: The boy’s toy boat floated in the pool.
Example_Translation: 男孩的玩具船在泳池漂浮。

Meaning: To grant something is to allow someone to have it.
Meaning_Translation: 「授予」某物是指允許某人擁有它。
Example: The teacher granted us a break after studying hard all day.
Example_Translation: 老師讓我們辛苦讀書一整天後休息一下。

Meaning: Gravity is the force that makes things fall to Earth.
Meaning_Translation: 「重力」是讓東西落向地球的力量。
Example: There is no gravity in space.
Example_Translation: 太空中沒有重力。

Meaning: A jewel is a beautiful stone that is worth a lot of money.
Meaning_Translation: 「寶石」是美麗且價值昂貴的石頭。
Example: A diamond is one of the most expensive jewels in the world.
Example_Translation: 鑽石是世上最昂貴的寶石之一。

Meaning: A miner is a person who works in a mine.
Meaning_Translation: 「礦工」是在礦坑工作的人。
Example: The miner was looking for gold.
Example_Translation: 礦工在尋找黃金。

Meaning: A mineral is a type of substance found in the Earth.
Meaning_Translation: 「礦物」是地球中發現的一種物質。
Example: Rocks are made up of different kinds of minerals.
Example_Translation: 岩石由不同礦物組成。

Meaning: To participate is to be active and do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「參與」是指積極地做某事。
Example: The students participated in the school play.
Example_Translation: 學生參與學校戲劇演出。

Meaning: Permission means the act of allowing some action.
Meaning_Translation: 「許可」是指允許某行動的行為。
Example: I have permission to drive my mom’s car.
Example_Translation: 我有權開媽媽的車。

Meaning: To pour a liquid means to make it come out of a container.
Meaning_Translation: 「倒」液體是指讓它從容器中流出。
Example: I poured some milk into my sister’s cup.
Example_Translation: 我倒了些牛奶到妹妹的杯子。

Meaning: A raw material is natural and has not been processed.
Meaning_Translation: 「未加工的」原料是天然且未經處理的。
Example: The company dumped raw sewage into the river.
Example_Translation: 公司把未經處理的污水排入河中。

Meaning: A satellite is a machine sent into space to get information.
Meaning_Translation: 「衛星」是送入太空以獲取資訊的機器。
Example: The satellite was traveling around the Earth.
Example_Translation: 衛星繞地球運行。

Meaning: The scale of something is its size, especially when it is very large.
Meaning_Translation: 「規模」是某物的大小，尤其是當它非常大時。
Example: I was surprised by the scale of the buildings in the downtown area.
Example_Translation: 我對市中心建築的規模感到驚訝。

Meaning: To skip something is to not do it.
Meaning_Translation: 「跳過」某事是指不做它。
Example: He skipped work to get more sleep.
Example_Translation: 他翹班多睡一會兒。

Meaning: To stretch is to make your arms or legs reach out.
Meaning_Translation: 「伸展」是指伸出手臂或腿。
Example: She stretched her body before exercising.
Example_Translation: 她運動前伸展身體。

Meaning: A telescope is a tool people use to look at the stars.
Meaning_Translation: 「望遠鏡」是人們用來觀看星星的工具。
Example: With a telescope, you can see the moon and stars easily.
Example_Translation: 用望遠鏡能輕鬆看到月亮和星星。

Meaning: An underground action happens below the surface of the Earth.
Meaning_Translation: 「地下的」行動發生在地球表面之下。
Example: Subway trains travel underground.
Example_Translation: 地鐵在地下行駛。

Meaning: An alarm is something that warns people of danger.
Meaning_Translation: 「警報」是警告人們危險的東西。
Example: When the students heard the fire alarm, they left the building.
Example_Translation: 學生聽到火警就離開大樓。

Meaning: To arrest someone means to catch that person for doing something bad.
Meaning_Translation: 「逮捕」某人是指因其做了壞事而抓住他。
Example: The man was arrested for breaking the law.
Example_Translation: 這男人因違法被捕。

Meaning: An award is a prize for doing something well.
Meaning_Translation: 「獎項」是因表現出色而獲得的獎勵。
Example: He got an award for having the best grades in class.
Example_Translation: 他因成績全班第一獲獎。

Meaning: A breed is a group of animals within a species.
Meaning_Translation: 「品種」是物種內的一群動物。
Example: I like small dog breeds, such as terriers.
Example_Translation: 我喜歡小型犬種，例如㹴犬。

Meaning: A bucket is a round container to put things in.
Meaning_Translation: 「水桶」是用來裝東西的圓形容器。
Example: I filled the bucket with water.
Example_Translation: 我把桶子裝滿水。

Meaning: A contest is a game or a race.
Meaning_Translation: 「比賽」是遊戲或競賽。
Example: The girls had a contest to see who could jump higher.
Example_Translation: 女孩們比賽誰跳得更高。

Meaning: To convict means to prove that someone did a bad thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「定罪」是指證明某人做了壞事。
Example: He was convicted of the crime and sent to jail.
Example_Translation: 他被判有罪並入獄。

Meaning: A festival is an event that is held to celebrate a particular thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「節慶」是為慶祝特定事物而舉辦的活動。
Example: I heard the song at the music festival in London.
Example_Translation: 我在倫敦音樂節聽到這首歌。

Meaning: A garage is the part of a house where people put their cars.
Meaning_Translation: 「車庫」是房子中停放汽車的部分。
Example: My car does not get dirty because I keep it in the garage.
Example_Translation: 我的車不髒，因為我停在車庫。

Meaning: A journalist is a person who writes news stories.
Meaning_Translation: 「記者」是撰寫新聞故事的人。
Example: The journalist took notes for a story he was writing.
Example_Translation: 記者為寫報導做筆記。

Meaning: A pup is a young dog.
Meaning_Translation: 「小狗」是年幼的狗。
Example: All the girl wanted for her birthday was a pup.
Example_Translation: 這女孩生日只想要一隻小狗。

Meaning: To qualify is to have or do things that are needed for something.
Meaning_Translation: 「符合資格」是指擁有或做到某事所需條件。
Example: He qualified to go to the final match by beating the opponent.
Example_Translation: 他打敗對手取得決賽資格。

Meaning: To repair something is to fix it.
Meaning_Translation: 「修理」某物是指修好它。
Example: I repaired the flat tire on my car.
Example_Translation: 我修好了車子的爆胎。

Meaning: To resume something means to start it again after taking a break.
Meaning_Translation: 「恢復」某事是指休息後重新開始。
Example: I put the newspaper down to eat breakfast. Then, I resumed reading.
Example_Translation: 我放下報紙吃早餐，然後繼續閱讀。

Meaning: To rob is to take property by using force.
Meaning_Translation: 「搶劫」是指用武力奪取財物。
Example: A thief has robbed me of my passport.
Example_Translation: 小偷偷走了我的護照。

Meaning: To slip means to slide and fall down.
Meaning_Translation: 「滑倒」是指滑動並跌倒。
Example: The man slipped on the wet floor.
Example_Translation: 這男人在濕滑地板上滑倒。

Meaning: Somewhat means to some degree, but not to a large degree.
Meaning_Translation: 「 somewhat」意思是某種程度上，但不是很大程度。
Example: James was somewhat upset when he had to move heavy boxes.
Example_Translation: 詹姆斯搬重箱子時有點不高興。

Meaning: A stable thing will not move, change, or fall over.
Meaning_Translation: 「穩定的」東西不會移動、改變或傾倒。
Example: The chair is stable. Its legs are strong.
Example_Translation: 椅子很穩，椅腳很牢固。

Meaning: A tissue is a soft piece of paper people use to wipe their noses.
Meaning_Translation: 「面紙」是人們用來擦鼻子的柔軟紙張。
Example: There was a box of tissue on the table.
Example_Translation: 桌上有一盒面紙。

Meaning: A yard is the ground just outside of a house.
Meaning_Translation: 「院子」是房子外面的空地。
Example: The girls jumped rope in the yard.
Example_Translation: 女孩們在院子跳繩。

Meaning: The best person or thing is better than all the others.
Meaning_Translation: 「最好的」人或事物比其他都好。
Example: I got the best score on the math test.
Example_Translation: 我數學考試考最高分。

Meaning: A card is a small piece of plastic or paper used to buy or use things.
Meaning_Translation: 「卡片」是用來購買或使用東西的小片塑膠或紙。
Example: Adam used his library card to borrow a book.
Example_Translation: 亞當用借書證借書。

Meaning: A crowd is a large group of people who are together in one place.
Meaning_Translation: 「人群」是一大群聚集在同一地方的人。
Example: The crowd waved to the camera.
Example_Translation: 人群向鏡頭揮手。

Meaning: A day is a period of twenty-four hours, beginning at midnight.
Meaning_Translation: 「一天」是從午夜開始的二十四小時期間。
Example: There are two more days until the weekend.
Example_Translation: 離週末還有兩天。

Meaning: A dish is a type of food that is cooked in a particular way.
Meaning_Translation: 「一道菜」是以特定方式烹調的食物。
Example: My favorite dish at the restaurant is chicken curry.
Example_Translation: 我最喜歡餐廳的咖哩雞。

Meaning: An easy action is not difficult to do.
Meaning_Translation: 「簡單的」行動不難做。
Example: Karen is happy because her English homework is easy.
Example_Translation: 凱倫很高興，因為她的英文作業很簡單。

Meaning: To experience is to do or see something or have something happen to you.
Meaning_Translation: 「經歷」是指做或看到某事，或某事發生在你身上。
Example: Going to the concert was the best thing I’ve ever experienced.
Example_Translation: 去音樂會是我經歷過最棒的事。

Meaning: A hotel is a place where people stay overnight when they are traveling.
Meaning_Translation: 「旅館」是旅行時過夜的地方。
Example: This family is staying at their favorite hotel.
Example_Translation: 這家人住在他們最喜歡的飯店。

Meaning: An hour is sixty minutes.
Meaning_Translation: 「一小時」是六十分鐘。
Example: The man waited for the train for over an hour.
Example_Translation: 這男人等火車超過一小時。

Meaning: Light is a form of energy or brightness that makes it possible to see something.
Meaning_Translation: 「光」是一種能量或亮度，使人能看見東西。
Example: I will turn on the light so that you can see.
Example_Translation: 我會開燈讓你看得見。

Meaning: A market is a place where people buy and sell products or food.
Meaning_Translation: 「市場」是人們買賣商品或食物的地方。
Example: I go to the market every weekend to buy vegetables.
Example_Translation: 我每週末去市場買菜。

Meaning: To plan is to think about and arrange the details of something you want to do.
Meaning_Translation: 「計畫」是指思考並安排你想做的事的細節。
Example: It’s Sam’s turn to plan the company party.
Example_Translation: 輪到山姆規劃公司派對。

Meaning: The price is the amount of money needed to pay for something.
Meaning_Translation: 「價格」是購買某物所需的金錢數量。
Example: Julie is checking the price of a sweater.
Example_Translation: 茱莉在看毛衣的價格。

Meaning: A short thing is not long or not tall.
Meaning_Translation: 「短的」東西不長或不高。
Example: The days are short in the winter.
Example_Translation: 冬天白天很短。

Meaning: To shop is to visit places where goods are sold in order to look at and buy things.
Meaning_Translation: 「購物」是指去商店看並購買商品。
Example: Tom decided to shop for groceries on his way home.
Example_Translation: 湯姆決定回家路上買雜貨。

Meaning: A station is a place where buses and trains stop for passengers.
Meaning_Translation: 「車站」是公車和火車停靠載客的地方。
Example: This man is waiting at the train station.
Example_Translation: 這男人在火車站等車。

Meaning: To surprise is to cause something that is unexpected.
Meaning_Translation: 「讓…驚訝」是指造成出乎意料的事。
Example: His parents decided to surprise him with a puppy.
Example_Translation: 他父母決定送他一隻小狗當驚喜。

Meaning: A system is a group of related parts that move or work together.
Meaning_Translation: 「系統」是一組相關且共同運作的部分。
Example: This device controls the building’s heating system.
Example_Translation: 這裝置控制大樓的暖氣系統。

Meaning: A taxi is a car and driver that you pay to take you somewhere.
Meaning_Translation: 「計程車」是你付錢請司機載你去某地的車。
Example: Gary drives a taxi, so he knows the roads very well.
Example_Translation: 蓋瑞開計程車，所以很熟悉道路。

Meaning: Two is the word for the number 2.
Meaning_Translation: 「二」是數字2的字。
Example: Two friends study together at the coffee shop.
Example_Translation: 兩個朋友在咖啡廳一起讀書。

Meaning: A bath is the act of sitting in a tub of water in order to get clean.
Meaning_Translation: 「洗澡」是坐在浴缸水中清潔身體的行為。
Example: After playing in the dirt, the boy took a bath.
Example_Translation: 男孩玩泥巴後洗了澡。

Meaning: To bend is to move something so it is not straight.
Meaning_Translation: 「彎曲」是指移動某物使其不直。
Example: Lee bent over and picked up the paper on the ground.
Example_Translation: 李彎腰撿起地上的紙。

Meaning: To chew is to break up food by using the mouth and teeth.
Meaning_Translation: 「咀嚼」是指用嘴巴和牙齒咬碎食物。
Example: I always chew my food carefully before swallowing it.
Example_Translation: 我總是細嚼慢咽再吞下食物。

Meaning: A disabled person has a physical problem that makes some activities difficult.
Meaning_Translation: 「身心障礙的」人有身體問題，使某些活動變得困難。
Example: The disabled man used a wheelchair to move around.
Example_Translation: 這位身心障礙者用輪椅行動。

Meaning: A fantastic thing is really good.
Meaning_Translation: 「極好的」東西真的很好。
Example: The student did a fantastic job on his project and got an award.
Example_Translation: 這學生專案做得超棒，還獲獎了。

Meaning: Fiction is a story that is not true.
Meaning_Translation: 「虛構」是不真實的故事。
Example: I enjoy reading works of fiction because they are very entertaining.
Example_Translation: 我喜歡讀小說，因為很有趣。

Meaning: A flag is a piece of colored cloth that represents something.
Meaning_Translation: 「旗幟」是代表某事物的彩色布片。
Example: Our country has a beautiful flag.
Example_Translation: 我們國家有美麗的國旗。

Meaning: To inspect is to look at something carefully.
Meaning_Translation: 「檢查」是指仔細查看某物。
Example: The mechanic inspected our car to see if it had any problems.
Example_Translation: 技師檢查我們的車是否有問題。

Meaning: A journal is a type of magazine that deals with an academic subject.
Meaning_Translation: 「期刊」是探討學術主題的雜誌。
Example: Mi-young was busy working on an article for an art journal.
Example_Translation: 美英忙著為藝術期刊寫文章。

Meaning: A liquid is a substance that is neither solid nor gas.
Meaning_Translation: 「液體」是既非固體也非氣體的物質。
Example: Water is the most important liquid for life.
Example_Translation: 水是生命最重要的液體。

Meaning: To marvel at something is to feel surprise and interest in it.
Meaning_Translation: 「對…感到驚奇」是指對某事感到驚訝和興趣。
Example: We marveled at her excellent piano playing.
Example_Translation: 我們對她出色的鋼琴演奏感到驚嘆。

Meaning: To overcome a problem is to successfully fix it.
Meaning_Translation: 「克服」問題是指成功解決它。
Example: She overcame her shyness and spoke in front of the class.
Example_Translation: 她克服害羞，在全班面前發言。

Meaning: To recall something is to remember it.
Meaning_Translation: 「回憶」某事是指記起它。
Example: She was trying to recall what she had told her friend.
Example_Translation: 她試著回想自己對朋友說過什麼。

Meaning: To regret something is to wish that it hadn’t happened.
Meaning_Translation: 「後悔」某事是指希望它沒發生過。
Example: I regret that I was mean to my sister.
Example_Translation: 我後悔對妹妹不好。

Meaning: A soul is a person’s spirit.
Meaning_Translation: 「靈魂」是一個人的精神。
Example: Some people believe that the soul lives after the body dies.
Example_Translation: 有些人相信靈魂在肉體死後仍存在。

Meaning: Sufficient shows that something is enough, in quality or quantity.
Meaning_Translation: 「足夠的」表示某物在品質或數量上已足夠。
Example: After eating a sufficient amount of food, I left the table.
Example_Translation: 吃飽後我就離開餐桌。

Meaning: Surgery is medical treatment involving a doctor cutting into a body.
Meaning_Translation: 「外科手術」是醫生切開身體的醫療治療。
Example: I needed surgery to repair my leg after the accident.
Example_Translation: 事故後我需要手術修復腿部。

Meaning: A tough thing is difficult.
Meaning_Translation: 「困難的」東西很難。
Example: The man passed his driving test even though it was very tough.
Example_Translation: 這男人通過了很難的駕照考試。

Meaning: A tube is a pipe through which water or air passes.
Meaning_Translation: 「管子」是水或空氣通過的管道。
Example: The pile of tubes was going to be put in the ground.
Example_Translation: 這堆管子要埋進地下。

Meaning: The value of something is what it is worth.
Meaning_Translation: 「價值」是某物的 worth（值得多少）。
Example: Your love for me has greater value than gold.
Example_Translation: 你對我的愛比黃金更有價值。

Meaning: An atom is the smallest unit of a substance.
Meaning_Translation: 「原子」是物質的最小單位。
Example: A molecule consists of a combination of two or more atoms.
Example_Translation: 分子由兩個以上原子組成。

Meaning: A beautiful thing is good to look at.
Meaning_Translation: 「美麗的」東西看起來很好。
Example: There was a beautiful sunset.
Example_Translation: 有個美麗的日落。

Meaning: Breadth is the distance from one side to the other side of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「寬度」是某物從一邊到另一邊的距離。
Example: The breadth of the northern wall of the house is twenty meters.
Example_Translation: 房子北牆寬二十公尺。

Meaning: A comet is an object in space made of ice and rock with a tail of glowing dust.
Meaning_Translation: 「彗星」是太空中由冰和岩石組成、帶有發光塵埃尾巴的天體。
Example: Comets take many decades to complete an orbit around a star.
Example_Translation: 彗星繞恆星一圈需數十年。

Meaning: To cover something is to put things over it.
Meaning_Translation: 「覆蓋」某物是指在上面放東西。
Example: The Earth was covered with clouds.
Example_Translation: 地球被雲層覆蓋。

Meaning: Despair is the feeling of having no hope.
Meaning_Translation: 「絕望」是毫無希望的感覺。
Example: After we lost the big account, our salespeople were filled with despair.
Example_Translation: 失去大客戶後，業務員陷入絕望。

Meaning: To form is to make or to shape something.
Meaning_Translation: 「形成」是指製造或塑造某物。
Example: They formed a new government.
Example_Translation: 他們組成新政府。

Meaning: A fragment is a small part of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「碎片」是某物的一小部分。
Example: After the light broke, there were fragments of glass to clean up.
Example_Translation: 燈泡破了，得清理玻璃碎片。

Meaning: A galaxy is an extremely large collection of star systems.
Meaning_Translation: 「星系」是極大一群恆星系統。
Example: Our solar system is located in the outer area of our galaxy.
Example_Translation: 我們的太陽系位於銀河系外圍。

Meaning: Gloom is a state of almost complete darkness or sadness.
Meaning_Translation: 「陰鬱」是幾乎完全黑暗或悲傷的狀態。
Example: In the gloom of the morning, it was difficult to see the boat on the lake.
Example_Translation: 清晨昏暗中，很難看到湖上的船。

Meaning: Something large is very big.
Meaning_Translation: 「大的」東西非常大。
Example: I was frightened by a large bird.
Example_Translation: 我被一隻大鳥嚇到。

Meaning: The moon is an object that travels around our Earth.
Meaning_Translation: 「月亮」是繞地球運行的天體。
Example: The moon looks beautiful tonight.
Example_Translation: 今晚月亮很美。

Meaning: To radiate means to send out energy or heat.
Meaning_Translation: 「輻射」是指發出能量或熱。
Example: The heat from the fireplace radiated throughout the room.
Example_Translation: 壁爐的熱氣散佈整個房間。

Meaning: To roam means to move around without a plan or purpose.
Meaning_Translation: 「漫遊」是指無計畫或目的地四處走動。
Example: All day, the cows roamed around the field eating grass.
Example_Translation: 整天牛群在田野吃草漫步。

Meaning: A solitary thing is lonely or the only one.
Meaning_Translation: 「孤獨的」東西是寂寞的或唯一的。
Example: The only thing in the room was a solitary chair.
Example_Translation: 房間裡只有一張孤零零的椅子。

Meaning: The spectrum is the full range of color ranging from red to violet.
Meaning_Translation: 「光譜」是從紅色到紫色的完整顏色範圍。
Example: You can see the entire spectrum in a rainbow.
Example_Translation: 彩虹中能看到完整的光譜。

Meaning: A sphere is a three-dimensional round shape, like a ball.
Meaning_Translation: 「球體」是三維的圓形，像球一樣。
Example: The balloons were inflated into a variety of colorful spheres.
Example_Translation: 氣球被吹成各種彩色球體。

Meaning: A star is a bright shining thing in the night sky.
Meaning_Translation: 「星星」是夜空中明亮閃爍的天體。
Example: The stars come out at night.
Example_Translation: 星星在夜晚出現。

Meaning: Status is the position of something or someone in relation to others.
Meaning_Translation: 「地位」是某物或某人相對於他人的位置。
Example: She had achieved the status of being the smartest girl in the class.
Example_Translation: 她成為班上最聰明的女孩。

Meaning: Something ugly is not good to look at.
Meaning_Translation: 「醜陋的」東西看起來不好。
Example: It was an ugly sight.
Example_Translation: 那景象很醜陋。

Meaning: To accuse someone of something is to blame them for doing it.
Meaning_Translation: 「指控」某人做某事是指責備他們做了那件事。
Example: She accused her brother of breaking her computer.
Example_Translation: 她指控哥哥弄壞她的電腦。

Meaning: To adjust something means to change it so it is better.
Meaning_Translation: 「調整」某物是指改變它使其更好。
Example: He adjusted the old guitar to make it sound better.
Example_Translation: 他調音讓舊吉他聲音更好。

Meaning: To amuse someone means to do something that is funny or entertaining.
Meaning_Translation: 「逗樂」某人是指做有趣或娛樂的事。
Example: The singer was very good. She amused the crowd.
Example_Translation: 歌手很棒，娛樂了觀眾。

Meaning: Coral is the hard, colorful material formed by the shells of animals.
Meaning_Translation: 「珊瑚」是動物殼形成的堅硬、多彩物質。
Example: The diver admired the beautiful coral under the water.
Example_Translation: 潛水員欣賞水下美麗的珊瑚。

Meaning: Cotton is a cloth made from the fibers of the cotton plant.
Meaning_Translation: 「棉布」是由棉花植物纖維製成的布料。
Example: I like to wear clothes made from cotton in the summer.
Example_Translation: 夏天我喜歡穿棉質衣服。

Meaning: To crash means to hit and break something.
Meaning_Translation: 「撞毀」是指撞擊並破壞某物。
Example: There was a loud noise when the car crashed into the tree.
Example_Translation: 車子撞上樹時發出巨響。

Meaning: A deck is a wooden floor built outside of a house or the floor of a ship.
Meaning_Translation: 「甲板」是建在屋外的木地板或船上的地板。
Example: A ship will store many supplies below its deck.
Example_Translation: 船隻會在甲板下存放許多補給品。

Meaning: To engage in something means to do it.
Meaning_Translation: 「參與」某事是指去做它。
Example: Dad was engaged in sawing a piece of wood in half.
Example_Translation: 爸在鋸木頭。

Meaning: A firm thing is solid but not too hard.
Meaning_Translation: 「堅實的」東西是結實但不太硬。
Example: He sleeps better on a firm bed.
Example_Translation: 他睡硬床比較好睡。

Meaning: Fuel is something that creates heat or energy.
Meaning_Translation: 「燃料」是產生熱或能量的東西。
Example: Wood is the fuel that burns to make heat in this fire.
Example_Translation: 木頭是這火燃燒產生熱的燃料。

Meaning: Something grand is big and liked by people.
Meaning_Translation: 「宏偉的」東西又大又受人喜愛。
Example: The grand mountain rose high into the sky.
Example_Translation: 雄偉的高山高聳入雲。

Meaning: A hurricane is a bad storm that happens over the ocean.
Meaning_Translation: 「颶風」是在海洋上發生的猛烈風暴。
Example: The wind from the hurricane bent the palm tree.
Example_Translation: 颶風的風吹彎了棕櫚樹。

Meaning: A loss is the act or instance of losing something.
Meaning_Translation: 「損失」是失去某物的行為或事件。
Example: I suffered a big loss while I was gambling.
Example_Translation: 我賭博時損失慘重。

Meaning: A plain thing is simple and not decorated.
Meaning_Translation: 「樸素的」東西簡單且無裝飾。
Example: He bought a pair of plain white shoes over the weekend.
Example_Translation: 他週末買了一雙素面白鞋。

Meaning: A reef is a group of rocks or coral in the ocean.
Meaning_Translation: 「礁」是海洋中的一群岩石或珊瑚。
Example: He walked along the reef and looked at the water below.
Example_Translation: 他沿著珊瑚礁走，看著下方的海水。

Meaning: To shut something means to close it tightly.
Meaning_Translation: 「關閉」某物是指緊緊地關上它。
Example: Please shut the door; the air outside is cold.
Example_Translation: 請關門，外面空氣很冷。

Meaning: A strict person makes sure others follow rules.
Meaning_Translation: 「嚴格的」人會確保他人遵守規則。
Example: The teacher is strict. She does not let students talk in class.
Example_Translation: 老師很嚴格，不讓學生在課堂說話。

Meaning: To surf means to use a special board to ride on waves in the ocean.
Meaning_Translation: 「衝浪」是指用特殊板子在海浪上滑行。
Example: The students went to the beach to surf during their vacation.
Example_Translation: 學生放假時去海邊衝浪。

Meaning: A task is a piece of work to be done that is usually difficult.
Meaning_Translation: 「任務」是通常困難的工作。
Example: My task for the weekend was to clean the entire back yard.
Example_Translation: 我週末的任務是打掃整個後院。

Meaning: A zone is an area that has different qualities from the ones around it.
Meaning_Translation: 「區域」是與周圍地區性質不同的地方。
Example: Firefighters often work in danger zones.
Example_Translation: 消防員常在危險區域工作。

Meaning: An apology is what people say to show that they are sorry.
Meaning_Translation: 「道歉」是人們表示抱歉的話。
Example: After arguing with her teacher, the girl wrote the teacher an apology.
Example_Translation: 和老師吵架後，女孩寫了道歉信。

Meaning: A bold person is not afraid of doing something.
Meaning_Translation: 「大膽的」人不怕做某事。
Example: The bold man climbed the high mountain.
Example_Translation: 這勇敢的人爬上高山。

Meaning: A bug is a small insect.
Meaning_Translation: 「蟲子」是小型昆蟲。
Example: Birds like eating bugs.
Example_Translation: 鳥喜歡吃蟲。

Meaning: To capture something is to catch and hold it.
Meaning_Translation: 「捕捉」某物是指抓住並留住它。
Example: James tried to capture the bubbles in his hands.
Example_Translation: 詹姆斯試著用手抓住泡泡。

Meaning: A duke is a man of high social rank but below a king or queen.
Meaning_Translation: 「公爵」是社會地位很高但低於國王或女王的男性。
Example: The duke ruled over the land.
Example_Translation: 公爵統治這片土地。

Meaning: To expose is to make known something that is hidden.
Meaning_Translation: 「揭露」是指讓隱藏的事曝光。
Example: He took off his shirt to expose his costume.
Example_Translation: 他脫掉襯衫露出戲服。

Meaning: Guilty people feel bad for something they did.
Meaning_Translation: 「有罪的」人對自己做的事感到內疚。
Example: I felt guilty for taking my sister’s cookies.
Example_Translation: 我偷吃妹妹的餅乾感到愧疚。

Meaning: To hire someone is to pay that person money to work for you.
Meaning_Translation: 「僱用」某人是指付錢請他為你工作。
Example: We hired a man to paint our house.
Example_Translation: 我們雇人粉刷房子。

Meaning: An innocent person is not guilty of a crime.
Meaning_Translation: 「無辜的」人沒有犯罪。
Example: The judge said that the woman was innocent of the crime.
Example_Translation: 法官說這女人無罪。

Meaning: A language is a system of communication.
Meaning_Translation: 「語言」是溝通的系統。
Example: The reporter spoke a language Sally had never heard before.
Example_Translation: 記者說一種莎莉從沒聽過的語言。

Meaning: A minister is an important person in government with many duties.
Meaning_Translation: 「部長」是政府中職責重大的重要人物。
Example: The minister of education controls the country’s schools.
Example_Translation: 教育部长掌管全國學校。

Meaning: Ordinary means normal, or not special in any way.
Meaning_Translation: 「普通的」意思是正常，或毫無特別之處。
Example: Today was just an ordinary day. Nothing unusual happened.
Example_Translation: 今天只是平凡的一天，沒什麼特別事。

Meaning: Something permanent lasts for a long time or forever.
Meaning_Translation: 「永久的」東西會持續很久或永遠。
Example: We don’t know if Aunt Mildred’s visit will be a permanent one.
Example_Translation: 我們不知道米爾德里德阿姨的來訪是否會長期住下。

Meaning: To preserve is to protect something from harm.
Meaning_Translation: 「保護」是指防止某物受到傷害。
Example: Dad sprayed a chemical on the house to help preserve the walls.
Example_Translation: 爸爸在房子噴化學藥劑保護牆壁。

Meaning: To pronounce is to say the sounds of letters or words.
Meaning_Translation: 「發音」是指說出字母或單字的聲音。
Example: Young children often have trouble pronouncing words right.
Example_Translation: 幼兒常發音不準。

Meaning: To resemble someone is to look like that person.
Meaning_Translation: 「像」某人是指看起來像他。
Example: The baby really resembles his father.
Example_Translation: 這嬰兒真的很像他爸爸。

Meaning: A symptom of a bad condition or illness is a sign that it is happening.
Meaning_Translation: 「症狀」是疾病或不良狀況正在發生的徵兆。
Example: Sneezing and a high fever are symptoms of the common cold.
Example_Translation: 打噴嚏和高燒是感冒症狀。

Meaning: Tobacco is a plant whose leaves are smoked, such as in cigarettes.
Meaning_Translation: 「菸草」是一種葉子可被吸食（如香菸）的植物。
Example: The tobacco in cigarettes is bad for you.
Example_Translation: 香菸中的菸草對你有害。

Meaning: Twins are two children born at the same time.
Meaning_Translation: 「雙胞胎」是同時出生的兩個孩子。
Example: My sister and I are twins. We look exactly the same.
Example_Translation: 我和妹妹是雙胞胎，長得一模一樣。

Meaning: A witch is a woman with magical powers.
Meaning_Translation: 「女巫」是有魔法力量的女人。
Example: People think that witches fly around on broomsticks.
Example_Translation: 人們認為女巫騎掃帚飛行。

Meaning: To accompany other people means to join them or go with them.
Meaning_Translation: 「陪伴」他人是指加入或與他們同行。
Example: My brothers accompanied me to the movie.
Example_Translation: 我哥哥陪我去看電影。

Meaning: A bare thing is plain and not covered.
Meaning_Translation: 「赤裸的」東西是簡單且未覆蓋的。
Example: He likes to walk around in his bare feet.
Example_Translation: 他喜歡赤腳走來走去。

Meaning: A branch is the part of a tree with leaves.
Meaning_Translation: 「樹枝」是長有葉子的樹的一部分。
Example: The monkey was hanging from a branch on the tree.
Example_Translation: 猴子掛在樹枝上。

Meaning: A breath is the air that goes into and out of one’s lungs.
Meaning_Translation: 「呼吸」是進出肺部的空氣。
Example: You can’t take a breath under water.
Example_Translation: 你在水下無法呼吸。

Meaning: A bridge is something that is built over a river so people can cross it.
Meaning_Translation: 「橋」是建在河上讓人們通行的結構。
Example: The old bridge fell into the river.
Example_Translation: 老橋掉進河裡。

Meaning: To cast something means to throw it.
Meaning_Translation: 「投擲」某物是指扔出它。
Example: The fisherman cast his line into the water.
Example_Translation: 漁夫把釣線拋入水中。

Meaning: To dare means to be brave enough to try something.
Meaning_Translation: 「敢」是指有足夠勇氣嘗試某事。
Example: He dared to jump out of the airplane and skydive.
Example_Translation: 他敢從飛機跳傘。

Meaning: An electronic thing uses electricity to work.
Meaning_Translation: 「電子的」東西靠電力運作。
Example: I like having electronic devices such as an MP3 player.
Example_Translation: 我喜歡有MP3播放器等電子設備。

Meaning: An inn is a place where travelers can rest and eat.
Meaning_Translation: 「旅店」是旅客休息和用餐的地方。
Example: The visitor got a room at the inn.
Example_Translation: 旅客在旅館訂了房間。

Meaning: A net is a bag made of strong thread. It is used to catch animals.
Meaning_Translation: 「網」是用堅固線織成的袋子，用來捕捉動物。
Example: The boy caught butterflies in his net.
Example_Translation: 男孩用網子抓蝴蝶。

Meaning: A philosophy is a way to think about truth and life.
Meaning_Translation: 「哲學」是思考真理與人生的方式。
Example: My philosophy is “live and let live.”
Example_Translation: 我的哲學是「自己活，也讓別人活」。

Meaning: A pot is a deep, round metal container used for cooking.
Meaning_Translation: 「鍋」是用來烹飪的深而圓的金屬容器。
Example: Don’t touch the pot on the stove. It’s hot.
Example_Translation: 別碰爐子上的鍋，很燙。

Meaning: A seed is the hard part of a plant or fruit that trees grow from.
Meaning_Translation: 「種子」是植物或水果中長出樹木的硬部分。
Example: I planted the seed in the dirt, hoping that it would grow into a tree.
Example_Translation: 我把種子種在土裡，希望它長成樹。

Meaning: A sharp object has a thin edge that cuts things easily.
Meaning_Translation: 「鋒利的」物體有薄刃，能輕易切割東西。
Example: That knife is very sharp. Be careful not to hurt yourself.
Example_Translation: 那把刀很鋒利，小心別割傷自己。

Meaning: A sort of something is a type of it.
Meaning_Translation: 「一種」某物是它的類型。
Example: What sort of instrument do you want to learn to play?
Example_Translation: 你想學哪種樂器？

Meaning: To subtract means to take something away.
Meaning_Translation: 「減去」是指拿走某物。
Example: We learned how to subtract numbers in class.
Example_Translation: 我們在課堂學減法。

Meaning: A tight thing is hard to move because it is firmly in place.
Meaning_Translation: 「緊的」東西因固定牢固而難以移動。
Example: The knots were too tight to untie.
Example_Translation: 結太緊解不開。

Meaning: A virtual thing is very close to being true or accurate.
Meaning_Translation: 「虛擬的」東西非常接近真實或準確。
Example: Because he’s popular, Joe is the virtual leader of the group.
Example_Translation: 因為受歡迎，喬是團隊的實際領袖。

Meaning: To weigh something means to measure how heavy it is.
Meaning_Translation: 「稱重」某物是指測量它有多重。
Example: The little dog weighed exactly 3 kilograms.
Example_Translation: 這隻小狗剛好重三公斤。

Meaning: To whisper means to say very quietly.
Meaning_Translation: 「耳語」是指非常小聲地說話。
Example: We have to whisper in the library so people can focus on reading.
Example_Translation: 我們在圖書館要小聲說話，以免打擾別人閱讀。

Meaning: An abstract thing is an idea or thought, not a physical thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「抽象的」東西是想法或思維，而非實體。
Example: The idea of beauty is abstract and changes over time.
Example_Translation: 美的概念是抽象的，且隨時間改變。

Meaning: An annual event happens once a year.
Meaning_Translation: 「一年一度的」活動每年發生一次。
Example: The only time I see my aunts and uncles is at our annual family picnic.
Example_Translation: 我只有在年度家庭野餐時見到叔伯阿姨。

Meaning: Clay is a type of heavy, wet soil used to make pots.
Meaning_Translation: 「黏土」是用來製作陶器的厚重濕土。
Example: She made a bowl out of the clay.
Example_Translation: 她用黏土做了一個碗。

Meaning: Cloth is material used to make clothes.
Meaning_Translation: 「布料」是用來做衣服的材料。
Example: His shirt is made of a very soft type of cloth.
Example_Translation: 他的襯衫是用非常柔軟的布料做的。

Meaning: A curtain is a cloth hung over a window or used to divide a room.
Meaning_Translation: 「窗簾」是掛在窗戶上或用來分隔房間的布。
Example: She opened the curtains to let light into the room.
Example_Translation: 她拉開窗簾讓光線進來。

Meaning: To deserve is to be worthy of something as a result of one’s actions.
Meaning_Translation: 「值得」是指因自己的行為而配得某物。
Example: The dog deserved a bone for behaving very well.
Example_Translation: 這隻狗表現很好，值得一根骨頭。

Meaning: Feathers are the things covering a bird’s bodies.
Meaning_Translation: 「羽毛」是覆蓋鳥類身體的東西。
Example: That bird has orange feathers on its chest.
Example_Translation: 那隻鳥胸前有橘色羽毛。

Meaning: Fertile land is able to produce good crops and plants.
Meaning_Translation: 「肥沃的」土地能生產良好的作物和植物。
Example: The farmer grew many vegetables in the fertile soil.
Example_Translation: 農夫在肥沃土壤種了很多蔬菜。

Meaning: A flood is an event in which water covers an area that is usually dry.
Meaning_Translation: 「洪水」是水淹沒通常乾燥地區的事件。
Example: After three days of rain, there was a flood in the city.
Example_Translation: 連續三天下雨後，城市淹水了。

Meaning: Furniture means the things used in a house such as tables and chairs.
Meaning_Translation: 「家具」是指家中使用的物品，如桌子和椅子。
Example: His living room only had a few simple pieces of furniture.
Example_Translation: 他客廳只有幾件簡單家具。

Meaning: A grave is the place where a dead person is buried.
Meaning_Translation: 「墳墓」是埋葬死者的地方。
Example: We visit our grandfather’s grave each year.
Example_Translation: 我們每年去掃祖父的墓。

Meaning: An ideal thing is the best that it can possibly be.
Meaning_Translation: 「理想的」東西是可能達到的最佳狀態。
Example: This house is an ideal place for my family. It has everything we need.
Example_Translation: 這房子是我家的理想住所，有我們需要的一切。

Meaning: Intelligence is the ability to learn and understand things.
Meaning_Translation: 「智力」是學習和理解事物的能力。
Example: Because of his high intelligence, he finished school early.
Example_Translation: 他因高智商而提早畢業。

Meaning: To obtain is to get something you want or need.
Meaning_Translation: 「獲得」是指得到你想要或需要的東西。
Example: After I passed the test, I obtained my driver’s license.
Example_Translation: 我通過考試後拿到駕照。

Meaning: Religious means related to or about religion.
Meaning_Translation: 「宗教的」意思是與宗教相關或有關。
Example: The holy man spoke about religious topics.
Example_Translation: 這位聖人談論宗教話題。

Meaning: Romantic means related to or about love.
Meaning_Translation: 「浪漫的」意思是與愛情相關或有關。
Example: The young couple went to see a romantic movie.
Example_Translation: 這對年輕情侶去看愛情片。

Meaning: A shell is a hard covering that protects the body of some sea creatures.
Meaning_Translation: 「貝殼」是保護某些海洋生物身體的硬殼。
Example: There were many pretty shells on the beach.
Example_Translation: 海灘上有許多漂亮的貝殼。

Meaning: A shore is the edge of a large body of water.
Meaning_Translation: 「岸」是大片水域的邊緣。
Example: All of the boats were floating near the shore.
Example_Translation: 所有船都停在岸邊。

Meaning: A wheel is a round thing on a vehicle that turns when it moves.
Meaning_Translation: 「輪子」是車輛上移動時會轉動的圓形部件。
Example: A car has four wheels.
Example_Translation: 汽車有四個輪子。

Meaning: Wooden objects are made of wood.
Meaning_Translation: 「木製的」物品是用木頭做的。
Example: My mother gave me a wooden spoon.
Example_Translation: 我媽給我一把木湯匙。

Meaning: An appliance is a piece of equipment used for jobs in the home.
Meaning_Translation: 「家電」是用於家庭工作的設備。
Example: Many homes have appliances like ovens, toasters, and refrigerators.
Example_Translation: 許多家庭有烤箱、烤麵包機和冰箱等家電。

Meaning: A basin is large bowl for washing things. A sink is sometimes called a basin.
Meaning_Translation: 「臉盆」是用來洗東西的大碗，水槽有時也叫臉盆。
Example: She filled the basin with water and washed her face.
Example_Translation: 她把臉盆裝滿水洗臉。

Meaning: A broom is a brush with a long handle used for cleaning floors.
Meaning_Translation: 「掃帚」是用來清掃地板、帶長柄的刷子。
Example: My father usually uses a broom to sweep away dust in the basement.
Example_Translation: 我爸通常用掃帚清理地下室灰塵。

Meaning: A caterpillar is a small insect that looks like a worm and eats plants.
Meaning_Translation: 「毛毛蟲」是看起來像蠕蟲、會吃植物的小昆蟲。
Example: After eating a lot of leaves, caterpillars change into butterflies.
Example_Translation: 毛毛蟲吃很多葉子後會變成蝴蝶。

Meaning: A cupboard is a piece of furniture that is used to store food or household items.
Meaning_Translation: 「櫥櫃」是用來存放食物或家居用品的家具。
Example: We put all of our dishes and food in the cupboards.
Example_Translation: 我們把所有餐具和食物放在櫥櫃裡。

Meaning: Delicate things are easy to break or harm.
Meaning_Translation: 「易碎的」東西容易破壞或損傷。
Example: You should hold the baby carefully because she’s very delicate.
Example_Translation: 你要小心抱嬰兒，因為她很嬌弱。

Meaning: To emerge from something means to come out of it.
Meaning_Translation: 「出現」是指從某物中出來。
Example: A groundhog emerged from a snow covered hole.
Example_Translation: 土撥鼠從積雪的洞裡鑽出來。

Meaning: A handicap is a condition that limits someone’s mental or physical abilities.
Meaning_Translation: 「障礙」是限制某人心智或身體能力的狀況。
Example: Joe has a slight handicap, so he uses a walker to get around.
Example_Translation: 喬有輕微殘障，所以用助行器走動。

Meaning: A hole is a hollow space in something solid.
Meaning_Translation: 「洞」是固體中的空腔。
Example: They made a big hole in the wall.
Example_Translation: 他們在牆上挖了個大洞。

Meaning: A hook is a sharp curved piece of metal used for catching or holding things.
Meaning_Translation: 「鉤子」是用來捕捉或固定東西的尖銳彎曲金屬片。
Example: The fish went after the sharp hook.
Example_Translation: 魚咬上了鋒利的魚鉤。

Meaning: To hop means to jump a short distance.
Meaning_Translation: 「跳躍」是指短距離跳躍。
Example: The kangaroo quickly hopped away from danger.
Example_Translation: 袋鼠迅速跳離危險。

Meaning: Laundry is clothes that have been or need to be washed.
Meaning_Translation: 「待洗衣物」是已經或需要清洗的衣服。
Example: He folded the clean laundry and put the dirty laundry in a basket.
Example_Translation: 他折好乾淨衣服，把髒衣服放進籃子。

Meaning: To pursue is to chase or follow someone or something.
Meaning_Translation: 「追趕」是指追逐或跟隨某人或某物。
Example: The mother pursued her young child down the hill.
Example_Translation: 媽媽追著小孩下山。

Meaning: Reluctant means not wanting to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「不情願的」意思是不想做某事。
Example: She was reluctant to say that she saw the robbery.
Example_Translation: 她不願意說她看到搶劫。

Meaning: Sleeves are the part of a shirt in which arms go.
Meaning_Translation: 「袖子」是襯衫中手臂穿入的部分。
Example: Ryan bought a new shirt with long sleeves to keep his arms warm.
Example_Translation: 萊恩買了新長袖襯衫保暖。

Meaning: The spine is the group of bones that run up and down the middle of the back.
Meaning_Translation: 「脊椎」是沿背部中央上下延伸的一組骨頭。
Example: Our spine helps us to stand up nice and straight.
Example_Translation: 脊椎幫助我們挺直站立。

Meaning: A stain is a dirty mark that is difficult to clean.
Meaning_Translation: 「污漬」是難以清除的髒痕。
Example: He had a red stain on the collar of his shirt.
Example_Translation: 他襯衫領子有紅色污漬。

Meaning: A strip is a long, narrow piece of material or land.
Meaning_Translation: 「條狀物」是長而窄的材料或土地。
Example: He had long strips of film that held images of his trip abroad.
Example_Translation: 他有長條底片記錄國外旅行。

Meaning: To swear means to promise to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「發誓」是指承諾做某事。
Example: I will put my hand on the Bible and swear to do my best for the country.
Example_Translation: 我會把手放在聖經上，發誓為國家盡力。

Meaning: To swing something means to move it back and forth or from side to side.
Meaning_Translation: 「擺動」某物是指來回或左右移動它。
Example: He can swing a golf club very powerfully.
Example_Translation: 他能有力地揮動高爾夫球桿。

Meaning: An acre is a unit for measuring area.
Meaning_Translation: 「英畝」是測量面積的單位。
Example: They lived on a 150-acre farm.
Example_Translation: 他們住在150英畝的農場。

Meaning: The afterlife is a life that some people believe begins when a person dies.
Meaning_Translation: 「來世」是有些人相信人死後開始的生命。
Example: I believe that there is an afterlife.
Example_Translation: 我相信有來世。

Meaning: Archaeology is the study of the remains left by ancient societies.
Meaning_Translation: 「考古學」是研究古代社會遺留物的學科。
Example: He enjoyed visiting the Great Pyramids of Egypt because he loves archaeology.
Example_Translation: 他熱愛考古學，所以喜歡參觀埃及金字塔。

Meaning: A chamber is a closed space or room used for a special purpose.
Meaning_Translation: 「密室」是用於特殊目的的封閉空間或房間。
Example: The meeting was held in the faculty chamber.
Example_Translation: 會議在教職員室舉行。

Meaning: A channel is a long, deep space between two edges.
Meaning_Translation: 「水道」是兩側邊緣之間的長而深的空間。
Example: The river cut a channel through the rocks.
Example_Translation: 河流在岩石中切出河道。

Meaning: A core is the main or central part of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「核心」是某物的主要或中心部分。
Example: Earth has a solid inner core.
Example_Translation: 地球有固態內核。

Meaning: A corridor is a narrow passage that leads into other areas.
Meaning_Translation: 「走廊」是通往其他區域的狹窄通道。
Example: He took the corridor on the left to go to his office.
Example_Translation: 他走左邊走廊去辦公室。

Meaning: A distinct thing is different or stands out.
Meaning_Translation: 「明顯的」東西是不同或突出的。
Example: He has a distinct accent.
Example_Translation: 他有明顯的口音。

Meaning: Elite means of or from a high-level group.
Meaning_Translation: 「精英的」意思是屬於或來自高階群體。
Example: Only an elite group was allowed membership into the club.
Example_Translation: 只有精英群體能加入這俱樂部。

Meaning: To engineer something is to skillfully plan out how to make that thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「設計」某物是指巧妙地規劃如何製造它。
Example: After engineering the robot, they needed to find the correct parts to build it.
Example_Translation: 設計好機器人後，他們需要找正確零件來組裝。

Meaning: To found something means to start, organize, or establish that thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「創立」某物是指開始、組織或建立它。
Example: My grandfather founded the City Bank.
Example_Translation: 我祖父創立了城市銀行。

Meaning: A gap is a space between two things.
Meaning_Translation: 「縫隙」是兩物之間的空間。
Example: There is a small gap between the blocks of wood.
Example_Translation: 木塊之間有個小縫隙。

Meaning: Glory is the importance, magnificence, or specialness of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「榮耀」是某物的重要性、壯麗或特殊性。
Example: They enjoyed the glory of the beautiful sunset.
Example_Translation: 他們享受美麗日落的輝煌。

Meaning: An interior is the inside of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「內部」是某物的裡面。
Example: They looked at the interior of the box.
Example_Translation: 他們看盒子內部。

Meaning: A lion is a large animal in the cat family.
Meaning_Translation: 「獅子」是貓科中的大型動物。
Example: We went to see the lion at the zoo.
Example_Translation: 我們去動物園看獅子。

Meaning: A role is a job, position, or part in something.
Meaning_Translation: 「角色」是某事中的工作、職位或部分。
Example: Her role in the office is to sell products to customers.
Example_Translation: 她在辦公室的職責是向客戶銷售產品。

Meaning: Royal means related to a king or queen.
Meaning_Translation: 「皇家的」意思是與國王或女王相關。
Example: The Duchess was part of the royal family.
Example_Translation: 公爵夫人是皇室成員。

Meaning: A sole person or thing is the only one.
Meaning_Translation: 「唯一的」人或事物是僅有的。
Example: She was the sole woman in the room.
Example_Translation: 她是房間裡唯一的女性。

Meaning: Stairs are a set of steps built to go from one level of a building to another.
Meaning_Translation: 「樓梯」是一組用來連接建築物不同樓層的階梯。
Example: He took the stairs instead of the elevator.
Example_Translation: 他走樓梯而不搭電梯。

Meaning: The surface is the top layer of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「表面」是某物的頂層。
Example: She wiped the surface of the table.
Example_Translation: 她擦拭桌面。

Meaning: An agreement is a formal decision about future action.
Meaning_Translation: 「協議」是關於未來行動的正式決定。
Example: I think you’ll get Tom’s agreement to this proposal.
Example_Translation: 我認為你會得到湯姆對這提案的同意。

Meaning: To arise is to happen.
Meaning_Translation: 「發生」是指某事出現。
Example: Difficulties arose with his computer because it was old.
Example_Translation: 他的舊電腦出了問題。

Meaning: A benefactor is a person who gives money to help someone.
Meaning_Translation: 「捐助者」是出錢幫助他人的人。
Example: The student’s benefactor gave him money to spend on his studies.
Example_Translation: 這學生的贊助人給他錢供讀書。

Meaning: A blacksmith is a person who makes things out of metal.
Meaning_Translation: 「鐵匠」是用金屬製造東西的人。
Example: The blacksmith pounded the piece of metal until it was flat.
Example_Translation: 鐵匠把金屬敲打至扁平。

Meaning: A chimney is a tall pipe used to carry smoke out of a building.
Meaning_Translation: 「煙囪」是用來將煙排出建築物的高管。
Example: The cat was sitting on the roof next to the chimney.
Example_Translation: 貓坐在屋頂煙囪旁。

Meaning: To compensate is to pay someone for the time they spent doing something.
Meaning_Translation: 「補償」是指為某人花費的時間付錢。
Example: Her boss compensated her for the extra work she did last week.
Example_Translation: 老闆補償她上週的加班。

Meaning: To encounter is to find or meet a person or thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「遭遇」是指遇到某人或某物。
Example: I encountered a sea turtle while I was swimming.
Example_Translation: 我游泳時遇到海龜。

Meaning: To exceed is to be more than something.
Meaning_Translation: 「超過」是指多於某物。
Example: Since I exceeded my limit, I decided to get rid of my credit cards.
Example_Translation: 我超額消費後決定剪掉信用卡。

Meaning: To forge is to make or produce, especially with difficulty.
Meaning_Translation: 「鍛造」是指製造或生產，尤其指困難地。
Example: Stacy and Heather forged their friendship when they were teenagers.
Example_Translation: 史黛西和海瑟青少年時建立深厚友誼。

Meaning: People who are humble do not believe that they are better than other people.
Meaning_Translation: 「謙虛的」人不認為自己比別人優越。
Example: Even though Bob is the smartest boy in his class, he is humble.
Example_Translation: 雖然鮑伯是班上最聰明的男孩，但他很謙虛。

Meaning: Iron is a strong metal that is used to make many objects.
Meaning_Translation: 「鐵」是用來製造許多物品的堅硬金屬。
Example: The horse had shoes made of iron.
Example_Translation: 馬穿著鐵製馬蹄鐵。

Meaning: A ladder is an object that is used to climb up and down things.
Meaning_Translation: 「梯子」是用來爬上爬下的工具。
Example: He used a ladder to climb to the top of his tree house.
Example_Translation: 他用梯子爬上樹屋頂部。

Meaning: If people are modest, they do not think that they are too important.
Meaning_Translation: 「謙遜的」人不認為自己太重要。
Example: Derek is very modest for someone who is so rich.
Example_Translation: 德瑞克這麼富有卻很謙虛。

Meaning: To occupy a place is to live, work, or be there.
Meaning_Translation: 「佔據」某地是指住在、工作或待在那裡。
Example: Kevin and Alice occupied the chairs and had a long discussion.
Example_Translation: 凱文和愛麗絲坐在椅子上長談。

Meaning: A penny is a coin worth one cent.
Meaning_Translation: 「便士」是價值一分錢的硬幣。
Example: US President Abraham Lincoln is on the penny.
Example_Translation: 美國一分錢硬幣上有林肯總統。

Meaning: To preach is to talk about and promote a religious idea.
Meaning_Translation: 「宣講」是指談論並推廣宗教理念。
Example: Aaron often preached about living an honest life.
Example_Translation: 亞倫常講道要誠實生活。

Meaning: To prosper is to be successful or make a lot of money.
Meaning_Translation: 「繁榮」是指成功或賺很多錢。
Example: Frank’s new business finally prospered after many years of hard work.
Example_Translation: 法蘭克的新事業多年努力後終於興旺。

Meaning: A province is an area that is controlled by a country.
Meaning_Translation: 「省」是受國家控制的地區。
Example: Canada is divided into several different provinces.
Example_Translation: 加拿大分為多個省份。

Meaning: Satisfaction is the feeling of having done or received something good.
Meaning_Translation: 「滿足」是做了或收到好事的感覺。
Example: Brad was filled with satisfaction when he saw what was for dinner.
Example_Translation: 布拉德看到晚餐菜色感到非常滿足。

Meaning: To sustain something is to keep it going.
Meaning_Translation: 「維持」某事是指讓它持續下去。
Example: Wind power is a clean way to sustain a city with energy.
Example_Translation: 風力是潔淨的能源，可持續供應城市。

Meaning: To acquire something is to get or gain possession of that thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「取得」某物是指獲得或擁有它。
Example: Tina acquired a strange package yesterday.
Example_Translation: 蒂娜昨天收到一個奇怪包裹。

Meaning: An awkward thing is embarrassing and uncomfortable.
Meaning_Translation: 「尷尬的」東西令人尷尬且不舒服。
Example: After dropping his coffee cup, Robbie felt awkward.
Example_Translation: 羅比打翻咖啡杯後覺得很尷尬。

Meaning: A caretaker is a person who takes care of very young, old, or sick people.
Meaning_Translation: 「照護者」是照顧幼兒、老人或病患的人。
Example: My grandmother’s caretaker helps her get around the house.
Example_Translation: 我奶奶的看護幫她在屋子裡行動。

Meaning: To deceive is to make someone believe something that is not true.
Meaning_Translation: 「欺騙」是指讓某人相信不真實的事。
Example: He tried to deceive his friends with a card trick.
Example_Translation: 他試圖用魔術牌騙朋友。

Meaning: To discourage is to make someone feel less excited about something.
Meaning_Translation: 「打消…的念頭」是指讓某人對某事不那麼熱衷。
Example: Mr. Perry discouraged the students from quitting school.
Example_Translation: 佩里先生勸阻學生不要輟學。

Meaning: A fake thing is made to look real in order to trick people.
Meaning_Translation: 「假的」東西是為了欺騙人而做得像真的。
Example: The model was wearing fake hair.
Example_Translation: 模特兒戴的是假髮。

Meaning: Hatred is a strong feeling of not liking someone or something.
Meaning_Translation: 「憎恨」是強烈不喜歡某人或某物的感覺。
Example: I have a hatred for the taste of medicine.
Example_Translation: 我討厭藥的味道。

Meaning: A hut is a house made of wood, grass, or mud that has only one or two rooms.
Meaning_Translation: 「小屋」是用木頭、草或泥巴蓋的、只有一兩間房的房子。
Example: We all went into the hut to sleep.
Example_Translation: 我們都進小屋睡覺。

Meaning: An inferior thing is not as good as something else.
Meaning_Translation: 「較差的」東西不如其他東西好。
Example: Cars built a hundred years ago are inferior to ones built today.
Example_Translation: 百年前的汽車不如現代汽車。

Meaning: A lodge is a house in the mountains used by people who hunt or fish.
Meaning_Translation: 「山中小屋」是獵人或釣魚者在山中使用的小屋。
Example: During our ski trip, we stayed at a lodge.
Example_Translation: 滑雪旅行時我們住在山中小屋。

Meaning: To neglect someone or something is to not take care of it properly.
Meaning_Translation: 「疏忽」某人或某物是指沒有好好照顧。
Example: William neglected his room, so it is a complete mess.
Example_Translation: 威廉 neglect 他的房間，所以亂七八糟。

Meaning: A newcomer is a person who has recently arrived at a place or a group.
Meaning_Translation: 「新來者」是最近到達某地或某團體的人。
Example: The students happily welcomed the newcomer to the school.
Example_Translation: 學生開心歡迎新同學。

Meaning: An offense is behavior that is wrong or breaks a law.
Meaning_Translation: 「違法行為」是錯誤或違法的行為。
Example: Stealing a car is a very serious offense.
Example_Translation: 偷車是非常嚴重的罪行。

Meaning: To overlook something is to not notice it or to not realize that it is important.
Meaning_Translation: 「忽略」某事是指沒注意到或沒意識到它的重要性。
Example: Brenda overlooked the last step and had a bad fall.
Example_Translation: 布蘭達忽略了最後一步，結果狠狠摔了一跤。

Meaning: To repay is to pay back or to reward someone or something.
Meaning_Translation: 「償還」是指還錢或報答某人或某事。
Example: She repaid her friend for all of his hard work with a small gift.
Example_Translation: 她送小禮物感謝朋友的辛勞。

Meaning: A ridiculous thing is silly or strange.
Meaning_Translation: 「荒謬的」東西是愚蠢或奇怪的。
Example: Steve looked ridiculous with those huge blue sunglasses.
Example_Translation: 史蒂夫戴那副超大藍色太陽眼鏡看起來很滑稽。

Meaning: A satisfactory thing is good enough.
Meaning_Translation: 「令人滿意的」東西是夠好的。
Example: Mina often received satisfactory grades since she studied so hard.
Example_Translation: 米娜因用功讀書，成績常令人滿意。

Meaning: A shepherd is a person who protects and cares for sheep.
Meaning_Translation: 「牧羊人」是保護和照顧羊群的人。
Example: The shepherd moved the sheep to another field.
Example_Translation: 牧羊人把羊群趕到另一片牧場。

Meaning: To venture is to go to a place that may be dangerous.
Meaning_Translation: 「冒險」是指前往可能危險的地方。
Example: Even though it was dangerous, they ventured up the mountain.
Example_Translation: 雖然危險，他們還是冒險上山。

Meaning: Wheat is a plant from which we get the grain used to make bread.
Meaning_Translation: 「小麥」是我們用來製作麵包穀物的植物。
Example: The field of golden wheat was ready to be harvested.
Example_Translation: 金黃色的麥田準備收割。

Meaning: An alley is a narrow road between houses or buildings.
Meaning_Translation: 「小巷」是房屋或建築物之間的窄路。
Example: The alley behind my house looks dirty.
Example_Translation: 我家後面的小巷看起來很髒。

Meaning: An ax is a tool used to cut wood.
Meaning_Translation: 「斧頭」是用來砍木頭的工具。
Example: She used an ax to cut some wood for the fire.
Example_Translation: 她用斧頭砍柴生火。

Meaning: A bunch is a group of the same things.
Meaning_Translation: 「一束」是一群相同的東西。
Example: She was hungry, so she ate the entire bunch of grapes.
Example_Translation: 她餓了，所以吃掉整串葡萄。

Meaning: A chore is an unpleasant job that must be done.
Meaning_Translation: 「家務」是必須做但令人不快的工作。
Example: It’s Nikki’s chore to do the dishes every Tuesday and Wednesday night.
Example_Translation: 妮基每週二、三晚上負責洗碗。

Meaning: A decent person or thing is OK or good enough.
Meaning_Translation: 「體面的」人或事物是還不錯或夠好的。
Example: Eric did a decent job painting the fence.
Example_Translation: 艾瑞克把圍籬漆得不錯。

Meaning: Disgraceful behavior is behavior that is very bad.
Meaning_Translation: 「可恥的」行為是非常糟糕的行為。
Example: This is a disgraceful waste of money.
Example_Translation: 這是可恥的浪費錢。

Meaning: The elbow is the middle part of an arm, where it bends.
Meaning_Translation: 「手肘」是手臂中間彎曲的部分。
Example: She pointed to her elbow to show me where she hurt herself.
Example_Translation: 她指著手肘告訴我哪裡受傷。

Meaning: A grateful person feels thankful about something.
Meaning_Translation: 「感激的」人對某事心存感謝。
Example: The girls were grateful for the chance to visit their grandfather.
Example_Translation: 女孩們很感激能去看爺爺。

Meaning: To irritate means to annoy someone.
Meaning_Translation: 「激怒」是指惹惱某人。
Example: She was irritated when her brother told her that he had lost her camera.
Example_Translation: 她哥哥說弄丟她的相機，她很生氣。

Meaning: To kid is to say something that is not true as a joke.
Meaning_Translation: 「開玩笑」是指說不真實的話當作笑話。
Example: I am not really mad. I was kidding when I said I was angry.
Example_Translation: 我不是真的生氣，剛才說生氣是開玩笑。

Meaning: A loose thing is not held in place tightly.
Meaning_Translation: 「鬆的」東西沒有被緊緊固定。
Example: The bolt was loose, so I tightened it with the wrench.
Example_Translation: 螺栓鬆了，我用扳手鎖緊。

Meaning: To offend is to make someone angry or upset.
Meaning_Translation: 「冒犯」是指讓某人生氣或不開心。
Example: They were both offended by what they had said to each other.
Example_Translation: 他們互相說的話都冒犯了對方。

Meaning: An overnight action happens during the night.
Meaning_Translation: 「一夜之間」的行動是在夜間發生的。
Example: The campers stayed in the tent overnight.
Example_Translation: 露營者在帳篷過夜。

Meaning: To persist means to keep doing something even when it is hard.
Meaning_Translation: 「堅持」是指即使困難也繼續做某事。
Example: Even though the lesson was difficult, he persisted until he understood.
Example_Translation: 雖然課程很難，他堅持到弄懂為止。

Meaning: A pine is a type of tall, thin tree with needles instead of leaves.
Meaning_Translation: 「松樹」是一種高而細、有針葉而非普通葉子的樹。
Example: There were many beautiful pine trees in the forest.
Example_Translation: 森林裡有很多美麗的松樹。

Meaning: A scar is a mark on the skin after a wound heals.
Meaning_Translation: 「疤痕」是傷口癒合後皮膚上的痕跡。
Example: The man had horrible scars on his cheek and forehead.
Example_Translation: 這男人臉頰和額頭有可怕的疤痕。

Meaning: A sensation is a feeling that people get from their senses.
Meaning_Translation: 「感覺」是人們從感官獲得的感受。
Example: Mom got a painful sensation in her head from the loud noise.
Example_Translation: 媽媽因大聲噪音頭痛。

Meaning: A sled is a small vehicle used on snow.
Meaning_Translation: 「雪橇」是在雪地上使用的小型交通工具。
Example: Marvin likes to ride his sled down the hill in winter.
Example_Translation: 馬文喜歡冬天坐雪橇滑下山坡。

Meaning: To tease means to laugh at or make fun of someone.
Meaning_Translation: 「取笑」是指嘲笑或捉弄某人。
Example: Jake teased Charlie because he was the new student.
Example_Translation: 傑克因為查理是新生而捉弄他。

Meaning: A valentine is someone loved or admired with great affection.
Meaning_Translation: 「情人」是深受喜愛或欽佩的人。
Example: Harry wanted Molly to be his valentine.
Example_Translation: 哈利希望茉莉當他的情人節對象。

Meaning: To acquaint is to get to know something or someone.
Meaning_Translation: 「認識」是指了解某事或某人。
Example: Nancy acquainted herself with the new computer.
Example_Translation: 南希熟悉了新電腦。

Meaning: A cemetery is a place where people are buried when they die.
Meaning_Translation: 「墓園」是人死後被埋葬的地方。
Example: Some people are scared of cemeteries.
Example_Translation: 有些人害怕墓園。

Meaning: A creature is an animal or person.
Meaning_Translation: 「生物」是動物或人。
Example: Those creatures live in Africa.
Example_Translation: 那些生物住在非洲。

Meaning: To curse someone is to hope that bad things happen to that person.
Meaning_Translation: 「詛咒」某人是指希望壞事發生在他身上。
Example: The witch cursed the village.
Example_Translation: 女巫詛咒了村莊。

Meaning: A disguise is something you wear so people cannot tell who you are.
Meaning_Translation: 「偽裝」是你穿著讓別人認不出你是誰的東西。
Example: Everyone knew that it was Dad in the Santa disguise.
Example_Translation: 大家都知道聖誕老人裝扮的是爸爸。

Meaning: A fancy thing is nicer or more detailed than normal.
Meaning_Translation: 「精緻的」東西比平常更漂亮或更細緻。
Example: Their table was all set for a fancy dinner.
Example_Translation: 他們的餐桌已備好華麗晚餐。

Meaning: A flashlight is a small electric light that people carry in their hands.
Meaning_Translation: 「手電筒」是人們手持的小型電燈。
Example: We took a flashlight when we went camping.
Example_Translation: 我們露營時帶了手電筒。

Meaning: A hood is part of a coat that goes over a person’s head.
Meaning_Translation: 「兜帽」是外套上蓋住頭部的部分。
Example: She put on her hood to keep her head warm.
Example_Translation: 她戴上兜帽保暖。

Meaning: An inhabitant is a person who lives in a certain place.
Meaning_Translation: 「居民」是住在某地的人。
Example: The number of inhabitants in the countryside is increasing.
Example_Translation: 鄉村居民人數在增加。

Meaning: To nourish is to give someone or something the food needed to live.
Meaning_Translation: 「滋養」是指給予生存所需的食物。
Example: A good mother will nourish her baby every day.
Example_Translation: 好媽媽每天哺育寶寶。

Meaning: A pirate is a sailor who steals things from other boats.
Meaning_Translation: 「海盜」是從其他船隻偷東西的水手。
Example: Pirates are very scary characters.
Example_Translation: 海盜是很可怕的角色。

Meaning: A publication is something printed, like a newspaper or book.
Meaning_Translation: 「出版物」是印刷品，如報紙或書籍。
Example: She’s been a subscriber to that publication for over ten years.
Example_Translation: 她訂閱這份刊物超過十年。

Meaning: A riddle is a question that is difficult to answer but meant to be funny.
Meaning_Translation: 「謎語」是難以回答但有意逗趣的問題。
Example: I could not answer Wendy’s riddle, but it made me laugh.
Example_Translation: 我答不出溫蒂的謎語，但它讓我笑了。

Meaning: To rot is to slowly get softer and become destroyed.
Meaning_Translation: 「腐爛」是指逐漸變軟並被破壞。
Example: The old log began to rot in the forest.
Example_Translation: 老木頭在森林裡開始腐爛。

Meaning: An action that happens shortly happens very soon.
Meaning_Translation: 「不久」發生的行動很快就會發生。
Example: My workday will end shortly.
Example_Translation: 我今天的工作快結束了。

Meaning: A skeleton is all the bones of a body.
Meaning_Translation: 「骨骼」是身體所有的骨頭。
Example: There is a skeleton in the science classroom.
Example_Translation: 自然教室裡有副骨骼標本。

Meaning: To spoil is to rot or to make bad.
Meaning_Translation: 「腐壞」是指腐爛或變壞。
Example: We left the fruit out too long, and it spoiled.
Example_Translation: 我們把水果放太久，結果壞掉了。

Meaning: To starve is to not get enough food for a long period of time.
Meaning_Translation: 「挨餓」是指長時間得不到足夠食物。
Example: During the war, many people starved.
Example_Translation: 戰爭期間很多人挨餓。

Meaning: A thrill is an exciting feeling.
Meaning_Translation: 「興奮」是令人激動的感覺。
Example: The surfer enjoys the thrill of surfing a big wave.
Example_Translation: 衝浪者享受乘大浪的刺激。

Meaning: A wicked person is very bad or evil.
Meaning_Translation: 「邪惡的」人非常壞或邪惡。
Example: My boss is a very wicked man.
Example_Translation: 我老闆是個很邪惡的人。

Meaning: To alert someone is to tell or warn that person about something.
Meaning_Translation: 「警告」某人是指告知或提醒他某事。
Example: The fire alarm alerted us that there was a problem.
Example_Translation: 火警提醒我們有問題。

Meaning: A broadcast is a television or radio show.
Meaning_Translation: 「廣播」是電視或電台節目。
Example: We watched the broadcast of the local news on TV.
Example_Translation: 我們在電視上看當地新聞轉播。

Meaning: A bulletin is a news report about very recent and important events.
Meaning_Translation: 「公告」是關於最新且重要事件的新聞報導。
Example: There was a live bulletin reporting on the economy of the city.
Example_Translation: 有現場新聞報導城市經濟狀況。

Meaning: A bump is a small raised area on a surface.
Meaning_Translation: 「凸起」是表面上的小隆起。
Example: The monkey got a bump on his head because he was hit by a rock.
Example_Translation: 猴子被石頭砸到頭，起了個包。

Meaning: To chop something means to cut it into pieces with a tool.
Meaning_Translation: 「剁碎」某物是指用工具將其切成塊。
Example: Mom chopped some vegetables to put into the stew.
Example_Translation: 媽媽切了些蔬菜放進燉菜。

Meaning: A closet is a small room used to store things.
Meaning_Translation: 「衣櫥」是用來存放物品的小房間。
Example: Marie has many clothes inside of her closet.
Example_Translation: 瑪麗衣櫃裡有很多衣服。

Meaning: To console is to give comfort to a person who feels sad.
Meaning_Translation: 「安慰」是指給予悲傷的人慰藉。
Example: When my dog ran away, my dad consoled me.
Example_Translation: 我狗狗跑掉時，爸爸安慰我。

Meaning: A district is a small part of a city, county, state, or country.
Meaning_Translation: 「區」是城市、郡、州或國家的一小部分。
Example: I live in a residential district of Seattle, Washington.
Example_Translation: 我住在華盛頓州西雅圖的住宅區。

Meaning: A drawer is a small part in furniture that is used to store things.
Meaning_Translation: 「抽屜」是家具中用來存放物品的小隔間。
Example: I put my clothes into the empty drawers.
Example_Translation: 我把衣服放進空抽屜。

Meaning: To endure means to experience and survive something difficult.
Meaning_Translation: 「忍受」是指經歷並熬過困難的事。
Example: She had to endure her husband shouting all day long.
Example_Translation: 她得忍受丈夫整天大吼大叫。

Meaning: To execute means to kill someone as a legal punishment.
Meaning_Translation: 「處決」是指依法殺死某人作為懲罰。
Example: Some people are executed for serious crimes.
Example_Translation: 有些人因重罪被處決。

Meaning: To grasp something means to hold it.
Meaning_Translation: 「抓緊」某物是指握住它。
Example: He grasped the bag of money tightly.
Example_Translation: 他緊緊抓住那袋錢。

Meaning: The rear of something is the back part of that thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「後部」是某物的後面部分。
Example: The man loaded the rear of his truck with boxes.
Example_Translation: 這男人把箱子裝在卡車後面。

Meaning: A senator is someone who makes laws for a state.
Meaning_Translation: 「參議員」是為州制定法律的人。
Example: The young senator promised to make laws that would help the people.
Example_Translation: 年輕參議員承諾制定有利人民的法律。

Meaning: A skull is the hard head bone that protects the brain.
Meaning_Translation: 「頭骨」是保護大腦的堅硬頭部骨骼。
Example: The brain is protected by the skull.
Example_Translation: 大腦由頭骨保護。

Meaning: To stir something means to mix it using something small, like a spoon.
Meaning_Translation: 「攪拌」某物是指用小工具（如湯匙）混合它。
Example: Mom stirred the batter until it was smooth.
Example_Translation: 媽媽攪拌麵糊直到順滑。

Meaning: To tap something is to hit it lightly.
Meaning_Translation: 「輕敲」某物是指輕輕敲打它。
Example: He tapped the keys of the keyboard to write a short word.
Example_Translation: 他輕敲鍵盤輸入一個簡短單字。

Meaning: A tremendous thing is very large or very good.
Meaning_Translation: 「巨大的」或「極好的」東西非常大或非常好。
Example: The Earth’s oceans are filled with a tremendous amount of water.
Example_Translation: 地球海洋含有大量水。

Meaning: Underneath means below or under.
Meaning_Translation: 「在下面」意思是下方或底下。
Example: The roots of a tree are located underneath the ground.
Example_Translation: 樹根位於地下。

Meaning: A worm is a small animal with a long, thin body.
Meaning_Translation: 「蠕蟲」是身體細長的小動物。
Example: Worms are often used to help catch fish.
Example_Translation: 蚯蚓常用來釣魚。

Meaning: To abandon something is to leave it forever or for a long time.
Meaning_Translation: 「拋棄」某物是指永遠或長期離開它。
Example: The old room had been abandoned years before.
Example_Translation: 這老房間多年前就被棄置了。

Meaning: An ambitious person wants to be rich or successful.
Meaning_Translation: 「有野心的」人想變得富有或成功。
Example: Kendra had to be ambitious to get into medical school.
Example_Translation: 肯德拉要有雄心才能進醫學院。

Meaning: To bark is to make a short, loud noise, like a dog.
Meaning_Translation: 「吠叫」是指發出短而響亮的聲音，像狗一樣。
Example: The dog barked loudly and frighteningly.
Example_Translation: 狗大聲又嚇人地吠叫。

Meaning: A bay is an area near the ocean where the land goes inward.
Meaning_Translation: 「海灣」是靠近海洋、陸地向內凹陷的區域。
Example: The Golden Gate Bridge crosses San Francisco Bay.
Example_Translation: 金門大橋橫跨舊金山灣。

Meaning: A brilliant person is very bright or smart.
Meaning_Translation: 「聰明的」人非常聰慧或聰明。
Example: My younger sister is brilliant for someone her age.
Example_Translation: 我妹妹在同齡人中非常聰明。

Meaning: A chin is the hard part at the bottom of a person’s face.
Meaning_Translation: 「下巴」是臉部下方的硬部分。
Example: Luke pointed to the hair on his chin.
Example_Translation: 路克指著他下巴的鬍子。

Meaning: A complaint is an expression of unhappiness about something.
Meaning_Translation: 「抱怨」是對某事表達不滿。
Example: Mom said she didn’t want to hear my brother’s complaints.
Example_Translation: 媽說她不想聽我哥哥抱怨。

Meaning: A deaf person or animal cannot hear.
Meaning_Translation: 「聾的」人或動物聽不見。
Example: Susan uses sign language because she is deaf.
Example_Translation: 蘇珊因聾而用手語。

Meaning: An enthusiastic person is excited by or interested in something.
Meaning_Translation: 「熱情的」人對某事感到興奮或感興趣。
Example: The man was enthusiastic about his job.
Example_Translation: 這男人對工作充滿熱情。

Meaning: An expedition is a long trip, usually to a place very far away.
Meaning_Translation: 「遠征」是長途旅行，通常去很遠的地方。
Example: They got into their spaceship to begin their expedition.
Example_Translation: 他們登上太空船開始遠征。

Meaning: The horizon is where the sky looks like it meets the ground.
Meaning_Translation: 「地平線」是天空看起來與地面相接的地方。
Example: The sun dipped below the horizon.
Example_Translation: 太陽沉到地平線下。

Meaning: Loyal people always help or support a certain person or thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「忠誠的」人總是幫助或支持特定的人或事物。
Example: The three friends are very loyal to each other.
Example_Translation: 這三個朋友彼此非常忠誠。

Meaning: The mayor is the person in charge of a city.
Meaning_Translation: 「市長」是負責城市的主管。
Example: The mayor of my hometown is quite a powerful speaker.
Example_Translation: 我老家的市長是位很有影響力的演說家。

Meaning: A mutual thing is felt in the same way by two or more people.
Meaning_Translation: 「相互的」事情是兩人或多人同樣感受到的。
Example: Robert likes Sarah, and she likes him. The feeling is mutual.
Example_Translation: 羅伯特喜歡莎拉，她也喜歡他，彼此互有好感。

Meaning: Overweight people or animals are heavier than is healthy.
Meaning_Translation: 「超重的」人或動物比健康體重更重。
Example: Lisa eats too much, so now she’s overweight.
Example_Translation: 麗莎吃太多，現在過重了。

Meaning: A refuge is a place of safety.
Meaning_Translation: 「避難所」是安全的地方。
Example: When it started to rain, she found refuge in the house.
Example_Translation: 開始下雨時，她躲進屋子避雨。

Meaning: To restore something is to put it back the way it was.
Meaning_Translation: 「恢復」某物是指把它恢復原狀。
Example: Victor restored the old car.
Example_Translation: 維克多修復了老車。

Meaning: To rub something is to push on it and move your hand back and forth.
Meaning_Translation: 「摩擦」某物是指壓住它並來回移動手。
Example: Mom’s feet were sore, so she rubbed them.
Example_Translation: 媽媽腳痠，所以按摩一下。

Meaning: The senses are how living things experience the world: sight, taste, smell, hearing and touch.
Meaning_Translation: 「感官」是生物體驗世界的方式：視覺、味覺、嗅覺、聽覺和觸覺。
Example: It would be hard to live without your five senses.
Example_Translation: 沒有五感會很難生活。

Meaning: A veterinarian is a doctor who takes care of animals.
Meaning_Translation: 「獸醫」是照顧動物的醫生。
Example: Wanda became a veterinarian because she loves dogs.
Example_Translation: 汪達因愛狗而成為獸醫。

Meaning: An anniversary is a day that celebrates something from the past.
Meaning_Translation: 「週年紀念日」是慶祝過去某事的日子。
Example: My parents went out to a restaurant for their wedding anniversary.
Example_Translation: 我父母去餐廳慶祝結婚紀念日。

Meaning: Arithmetic is math.
Meaning_Translation: 「算術」是數學。
Example: I like to study arithmetic at school.
Example_Translation: 我在學校喜歡學算術。

Meaning: Ashamed means feeling upset and embarrassed because of a bad action.
Meaning_Translation: 「羞愧的」意思是因壞行為而感到難過和尷尬。
Example: He was ashamed when he forgot his teacher’s name.
Example_Translation: 他忘記老師名字時覺得很羞愧。

Meaning: To burst is to suddenly break open or apart.
Meaning_Translation: 「爆裂」是指突然破裂或炸開。
Example: The bomb burst over the city.
Example_Translation: 炸彈在城市上空爆炸。

Meaning: A carpenter is a person who builds things with wood.
Meaning_Translation: 「木匠」是用木頭建造東西的人。
Example: We hired a carpenter to make a cupboard.
Example_Translation: 我們雇木匠做櫥櫃。

Meaning: Coal is a hard black material that people burn for heat.
Meaning_Translation: 「煤」是人們燃燒取暖的黑色硬質材料。
Example: Many power stations burn coal to produce energy.
Example_Translation: 許多發電廠燒煤發電。

Meaning: A couch is a long, soft seat that many people can sit on.
Meaning_Translation: 「沙發」是長而柔軟、可供多人坐的座椅。
Example: Kim and Martin’s new couch was very expensive.
Example_Translation: 金和馬丁的新沙發很貴。

Meaning: To drip is to fall a little bit at a time.
Meaning_Translation: 「滴落」是指一點一點地落下。
Example: I heard water dripping from the faucet.
Example_Translation: 我聽到水龍頭滴水聲。

Meaning: Something elegant is very fancy and pleasing.
Meaning_Translation: 「優雅的」東西非常精緻且令人愉悅。
Example: In Japan, women wear elegant kimonos on special occasions.
Example_Translation: 在日本，女性在特殊場合穿優雅和服。

Meaning: Fabric is cloth used to make clothes, furniture, etc.
Meaning_Translation: 「織物」是用來製作衣服、家具等的布料。
Example: The towels were made from a soft fabric.
Example_Translation: 毛巾是用柔軟布料做的。

Meaning: Highlands are high areas of land, usually with mountains.
Meaning_Translation: 「高地」是通常有山脈的高海拔地區。
Example: The man had a small home in the highlands.
Example_Translation: 這男人在高地有間小屋。

Meaning: Ivory is a hard, white substance that comes from elephants.
Meaning_Translation: 「象牙」是來自大象的堅硬白色物質。
Example: The elephant’s long ivory tusks looked very impressive.
Example_Translation: 大象長長的象牙看起來很威風。

Meaning: A mill is a building in which wheat is ground into flour.
Meaning_Translation: 「磨坊」是將小麥磨成麵粉的建築。
Example: The farmer took his wheat to the mill to make it into flour.
Example_Translation: 農夫把小麥送到磨坊磨成麵粉。

Meaning: A needle is a small, sharp piece of metal used to make or fix clothes.
Meaning_Translation: 「針」是用來縫製或修補衣服的小而尖的金屬片。
Example: I used a needle to fix the hole in my pants.
Example_Translation: 我用針縫補褲子的破洞。

Meaning: To polish something is to rub it in order to make it shiny.
Meaning_Translation: 「拋光」某物是指摩擦它使其發亮。
Example: Mark spent all morning polishing his shoes for the wedding.
Example_Translation: 馬克整個早上都在擦鞋準備婚禮。

Meaning: To sew means to put pieces of cloth together using string or thread.
Meaning_Translation: 「縫紉」是指用線將布片縫在一起。
Example: I learned to sew when I was a little girl.
Example_Translation: 我小時候學會縫紉。

Meaning: A shed is a small building in which people store things like tools.
Meaning_Translation: 「棚屋」是人們存放工具等物品的小建築。
Example: We have a small shed in the backyard for storage.
Example_Translation: 我們後院有個小儲藏室。

Meaning: A thread is a thin piece of string.
Meaning_Translation: 「線」是細的繩子。
Example: I have many different colors of thread at home.
Example_Translation: 我家有很多不同顏色的線。

Meaning: To trim something is to cut it a little bit.
Meaning_Translation: 「修剪」某物是指稍微剪掉一點。
Example: I had my hair trimmed this afternoon.
Example_Translation: 我今天下午修剪了頭髮。

Meaning: An upwards action moves vertically towards the direction above.
Meaning_Translation: 「向上」的動作是垂直朝上方移動。
Example: The kite went upwards further and further.
Example_Translation: 風箏越飛越高。

Meaning: An ally is someone who agrees to help or support another person or group.
Meaning_Translation: 「盟友」是同意幫助或支持另一人或團體的人。
Example: I was happy to find many allies who shared my opinion.
Example_Translation: 我很開心找到許多志同道合的盟友。

Meaning: To boast is to talk about how great one is.
Meaning_Translation: 「吹噓」是指談論自己有多厲害。
Example: We all became tired of listening to him boast about himself all day.
Example_Translation: 我們都聽膩了他整天自吹自擂。

Meaning: To bounce is to move up and away from a surface after hitting it.
Meaning_Translation: 「彈跳」是指撞擊表面後向上彈起。
Example: Owen bounced the ball on the ground.
Example_Translation: 歐文把球在地上彈跳。

Meaning: A bully is a person who is mean to others.
Meaning_Translation: 「霸凌者」是對他人刻薄的人。
Example: The two bullies always picked on the smaller, weaker kids.
Example_Translation: 兩個霸凌者總欺負弱小的孩子。

Meaning: Carbohydrates are substances in foods like bread that give energy.
Meaning_Translation: 「碳水化合物」是麵包等食物中提供能量的物質。
Example: Carbohydrates like rice are a good source of energy for active people.
Example_Translation: 米飯等碳水化合物是活躍人士的良好能量來源。

Meaning: To crawl is to move slowly on hands and knees.
Meaning_Translation: 「爬行」是指用手和膝蓋緩慢移動。
Example: The baby crawled across the floor.
Example_Translation: 嬰兒爬過地板。

Meaning: To defeat someone is to beat that person in a game or battle.
Meaning_Translation: 「擊敗」某人是指在遊戲或戰鬥中打贏他。
Example: The champion defeated the challenger in the boxing match.
Example_Translation: 冠軍在拳擊賽中擊敗挑戰者。

Meaning: A dial is a circular tool, like the front of a clock.
Meaning_Translation: 「錶盤」是圓形工具，像鐘錶的正面。
Example: I looked at the dial to see what time it was.
Example_Translation: 我看錶盤確認時間。

Meaning: A dominant person or thing is stronger than others.
Meaning_Translation: 「主導的」人或事物比其他更強。
Example: The gorilla is one of the dominant animals in the jungle.
Example_Translation: 大猩猩是叢林中的優勢動物之一。

Meaning: Entire means the whole thing or group.
Meaning_Translation: 「整個的」意思是全部的事物或群體。
Example: The entire table was covered with food.
Example_Translation: 整張桌子擺滿食物。

Meaning: Mercy is a feeling or act of kindness.
Meaning_Translation: 「仁慈」是善意的感覺或行為。
Example: He asked his boss for mercy and to not fire him.
Example_Translation: 他求老闆開恩別開除他。

Meaning: To nod is to move your head up and down.
Meaning_Translation: 「點頭」是指上下移動頭部。
Example: I nodded my head as I listened to the song.
Example_Translation: 我聽歌時點頭。

Meaning: An opponent is a person or group trying to defeat another person or group.
Meaning_Translation: 「對手」是試圖擊敗另一人或團體的人或群體。
Example: On the field, our opponents were too good for us.
Example_Translation: 在場上，對手太強了。

Meaning: To quarrel is to argue or fight.
Meaning_Translation: 「吵架」是指爭吵或打架。
Example: Billy quarreled with his wife about buying a new house.
Example_Translation: 比利和妻子為買新房吵架。

Meaning: A rival is someone trying to achieve the same thing as another.
Meaning_Translation: 「競爭對手」是試圖達成與另一人相同目標的人。
Example: The three rivals were all competing for the same job.
Example_Translation: 三個競爭者爭奪同一份工作。

Meaning: Sore means feeling or causing pain.
Meaning_Translation: 「疼痛的」意思是感到或引起疼痛。
Example: After lifting the heavy box, Mona’s back was sore.
Example_Translation: 莫娜搬重箱子後背痛。

Meaning: To sting is to cause pain by pushing a sharp part into the skin.
Meaning_Translation: 「刺痛」是指用尖銳部分刺入皮膚引起疼痛。
Example: The needle stung my arm and made me say, “Ouch!”
Example_Translation: 針扎到我手臂，讓我喊「哎呀！」

Meaning: To strain is to try very hard.
Meaning_Translation: 「努力」是指非常用力。
Example: Casey strained to lift the heavy box.
Example_Translation: 凱西用力抬起重箱子。

Meaning: Torture is action that causes physical or mental pain.
Meaning_Translation: 「折磨」是造成身體或精神痛苦的行為。
Example: Greg thought that writing the essay was torture.
Example_Translation: 葛瑞格覺得寫文章是種折磨。

Meaning: To wrestle is to try to push another competitor to the floor.
Meaning_Translation: 「摔角」是指試圖將對手壓倒在地。
Example: My dad loved to wrestle when he was in high school.
Example_Translation: 我爸高中時很愛摔角。
