Meaning: Absence is the state of something being away.
Meaning_Translation: 「缺席」是某物不在的狀態。
Example: There is an absence of sand in the hourglass.
Example_Translation: 沙漏裡沒有沙子了。

Meaning: An action done aloud is done so that people can hear it.
Meaning_Translation: 「大聲地」做某事是指讓人能聽見。
Example: My father often reads stories aloud to me and my sister.
Example_Translation: 我爸常大聲念故事給我和妹妹聽。

Meaning: A bald person or animal has no hair.
Meaning_Translation: 「禿頭的」人或動物沒有頭髮。
Example: My oldest brother is bald.
Example_Translation: 我大哥禿頭。

Meaning: A blanket is a piece of cloth that people use to keep warm or to sit upon.
Meaning_Translation: 「毯子」是人們用來保暖或坐著的布。
Example: I laid a blanket on the ground so that we could have a picnic.
Example_Translation: 我在地上鋪毯子準備野餐。

Meaning: To creep is to move quietly and slowly.
Meaning_Translation: 「悄悄移動」是指安靜且緩慢地移動。
Example: The cat slowly crept down the tree.
Example_Translation: 貓悄悄地從樹上下來。

Meaning: Divorce is the process of ending a marriage.
Meaning_Translation: 「離婚」是結束婚姻的過程。
Example: Divorce rates have increased in the past twenty years.
Example_Translation: 過去二十年離婚率上升。

Meaning: To imitate someone or something is to act in the exact same way.
Meaning_Translation: 「模仿」某人或某物是指完全照著做。
Example: He imitated his favorite superhero by putting on a costume.
Example_Translation: 他穿上戲服模仿最愛的超級英雄。

Meaning: An infant is a baby.
Meaning_Translation: 「嬰兒」是小寶寶。
Example: The infant cried all night.
Example_Translation: 嬰兒整晚哭鬧。

Meaning: To kidnap someone is to take that person illegally.
Meaning_Translation: 「綁架」某人是指非法帶走他。
Example: She was terrified to find out her son had been kidnapped.
Example_Translation: 她發現兒子被綁架時嚇壞了。

Meaning: A nap is a short sleep, usually during the day.
Meaning_Translation: 「小睡」是短暫的睡眠，通常在白天。
Example: I took a short nap because I had stayed up late last night.
Example_Translation: 我因昨晚熬夜而小睡片刻。

Meaning: Nowhere means no place or not existing.
Meaning_Translation: 「無處」意思是沒有地方或不存在。
Example: Unfortunately, water was nowhere to be found.
Example_Translation: 不幸的是，到處都找不到水。

Meaning: To pat something is to hit it softly with your hand.
Meaning_Translation: 「輕拍」某物是指用手輕輕打它。
Example: I patted some lotion onto my face.
Example_Translation: 我輕拍乳液到臉上。

Meaning: Relief is a good feeling after something bad or challenging ends.
Meaning_Translation: 「解脫」是在壞事或挑戰結束後的好感覺。
Example: I felt a sense of relief when I heard the good news.
Example_Translation: 聽到好消息時我鬆了一口氣。

Meaning: To reproduce is to make something exactly how someone else did it.
Meaning_Translation: 「複製」是指完全照別人的做法做出某物。
Example: The children tried to reproduce their house using toy blocks.
Example_Translation: 孩子們用積木試著重建他們的房子。

Meaning: A rhyme is writing or speech that has words with the same ending sounds.
Meaning_Translation: 「押韻」是文字或言語中詞尾發音相同的現象。
Example: “Humpty Dumpty” is an old rhyme that children learn in school.
Example_Translation: 《矮胖子》是孩子在校學的古老童謠。

Meaning: To suck is to put something in your mouth and try to get something out of it.
Meaning_Translation: 「吸吮」是指把東西放入口中並試圖吸出內容。
Example: The baby sucked milk from her bottle.
Example_Translation: 嬰兒從奶瓶吸奶。

Meaning: An urgent thing is important and needs to be done now.
Meaning_Translation: 「緊急的」事情很重要且需要立刻處理。
Example: He had to leave at that moment; it was urgent.
Example_Translation: 他當時非走不可，情況緊急。

Meaning: To vanish is to go away suddenly.
Meaning_Translation: 「消失」是指突然離開。
Example: All the passengers vanished from the train station.
Example_Translation: 所有乘客從火車站消失了。

Meaning: A wagon is a cart used to carry heavy things.
Meaning_Translation: 「馬車」是用來載重物的車。
Example: He used his wagon to carry some of his gifts.
Example_Translation: 他用推車運送部分禮物。

Meaning: A wrinkle is a line on a person’s face that appears as they get old.
Meaning_Translation: 「皺紋」是人年老時臉上出現的紋路。
Example: My grandfather has some wrinkles on his face.
Example_Translation: 我爺爺臉上有皺紋。

Meaning: Architecture is the design and form of a building.
Meaning_Translation: 「建築」是建築物的設計與形式。
Example: The Sydney Opera House is a good example of modern architecture.
Example_Translation: 雪梨歌劇院是現代建築的典範。

Meaning: A basket is a container made of woven materials that is used to carry things.
Meaning_Translation: 「籃子」是用編織材料製成、用來攜帶物品的容器。
Example: He put the vegetables in a basket.
Example_Translation: 他把蔬菜放進籃子。

Meaning: To bloom is to produce an open flower.
Meaning_Translation: 「開花」是指長出盛開的花朵。
Example: The white daisies were about to bloom.
Example_Translation: 白色雛菊即將開花。

Meaning: A canoe is a long, light boat with pointed ends.
Meaning_Translation: 「獨木舟」是兩端尖、輕便的長船。
Example: He paddled his canoe to the edge of the lake.
Example_Translation: 他划獨木舟到湖邊。

Meaning: A carpet is a thick, heavy, woven fabric used to cover the floor.
Meaning_Translation: 「地毯」是用來鋪地板的厚實重織物。
Example: His white living room carpet was soft.
Example_Translation: 他客廳的白色地毯很柔軟。

Meaning: A cousin is the child of one’s aunt and uncle.
Meaning_Translation: 「堂（表）兄弟姊妹」是叔伯或姑姨的孩子。
Example: My cousin looks just like me.
Example_Translation: 我表親長得跟我很像。

Meaning: A desk is a piece of furniture that people sit at to do work.
Meaning_Translation: 「書桌」是人們坐著工作的家具。
Example: She put the books on her desk.
Example_Translation: 她把書放在書桌上。

Meaning: A gallery is a large space where people can see works of art.
Meaning_Translation: 「美術館」是人們觀賞藝術作品的大空間。
Example: The art gallery displayed beautiful paintings.
Example_Translation: 美術館展出美麗畫作。

Meaning: A guest is someone who is invited to an event, occasion, or location.
Meaning_Translation: 「客人」是被邀請參加活動、場合或地點的人。
Example: Alice invited a special guest for dinner.
Example_Translation: 愛麗絲邀請特別賓客共進晚餐。

Meaning: A host is someone who invites a guest someplace.
Meaning_Translation: 「主人」是邀請客人到某地的人。
Example: He was a gracious host.
Example_Translation: 他是位親切的主人。

Meaning: The seventh month of the year is July.
Meaning_Translation: 「七月」是一年的第七個月。
Example: Her birthday is in July.
Example_Translation: 她的生日在七月。

Meaning: A modern thing belongs to the current time.
Meaning_Translation: 「現代的」東西屬於當今時代。
Example: The kitchen had a modern look.
Example_Translation: 廚房看起來很現代。

Meaning: A museum is a building that displays cultural, social, and scientific objects.
Meaning_Translation: 「博物館」是展示文化、社會和科學物品的建築。
Example: The Louvre is a famous museum in France.
Example_Translation: 羅浮宮是法國著名博物館。

Meaning: Pink is a pale shade of red.
Meaning_Translation: 「粉紅色」是淡紅色。
Example: She chose a pink lipstick.
Example_Translation: 她選了粉紅色口紅。

Meaning: A plane is a vehicle that has an engine and wings and flies in the air.
Meaning_Translation: 「飛機」是有引擎和機翼、能在空中飛行的交通工具。
Example: They took a plane across the ocean to India.
Example_Translation: 他們搭飛機越洋去印度。

Meaning: A refrigerator is a large electrical machine used to keep food cold.
Meaning_Translation: 「冰箱」是用來保持食物冰冷的大型電器。
Example: He kept milk, eggs, and butter in the refrigerator.
Example_Translation: 他把牛奶、蛋和奶油放在冰箱。

Meaning: A temperature is a measure of how hot or cold something is.
Meaning_Translation: 「溫度」是衡量某物冷熱程度的指標。
Example: In the winter, the temperature can drop below 0 degrees.
Example_Translation: 冬天溫度可能降到零度以下。

Meaning: A theater is a place where people can watch movies or live shows.
Meaning_Translation: 「戲院」是人們觀看電影或現場表演的地方。
Example: He took her to see a comedy show at the theater.
Example_Translation: 他帶她去劇院看喜劇表演。

Meaning: An upper position is a higher position.
Meaning_Translation: 「上方的」位置是較高的位置。
Example: He took the elevator to the upper floor.
Example_Translation: 他搭電梯到上層樓。

Meaning: To welcome is to greet someone or something with pleasure.
Meaning_Translation: 「歡迎」是指愉快地迎接某人或某事。
Example: She greeted her friends with a warm welcome.
Example_Translation: 她熱情歡迎朋友。

Meaning: To anticipate something is to think that it will happen.
Meaning_Translation: 「預期」某事是指認為它會發生。
Example: Carrie anticipated the arrival of her baby.
Example_Translation: 嘉莉期待寶寶的到來。

Meaning: A barrel is a round thing that you can keep liquids in.
Meaning_Translation: 「桶」是可以裝液體的圓形容器。
Example: There was an empty barrel outside the house.
Example_Translation: 屋外有個空桶。

Meaning: A beam is a heavy bar.
Meaning_Translation: 「橫樑」是沉重的長條。
Example: Modern skyscrapers are made with many beams.
Example_Translation: 現代摩天大樓用許多橫樑建造。

Meaning: A casual thing is relaxed or simple.
Meaning_Translation: 「隨意的」東西是輕鬆或簡單的。
Example: You can wear casual clothes, like jeans, to the party.
Example_Translation: 你可以穿休閒服（如牛仔褲）參加派對。

Meaning: Caution is care and attention in order to avoid danger.
Meaning_Translation: 「謹慎」是為避免危險而小心注意。
Example: Please use the power saw with caution. It is very dangerous.
Example_Translation: 請小心使用電鋸，很危險。

Meaning: A contrary thing is the opposite to another thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「相反的」東西是另一東西的對立面。
Example: It isn’t warm outside at all. On the contrary, it is quite cold.
Example_Translation: 外面一點也不暖和，反而很冷。

Meaning: A deliberate action is one done on purpose, not by accident.
Meaning_Translation: 「蓄意的」行動是故意做的，不是意外。
Example: Bernie made a deliberate attempt to injure Andy.
Example_Translation: 伯尼故意試圖傷害安迪。

Meaning: To dissolve something is to mix it into a liquid until it disappears.
Meaning_Translation: 「溶解」某物是指將其混入液體直到消失。
Example: I dissolved the pill in a glass of water.
Example_Translation: 我把藥丸溶在一杯水裡。

Meaning: To explode is to suddenly move apart in many smaller pieces.
Meaning_Translation: 「爆炸」是指突然分裂成許多小碎片。
Example: The old TV exploded when I plugged it in.
Example_Translation: 我插上舊電視時它爆炸了。

Meaning: To fasten something is to close it or attach it to something.
Meaning_Translation: 「扣緊」某物是指關上它或將其固定在某處。
Example: Elizabeth fastened her seat belt.
Example_Translation: 伊莉莎白繫好安全帶。

Meaning: A germ is a very small living thing that can make people sick.
Meaning_Translation: 「細菌」是非常微小、會讓人致病的生物。
Example: Germs are on everything that you touch.
Example_Translation: 細菌存在於你觸碰的每樣東西上。

Meaning: A kit is a set of all the things needed to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「工具包」是完成某事所需的所有物品組合。
Example: Is there a first aid kit in your office?
Example_Translation: 你辦公室有急救箱嗎？

Meaning: A puff is a little bit of smoke or steam.
Meaning_Translation: 「一縷」是少量的煙或蒸汽。
Example: A puff of smoke came from the burnt match.
Example_Translation: 燃燒的火柴冒出一縷煙。

Meaning: A rag is a small towel.
Meaning_Translation: 「抹布」是小毛巾。
Example: Please use a rag to clean the dust off the table.
Example_Translation: 請用抹布擦掉桌上灰塵。

Meaning: To scatter something is to make it go in many places.
Meaning_Translation: 「散佈」某物是指讓它分散到各處。
Example: I accidentally scattered all of my pills.
Example_Translation: 我不小心把所有藥丸撒了一地。

Meaning: A scent is a smell.
Meaning_Translation: 「氣味」是一種香味。
Example: Julie enjoyed the scent of the flowers.
Example_Translation: 茱莉喜歡花香。

Meaning: Steel is a strong gray metal.
Meaning_Translation: 「鋼」是一種堅硬的灰色金屬。
Example: The new apartment building was made with steel.
Example_Translation: 新公寓大樓用鋼材建造。

Meaning: A swift person or animal is fast.
Meaning_Translation: 「迅速的」人或動物很快。
Example: The swift horse easily jumped over the hurdle.
Example_Translation: 這匹快馬輕鬆跳過欄杆。

Meaning: To toss something is to throw it softly.
Meaning_Translation: 「輕拋」某物是指輕柔地扔出它。
Example: He tossed a coin into the air.
Example_Translation: 他把硬幣拋向空中。

Meaning: Triumph is the act or feeling of winning.
Meaning_Translation: 「勝利」是獲勝的行為或感覺。
Example: He raised the award in triumph at the end of his speech.
Example_Translation: 他演講結束時高舉獎盃慶祝勝利。

Meaning: Someone aboard a ship or plane is in or on it.
Meaning_Translation: 「在船上／飛機上」是指在船或飛機內部或上面。
Example: They climbed aboard the kayak and paddled through the river.
Example_Translation: 他們登上獨木舟划過河流。

Meaning: A bitter person feels upset or angry about something.
Meaning_Translation: 「憤恨的」人對某事感到不滿或憤怒。
Example: He was extremely bitter when his computer crashed.
Example_Translation: 電腦當機時他非常沮喪。

Meaning: A bullet is a small metal object that is shot out of a gun.
Meaning_Translation: 「子彈」是從槍中射出的小金屬物體。
Example: Bullets come in different sizes for different guns.
Example_Translation: 子彈因槍枝不同而有各種尺寸。

Meaning: The devil is a powerful evil spirit in some religions.
Meaning_Translation: 「魔鬼」是某些宗教中強大的邪惡靈體。
Example: The church promised protection from the devil.
Example_Translation: 教會承諾保護信徒免受魔鬼侵害。

Meaning: To drift means to be moved slowly by wind or water.
Meaning_Translation: 「漂流」是指被風或水緩慢推動。
Example: The large chunk of ice drifted in the water.
Example_Translation: 大塊冰在水中漂流。

Meaning: To enforce means to make a person follow a rule.
Meaning_Translation: 「強制執行」是指讓人遵守規則。
Example: Police enforce traffic laws to keep everyone safe.
Example_Translation: 警察執行交通法規以確保大家安全。

Meaning: A fountain is a source of water made by people.
Meaning_Translation: 「噴泉」是人造的水源。
Example: There was a beautiful fountain in the middle of the park.
Example_Translation: 公園中央有座美麗噴泉。

Meaning: A harbor is an area of water along a shore where boats land.
Meaning_Translation: 「港口」是岸邊供船隻停靠的水域。
Example: There were a few small boats in the harbor.
Example_Translation: 港口有幾艘小船。

Meaning: To inhabit means to live in a certain place.
Meaning_Translation: 「居住」是指住在某個地方。
Example: No one inhabits the ancient city.
Example_Translation: 沒人住在這座古城。

Meaning: To march means to walk at a steady pace together with others.
Meaning_Translation: 「行軍」是指與他人一起以穩定步伐行走。
Example: The soldiers marched in straight rows.
Example_Translation: 士兵排成直列行進。

Meaning: A millionaire is a person who has at least a million dollars.
Meaning_Translation: 「百萬富翁」是至少擁有一百萬美元的人。
Example: He became a millionaire because he was smart with his money.
Example_Translation: 他因理財有方而成為百萬富翁。

Meaning: A port is a place where ships stop to load and unload things.
Meaning_Translation: 「港口」是船隻停靠裝卸貨物的地方。
Example: The ship was being loaded with materials at the port.
Example_Translation: 船在港口裝載貨物。

Meaning: A sheriff is a police officer who is in charge of a large area.
Meaning_Translation: 「警長」是負責大片區域的警察。
Example: It was the sheriff’s job to make the city safe.
Example_Translation: 警長的職責是維護城市安全。

Meaning: To startle means to scare someone suddenly.
Meaning_Translation: 「嚇一跳」是指突然驚嚇某人。
Example: The loud crash startled the sleeping woman.
Example_Translation: 巨響嚇醒了睡夢中的女人。

Meaning: To sweat means to lose liquid from the body through the skin.
Meaning_Translation: 「流汗」是指液體從皮膚排出體外。
Example: Whenever I go to the gym, I sweat quite a bit.
Example_Translation: 我去健身房時會流很多汗。

Meaning: A trigger is the part of a gun that a person pulls to make it fire.
Meaning_Translation: 「扳機」是槍上讓人扣動以發射的部分。
Example: The man had his finger on the trigger of the gun.
Example_Translation: 這男人手指扣在扳機上。

Meaning: To unify means to bring people or things together.
Meaning_Translation: 「統一」是指將人或事物結合在一起。
Example: With their good deeds, the children tried to unify the world.
Example_Translation: 孩子們用善行試圖讓世界團結。

Meaning: A vessel is a large ship or boat.
Meaning_Translation: 「船隻」是大型的船。
Example: We toured the area aboard a luxury vessel.
Example_Translation: 我們搭乘豪華船遊覽該地區。

Meaning: A voyage is a long journey made on a boat or an aircraft.
Meaning_Translation: 「航行」是在船或飛機上進行的長途旅程。
Example: The astronauts took off on a long voyage to the moon.
Example_Translation: 太空人啟程前往月球進行長途航行。

Meaning: To worship means to like and honor a person, thing, or religious figure.
Meaning_Translation: 「崇拜」是指喜愛並尊敬某人、某物或宗教人物。
Example: Many people around the world worship in a church.
Example_Translation: 全球許多人在教堂敬拜。

Meaning: An apprentice is a person who learns how to do a job from a skilled person.
Meaning_Translation: 「學徒」是向熟練者學習如何做事的人。
Example: Mark is an apprentice chef at the restaurant.
Example_Translation: 馬克是餐廳的見習廚師。

Meaning: To assure people is to tell them something is true to make them less worried.
Meaning_Translation: 「向…保證」是指告訴他們某事屬實以減輕擔憂。
Example: He assured the boss that the building would be done on time.
Example_Translation: 他向老闆保證建築會如期完工。

Meaning: A bandage is a piece of cloth used to stop bleeding.
Meaning_Translation: 「繃帶」是用來止血的布條。
Example: If you cut yourself, please get a bandage from the first-aid kit.
Example_Translation: 如果你割傷自己，請從急救箱拿繃帶。

Meaning: To bleed is to lose blood.
Meaning_Translation: 「流血」是指失去血液。
Example: If you are not careful, you will cut your finger and bleed.
Example_Translation: 如果不小心，你會割傷手指流血。

Meaning: To bond with someone is to become friends with that person.
Meaning_Translation: 「與…建立感情」是指與那人成為朋友。
Example: The women bonded after several hours of conversation.
Example_Translation: 這些女性聊了幾小時後感情變好。

Meaning: A chef is a person who cooks in a restaurant.
Meaning_Translation: 「主廚」是在餐廳烹飪的人。
Example: Tom is a chef at the restaurant near my house.
Example_Translation: 湯姆是我家附近餐廳的主廚。

Meaning: A crown is the hat worn by a king or queen.
Meaning_Translation: 「皇冠」是國王或女王戴的帽子。
Example: The crown is made of gold.
Example_Translation: 皇冠是黃金做的。

Meaning: A departure is the act of leaving a place.
Meaning_Translation: 「離開」是離開某地的行為。
Example: They were excited about their departure to go to go back home.
Example_Translation: 他們對即將返家感到興奮。

Meaning: A diligent person works hard and is careful.
Meaning_Translation: 「勤勉的」人努力工作且謹慎。
Example: Craig has always been a very diligent person at work.
Example_Translation: 克雷格工作一向勤勉。

Meaning: An emperor is the leader of a group of countries.
Meaning_Translation: 「皇帝」是一群國家的領袖。
Example: The emperor Julius Caesar was in control of ancient Rome.
Example_Translation: 皇帝凱撒統治古羅馬。

Meaning: A fiber is a thread of a substance used to make clothes or rope.
Meaning_Translation: 「纖維」是用來製作衣服或繩子的物質絲線。
Example: The mat was made from tiny fibers.
Example_Translation: 這墊子由細小纖維製成。

Meaning: A horrible thing is very bad.
Meaning_Translation: 「可怕的」東西非常糟糕。
Example: The assignment was horrible. I hated it.
Example_Translation: 這作業很糟，我超討厭。

Meaning: An impolite person is rude, or not polite.
Meaning_Translation: 「沒禮貌的」人是粗魯或不禮貌的。
Example: Roger is impolite to everyone he meets.
Example_Translation: 羅傑對每個人都沒禮貌。

Meaning: To kneel is to put one or both knees on the ground.
Meaning_Translation: 「跪下」是指單膝或雙膝著地。
Example: Daryl kneeled down on one knee and asked Nina to marry him.
Example_Translation: 達瑞爾單膝跪地向妮娜求婚。

Meaning: A luxury is an expensive thing that is nice but not needed.
Meaning_Translation: 「奢侈品」是昂貴、美好但非必需的東西。
Example: Our honeymoon resort was a luxury we really enjoyed.
Example_Translation: 我們度蜜月的度假村是我們非常享受的奢華享受。

Meaning: A massive thing is very big.
Meaning_Translation: 「巨大的」東西非常大。
Example: The wheels on his truck were massive.
Example_Translation: 他卡車的輪子非常巨大。

Meaning: To panic is to feel so nervous or afraid that one cannot think clearly.
Meaning_Translation: 「恐慌」是指因過度緊張或害怕而無法清晰思考。
Example: Everyone panicked when the house caught on fire.
Example_Translation: 房子著火時大家都慌了。

Meaning: A priority is something that is more important than other things.
Meaning_Translation: 「優先事項」是比其他事情更重要的事。
Example: My priority is to get good grades in school.
Example_Translation: 我的首要目標是在學校拿好成績。

Meaning: A robe is a long, loose piece of clothing.
Meaning_Translation: 「長袍」是長而寬鬆的衣服。
Example: The monks at the temple all wear robes.
Example_Translation: 寺廟僧侶都穿長袍。

Meaning: To scold means to criticize someone angrily for doing something wrong.
Meaning_Translation: 「責罵」是指因某人做錯事而生氣地批評他。
Example: Jesse was scolded by the teacher for not paying attention.
Example_Translation: 傑西因不專心被老師罵。

Meaning: An affair is an event or a thing that happened.
Meaning_Translation: 「事件」是發生過的事。
Example: My wife and I attended a formal affair over the weekend.
Example_Translation: 我和太太週末參加正式活動。

Meaning: An assembly is a group gathered together for the same reason.
Meaning_Translation: 「集會」是因相同原因聚集的一群人。
Example: The students had an assembly to talk about their interests.
Example_Translation: 學生開會討論興趣。

Meaning: To bless is to ask God for protection or help.
Meaning_Translation: 「祝福」是指祈求上帝保護或幫助。
Example: The angel blessed the newborn baby to keep it safe.
Example_Translation: 天使祝福新生兒保佑平安。

Meaning: Cereal is a breakfast food made from grains that is eaten with milk.
Meaning_Translation: 「穀物早餐」是用穀物製成、搭配牛奶食用的早餐食品。
Example: Cereal is a fast and common breakfast food enjoyed in the US.
Example_Translation: 穀片是美國常見又快速的早餐食品。

Meaning: A cheerful person is happy and pleasant.
Meaning_Translation: 「開朗的」人快樂且愉快。
Example: The children were cheerful because they didn’t have to go to school.
Example_Translation: 孩子們很開心，因為不用上學。

Meaning: The diameter of a round thing is the length across its center.
Meaning_Translation: 「直徑」是圓形物體穿過中心的長度。
Example: The diameter of the tree was about 60 centimeters.
Example_Translation: 這棵樹直徑約60公分。

Meaning: To exploit something is to use it for greedy reasons rather than good reasons.
Meaning_Translation: 「剝削」某物是指出於貪婪而非善意地利用它。
Example: The company exploits their workers and makes them work 12 hours a day.
Example_Translation: 公司剝削員工，讓他們每天工作12小時。

Meaning: A famine is a long time with little or no food.
Meaning_Translation: 「饑荒」是長期缺乏或沒有食物的時期。
Example: The farmers couldn’t grow any food in the dry soil, so there was a famine.
Example_Translation: 農夫在乾旱土壤種不出糧食，導致饑荒。

Meaning: A harvest is the act of collecting food from farming.
Meaning_Translation: 「收穫」是從農耕中收集食物的行為。
Example: They had a lot of wheat from the last harvest.
Example_Translation: 他們上次收穫了很多小麥。

Meaning: A merry person is happy and pleasant.
Meaning_Translation: 「歡樂的」人快樂且愉快。
Example: They felt merry because the weather was great.
Example_Translation: 天氣很好，他們心情愉快。

Meaning: A nut is a hard seed or fruit that comes from some trees and bushes.
Meaning_Translation: 「堅果」是來自某些樹木或灌木的硬種子或果實。
Example: To eat a nut, you must first crack its shell.
Example_Translation: 要吃堅果，得先敲開殼。

Meaning: To pardon is to not be angry at someone for asking a question or for making a mistake.
Meaning_Translation: 「原諒」是指不因某人提問或犯錯而生氣。
Example: Pardon me teacher, but could you repeat what you just said?
Example_Translation: 老師不好意思，您能重複剛才說的話嗎？

Meaning: A pharaoh was a king in ancient Egypt.
Meaning_Translation: 「法老」是古埃及的國王。
Example: The pharaohs ruled Egypt for thousands of years.
Example_Translation: 法老統治埃及數千年。

Meaning: A ripe fruit or vegetable is ready to be eaten.
Meaning_Translation: 「成熟的」水果或蔬菜已可食用。
Example: The cherries were nice and ripe.
Example_Translation: 櫻桃熟透了。

Meaning: To roast something is to cook it in an oven or over a fire.
Meaning_Translation: 「烘烤」某物是指在烤箱或火上烹煮它。
Example: Mom roasted a turkey for the holiday dinner.
Example_Translation: 媽媽為節日晚餐烤火雞。

Meaning: A routine is a way of doing things that is the same every time.
Meaning_Translation: 「例行公事」是每次做法都相同的程序。
Example: My father’s daily routine includes shaving right before breakfast.
Example_Translation: 我爸每天例行公事包括早餐前刮鬍子。

Meaning: A scheme is a plan or design.
Meaning_Translation: 「計畫」是規劃或設計。
Example: Jason and Mark came up with a scheme to solve the problem.
Example_Translation: 傑森和馬克想出計畫解決問題。

Meaning: A slim person or thing is thin, not thick.
Meaning_Translation: 「苗條的」人或東西是瘦的，不粗。
Example: Look at my new cell phone. It’s very slim.
Example_Translation: 看我的新手機，很薄。

Meaning: A stove is a device used to cook food.
Meaning_Translation: 「爐子」是用來烹煮食物的裝置。
Example: Our new stove helps us to cook food much faster than before.
Example_Translation: 我們的新爐子讓烹飪比以前快很多。

Meaning: A theft is a criminal act that involves someone stealing something.
Meaning_Translation: 「竊盜」是涉及偷竊的犯罪行為。
Example: The theft of his TV took place when he was at work.
Example_Translation: 他上班時電視被偷了。

Meaning: An adolescent is a young person or a teenager.
Meaning_Translation: 「青少年」是年輕人或十幾歲的少年。
Example: The adolescent was excited about getting a skateboard for his birthday.
Example_Translation: 這青少年因生日收到滑板而興奮。

Meaning: Aptitude is a natural ability or skill.
Meaning_Translation: 「天賦」是天生的能力或技能。
Example: He has a natural aptitude for water skiing.
Example_Translation: 他天生有滑水天賦。

Meaning: To compliment is to say a nice thing about someone or something.
Meaning_Translation: 「讚美」是指說某人或某事的好話。
Example: Her co-worker complimented her for doing a good job.
Example_Translation: 同事稱讚她工作表現好。

Meaning: To hinder is to stop someone or something from doing something.
Meaning_Translation: 「阻礙」是指阻止某人或某物做某事。
Example: All the traffic hindered me from getting to work on time.
Example_Translation: 交通堵塞讓我無法準時上班。

Meaning: Journalism is the work of collecting the news to put in newspapers or on TV.
Meaning_Translation: 「新聞工作」是收集新聞以刊登在報紙或播出在電視上的工作。
Example: Before becoming a teacher, she worked in journalism.
Example_Translation: 她當老師前從事新聞工作。

Meaning: A jury is a group of people that listen to a trial and say if someone is guilty.
Meaning_Translation: 「陪審團」是一群聽取審判並判定某人是否有罪的人。
Example: The jury listened closely to the attorney before they made their decision.
Example_Translation: 陪審團在裁決前仔細聽律師陳述。

Meaning: Justice is fairness in the way that people are treated.
Meaning_Translation: 「正義」是人們被公平對待的方式。
Example: People turn to the court system when they are seeking justice.
Example_Translation: 人們尋求正義時會求助法院。

Meaning: Liberty is freedom to do what one wants.
Meaning_Translation: 「自由」是做自己想做的事的權利。
Example: To many people, the Statue of Liberty is a symbol of freedom.
Example_Translation: 對許多人來說，自由女神像是自由的象徵。

Meaning: A literary person or thing is involved with literature in some way.
Meaning_Translation: 「文學的」人或事物以某種方式與文學有關。
Example: He worked hard to create a successful literary career.
Example_Translation: 他努力打造成功的文學事業。

Meaning: A pharmacy is a place where medicine is sold.
Meaning_Translation: 「藥房」是販售藥品的地方。
Example: My mother sells medicine to people at the pharmacy.
Example_Translation: 我媽在藥局賣藥給人。

Meaning: A pill is a small object that has medicine inside.
Meaning_Translation: 「藥丸」是含有藥物的小顆粒。
Example: She took a pill for her headache.
Example_Translation: 她吃了一顆止痛藥。

Meaning: To presume is to believe something is true without being certain.
Meaning_Translation: 「假定」是指在不確定的情況下相信某事為真。
Example: Since the girl raised her hand, the teacher presumed she knew the answer.
Example_Translation: 因為女孩舉手，老師假設她知道答案。

Meaning: Privacy is the state of being happily away from other people.
Meaning_Translation: 「隱私」是愉快地遠離他人的狀態。
Example: Please hang the sign on the door so we can have some privacy.
Example_Translation: 請把牌子掛在門上，讓我們有隱私。

Meaning: A punishment is something that one must endure for any wrongdoing.
Meaning_Translation: 「懲罰」是因做錯事而必須承受的處罰。
Example: He was given a punishment for being rude to the teacher.
Example_Translation: 他因對老師無禮而受罰。

Meaning: A sensible person or thing is good and smart.
Meaning_Translation: 「明智的」人或事物是好的且聰明的。
Example: It was sensible for her to save some money each month.
Example_Translation: 她每月存錢是明智之舉。

Meaning: A slice is a piece from something larger, such as a cake.
Meaning_Translation: 「一片」是從較大東西（如蛋糕）切下來的部分。
Example: The girl enjoyed a slice of cake at her birthday party.
Example_Translation: 女孩在生日派對上享用一塊蛋糕。

Meaning: Sorrow is a very sad feeling.
Meaning_Translation: 「悲傷」是非常難過的感覺。
Example: The girl felt sorrow after her best friend moved away.
Example_Translation: 女孩最好的朋友搬家後她感到悲傷。

Meaning: A straw is a thin tube that is used to suck liquid into the mouth.
Meaning_Translation: 「吸管」是用來將液體吸入口中的細管。
Example: I drank the orange juice through a straw.
Example_Translation: 我用吸管喝柳橙汁。

Meaning: To swell is to become larger and rounder.
Meaning_Translation: 「腫脹」是指變得更大更圓。
Example: My sister’s stomach began to swell after she got pregnant.
Example_Translation: 我妹妹懷孕後肚子開始變大。

Meaning: A tidy place or person is clean and in order.
Meaning_Translation: 「整潔的」地方或人是乾淨且有條理的。
Example: Leon has always been a very tidy boy.
Example_Translation: 里昂一直是個很整潔的男孩。

Meaning: Affection is a feeling of liking someone or something.
Meaning_Translation: 「喜愛」是喜歡某人或某物的感覺。
Example: Amanda has a lot of affection for her little sister, Sarah.
Example_Translation: 阿曼達很疼愛妹妹莎拉。

Meaning: An agency is a business or service set up to act for others.
Meaning_Translation: 「代理機構」是為他人行事的商業或服務組織。
Example: I went to a travel agency to help me arrange a flight home.
Example_Translation: 我去旅行社安排返家航班。

Meaning: Ash is the grey or black powder created when something is burned.
Meaning_Translation: 「灰燼」是東西燃燒後產生的灰色或黑色粉末。
Example: The end of his cigar was full of ashes.
Example_Translation: 他雪茄末端堆滿菸灰。

Meaning: To confine something is to keep it in one place.
Meaning_Translation: 「限制」某物是指將其留在一個地方。
Example: The elephant is confined to a cage in the zoo.
Example_Translation: 大象被關在動物園的籠子裡。

Meaning: To dismiss something is to say it is not important.
Meaning_Translation: 「駁回」某事是指說它不重要。
Example: He quickly dismissed my idea about the new project.
Example_Translation: 他迅速否決我對新專案的想法。

Meaning: To erupt is to explode or blow apart, especially a volcano.
Meaning_Translation: 「爆發」是指爆炸或炸開，尤其是火山。
Example: The volcano erupted for the first time in ten years.
Example_Translation: 火山十年來首次爆發。

Meaning: Fate is a power that causes things to happen.
Meaning_Translation: 「命運」是導致事情發生的力量。
Example: Some people believe that the lines on a person’s hand can tell his or her fate.
Example_Translation: 有人相信手掌線條能預示命運。

Meaning: Lava is the hot substance made of melted rock that comes out of volcanoes.
Meaning_Translation: 「熔岩」是從火山噴出的熾熱熔融岩石。
Example: The red-hot lava poured from the volcano.
Example_Translation: 熾熱岩漿從火山噴出。

Meaning: A miserable person is very unhappy.
Meaning_Translation: 「悲慘的」人非常不快樂。
Example: He was miserable after his dog died.
Example_Translation: 他的狗死後他很痛苦。

Meaning: To navigate something is to control the way it moves or goes.
Meaning_Translation: 「導航」某物是指控制其移動或行進方式。
Example: She navigated the ship across the ocean.
Example_Translation: 她駕船橫渡海洋。

Meaning: To originate somewhere is to start there.
Meaning_Translation: 「起源於」某地是指從那裡開始。
Example: The idea of democracy originated in Ancient Greece.
Example_Translation: 民主概念起源於古希臘。

Meaning: The remainder of something is what is left.
Meaning_Translation: 「剩餘」是某物剩下的部分。
Example: He took a bite of the apple and then gave me the remainder of it.
Example_Translation: 他咬了一口蘋果，把剩下的給我。

Meaning: To retrieve something is to find it and get it back.
Meaning_Translation: 「取回」某物是指找到並拿回來。
Example: She retrieved her mail from the mailbox.
Example_Translation: 她從信箱取回郵件。

Meaning: A shallow thing is not deep.
Meaning_Translation: 「淺的」東西不深。
Example: The kids were playing in the shallow water.
Example_Translation: 孩子們在淺水區玩耍。

Meaning: A slope is ground that is not flat.
Meaning_Translation: 「斜坡」是不平坦的地面。
Example: The slope to the top of the mountain was very steep.
Example_Translation: 通往山頂的坡很陡。

Meaning: To span is to spread across an amount of time or space.
Meaning_Translation: 「跨越」是指橫跨一段時間或空間。
Example: His work at the bakery has spanned twenty years.
Example_Translation: 他在麵包店的工作已持續二十年。

Meaning: A superstition is something magical that people believe is real.
Meaning_Translation: 「迷信」是人們相信為真的神奇事物。
Example: It is a superstition that Friday the 13th is an unlucky day.
Example_Translation: 13號星期五是不吉利的日子，這是一種迷信。

Meaning: Sympathy is a feeling of sadness for another person who feels bad.
Meaning_Translation: 「同情」是對感到難過的人所產生的悲傷感受。
Example: I felt sympathy for my sister, so I got her a balloon to cheer her up.
Example_Translation: 我同情妹妹，所以買氣球讓她開心。

Meaning: To vibrate is to shake very hard.
Meaning_Translation: 「震動」是指劇烈搖晃。
Example: The machine made his whole body vibrate as he broke up the ground.
Example_Translation: 他操作機器破碎地面時全身震動。

Meaning: To wander is to walk without going to a certain place.
Meaning_Translation: 「漫步」是指沒有特定目的地地行走。
Example: The boys like to wander in the woods and look at birds.
Example_Translation: 男孩們喜歡在樹林漫步觀鳥。

Meaning: Armor is metal worn by soldiers to protect the body.
Meaning_Translation: 「盔甲」是士兵穿戴以保護身體的金屬裝備。
Example: The soldier wore armor to protect his body.
Example_Translation: 士兵穿盔甲保護身體。

Meaning: To blaze means to burn brightly or powerfully.
Meaning_Translation: 「熊熊燃燒」是指明亮或猛烈地燃燒。
Example: The small fire soon blazed into a large, dangerous one.
Example_Translation: 小火很快變成巨大危險的火焰。

Meaning: To boom means to make a loud, deep sound.
Meaning_Translation: 「轟鳴」是指發出巨大低沉的聲音。
Example: The firecrackers made a loud boom when they exploded.
Example_Translation: 鞭炮爆炸時發出巨響。

Meaning: A cliff is a high and often flat wall of rock.
Meaning_Translation: 「懸崖」是高而常為平坦的岩壁。
Example: The wolf stood at the cliff and howled.
Example_Translation: 狼站在懸崖邊嚎叫。

Meaning: A flame is part of a fire.
Meaning_Translation: 「火焰」是火的一部分。
Example: The torch was filled with yellow and orange flames.
Example_Translation: 火把燃燒著黃橙色火焰。

Meaning: Independence is the state of being free from the control of others.
Meaning_Translation: 「獨立」是不受他人控制的狀態。
Example: After leaving home, Sophia had a great feeling of independence.
Example_Translation: 索菲亞離家後感到非常獨立。

Meaning: An invasion is an attack by a group from another country.
Meaning_Translation: 「入侵」是來自另一國的群體發動的攻擊。
Example: In Korea, walls were built around cities to protect them from invasions.
Example_Translation: 韓國曾築城牆保護城市免受入侵。

Meaning: A knight is a soldier of high rank and skill who usually serves a king.
Meaning_Translation: 「騎士」是高階且技術高超、通常效忠國王的士兵。
Example: He was the best soldier, so the king made him a knight.
Example_Translation: 他是最優秀的士兵，國王封他為騎士。

Meaning: Lightning is the bright light seen during a storm.
Meaning_Translation: 「閃電」是暴風雨中看到的明亮光芒。
Example: The lightning flashed above the water.
Example_Translation: 閃電在水面上方閃耀。

Meaning: A rebel is a person who fights the government in order to change it.
Meaning_Translation: 「叛軍」是為改變政府而與之對抗的人。
Example: The rebel was angry about the government’s unfair policies.
Example_Translation: 叛軍對政府的不公平政策感到憤怒。

Meaning: To retreat means to run away because of losing a fight.
Meaning_Translation: 「撤退」是指因戰敗而逃跑。
Example: The army retreated because they were losing the battle.
Example_Translation: 軍隊因戰況不利而撤退。

Meaning: A revolution is a change to the political system by a group of people.
Meaning_Translation: 「革命」是一群人對政治制度的改變。
Example: The revolution in Russia led to the creation of the Soviet Union.
Example_Translation: 俄國革命促成蘇聯成立。

Meaning: A spear is a long stick with a blade on one end that is used as a weapon.
Meaning_Translation: 「長矛」是末端有刀刃、用作武器的長棍。
Example: The soldier was holding a spear in his hand.
Example_Translation: 士兵手裡拿著長矛。

Meaning: A steep surface or place has a slope or angle that rises or falls sharply.
Meaning_Translation: 「陡峭的」表面或地方有急遽上升或下降的坡度。
Example: He rode his bike up the steep hill to reach the top.
Example_Translation: 他騎腳踏車爬上陡坡到達頂端。

Meaning: A summit is the highest part of a hill or mountain.
Meaning_Translation: 「山頂」是山丘或山脈的最高點。
Example: Snow covered the summit of the mountain even during the summer.
Example_Translation: 即使夏天，山頂仍覆蓋積雪。

Meaning: Thunder is the loud noise heard during a storm.
Meaning_Translation: 「雷聲」是暴風雨中聽到的巨大聲響。
Example: The sound of the thunder startled me.
Example_Translation: 雷聲嚇了我一跳。

Meaning: Troops are soldiers that fight in groups in a battle.
Meaning_Translation: 「軍隊」是在戰鬥中成群作戰的士兵。
Example: The troops were all prepared to go into battle.
Example_Translation: 部隊已準備好上戰場。

Meaning: A warrior is a brave soldier or fighter.
Meaning_Translation: 「戰士」是勇敢的士兵或鬥士。
Example: The samurai were some of the most skilled warriors in the ancient world.
Example_Translation: 武士是古代世界最精銳的戰士之一。

Meaning: To withdraw means to leave a place, usually during war.
Meaning_Translation: 「撤離」是指離開某地，通常在戰爭期間。
Example: After losing the battle, the enemy withdrew back to its own country.
Example_Translation: 戰敗後，敵軍撤退回國。

Meaning: To yield something means to give up control of it or to give it away.
Meaning_Translation: 「讓出」某物是指放棄對它的控制或贈與他人。
Example: He had to yield his turn because he was in checkmate.
Example_Translation: 他因被將軍而不得不認輸。

Meaning: A bench is a long seat for two or more people.
Meaning_Translation: 「長椅」是供兩人或以上坐的長座位。
Example: Most parks have benches for people to relax upon.
Example_Translation: 大多數公園有長椅供人休息。

Meaning: A daisy is a small flower with white petals and a yellow center.
Meaning_Translation: 「雛菊」是花瓣白色、中心黃色的小花。
Example: There were a few daisies growing in the field.
Example_Translation: 田野裡長了幾朵雛菊。

Meaning: A dispute is an argument or disagreement that people have.
Meaning_Translation: 「爭執」是人們之間的爭論或分歧。
Example: Karen and Brian often have disputes about silly things.
Example_Translation: 凱倫和布萊恩常為小事爭吵。

Meaning: An empty container is one that has no things in it.
Meaning_Translation: 「空的」容器是裡面沒有東西的。
Example: The teacher showed the students an empty bottle.
Example_Translation: 老師給學生看一個空瓶子。

Meaning: Horror is a feeling of being very afraid or shocked.
Meaning_Translation: 「恐怖」是非常害怕或震驚的感覺。
Example: The audience screamed in horror when the ghost appeared in the movie.
Example_Translation: 鬼魂在電影出現時，觀眾驚恐尖叫。

Meaning: An incident is an event that is usually not pleasant.
Meaning_Translation: 「事件」通常是不愉快的發生事。
Example: Mr. Wilson had an incident; he became sick and had to leave.
Example_Translation: 威爾森先生出了狀況，他生病得離開。

Meaning: Mist is water that can be seen in the air or on a surface.
Meaning_Translation: 「薄霧」是空氣中或表面上可見的水氣。
Example: The forest was covered with mist.
Example_Translation: 森林籠罩在薄霧中。

Meaning: An object is a non-living thing that you can see or touch.
Meaning_Translation: 「物體」是你能看見或觸摸的非生物。
Example: The shopping cart was filled with objects.
Example_Translation: 購物車裝滿物品。

Meaning: An orphan is a child who does not have parents.
Meaning_Translation: 「孤兒」是沒有父母的孩子。
Example: The orphan frequently cried during the night.
Example_Translation: 孤兒常在夜裡哭泣。

Meaning: To plot is to make a secret plan to do something that is wrong or mean.
Meaning_Translation: 「密謀」是指秘密計畫做壞事或卑鄙的事。
Example: The group was plotting to ruin the company’s financial reports.
Example_Translation: 這群人密謀破壞公司財務報告。

Meaning: A pregnant woman or animal is going to have a baby.
Meaning_Translation: 「懷孕的」女性或動物即將生小孩。
Example: The pregnant woman was shopping for baby clothes.
Example_Translation: 孕婦在買嬰兒服。

Meaning: Rage is a very angry feeling.
Meaning_Translation: 「暴怒」是非常憤怒的感覺。
Example: The chef was filled with rage when his helpers ruined the meal.
Example_Translation: 助手搞砸餐點時，主廚暴怒。

Meaning: Revenge is the act of hurting someone who has hurt you.
Meaning_Translation: 「報復」是傷害曾傷害你的人的行為。
Example: He broke his sister’s doll as revenge after she lost his favorite book.
Example_Translation: 他因妹妹弄丟他最愛的書而弄壞她的娃娃報復。

Meaning: Shame is a bad feeling about things one has done wrong.
Meaning_Translation: 「羞恥」是對自己做錯事的不好感覺。
Example: The boy felt shame about misplacing his clothes.
Example_Translation: 男孩因弄丟衣服感到羞愧。

Meaning: To sigh is to breathe out loudly to show tiredness, boredom, or sadness.
Meaning_Translation: 「嘆氣」是大聲呼氣以表現疲倦、無聊或悲傷。
Example: Molly sighed when she looked at all the information she had to research.
Example_Translation: 茉莉看著要研究的資料嘆氣。

Meaning: To sneak is to move quietly in order not to be seen or heard.
Meaning_Translation: 「偷偷摸摸」是指安靜移動以免被看見或聽見。
Example: The thief snuck out of the house without anyone noticing him.
Example_Translation: 小偷悄悄溜出房子，沒人發現。

Meaning: To spare something is to give it away because it is not needed.
Meaning_Translation: 「騰出」某物是指因不需要而讓出它。
Example: I wanted to help him but I couldn’t spare a tire.
Example_Translation: 我想幫他，但沒有備胎可借。

Meaning: The stem of a plant is the stick that grows leaves or flowers.
Meaning_Translation: 「莖」是植物長出葉子或花朵的枝幹。
Example: The rose had a long thin stem.
Example_Translation: 玫瑰有細長的莖。

Meaning: Supper is a meal that is eaten in the evening.
Meaning_Translation: 「晚餐」是晚上吃的飯。
Example: We usually have supper around 6 o’clock at my house.
Example_Translation: 我家通常六點左右吃晚餐。

Meaning: A tender food is soft and easy to chew.
Meaning_Translation: 「柔嫩的」食物是柔軟且容易咀嚼的。
Example: The meat was so tender they didn’t need knives to cut it.
Example_Translation: 肉很嫩，不用刀切。

Meaning: Beneath means under or lower than.
Meaning_Translation: 「在…之下」意思是下方或低於。
Example: The largest part of an iceberg lies beneath the waterline.
Example_Translation: 冰山最大部分在水面下。

Meaning: A cub is a baby animal, such as a bear or lion.
Meaning_Translation: 「幼崽」是幼小的動物，如熊或獅子。
Example: The lion cub was crying for its mother.
Example_Translation: 小獅子哭著找媽媽。

Meaning: Dawn is the time of day when the sun rises.
Meaning_Translation: 「黎明」是太陽升起的時刻。
Example: At dawn, the sun gently rose over the farm.
Example_Translation: 黎明時，太陽緩緩從農場升起。

Meaning: Dissatisfied means not happy with something.
Meaning_Translation: 「不滿意的」意思是對某事不開心。
Example: I was dissatisfied with their decision to work on Sunday.
Example_Translation: 我不滿意他們決定週日工作。

Meaning: Ease is a condition without difficulty or hard work.
Meaning_Translation: 「輕鬆」是沒有困難或辛勞的狀態。
Example: The monkey climbed the tree with ease.
Example_Translation: 猴子輕鬆爬上樹。

Meaning: Evident means easy to see or understand.
Meaning_Translation: 「明顯的」意思是容易看見或理解。
Example: It was evident from the look on his face that he was unhappy.
Example_Translation: 他臉上的表情明顯顯示他不開心。

Meaning: Hail is ice that falls from the sky when rain freezes.
Meaning_Translation: 「冰雹」是雨水結冰後從天上落下的冰塊。
Example: The hail from the storm was the size of golf balls.
Example_Translation: 暴風雨的冰雹有高爾夫球大。

Meaning: To howl means to make a long, loud sound like a wolf or a dog.
Meaning_Translation: 「嚎叫」是指發出像狼或狗一樣的長而響亮的聲音。
Example: The wolf howled at the moon.
Example_Translation: 狼對著月亮嚎叫。

Meaning: To leap means to jump a long distance.
Meaning_Translation: 「跳躍」是指跳很遠的距離。
Example: He had to leap over the gap to reach the other side of the hill.
Example_Translation: 他得跳過缺口才能到山的另一邊。

Meaning: Magnificent means beautiful and grand.
Meaning_Translation: 「壯麗的」意思是美麗且宏偉。
Example: The man gave his wife a pair of magnificent diamond earrings.
Example_Translation: 這男人送太太一對華麗的鑽石耳環。

Meaning: A necessity is something that is needed.
Meaning_Translation: 「必需品」是需要的東西。
Example: Fresh water is a necessity for life.
Example_Translation: 淡水是生命必需品。

Meaning: An outcome is the end result of an action or event.
Meaning_Translation: 「結果」是行動或事件的最終成果。
Example: The outcome of his latest business plan was a complete failure.
Example_Translation: 他最新商業計畫的結果徹底失敗。

Meaning: A pile is a large group of things on top of one another.
Meaning_Translation: 「一堆」是大量堆疊在一起的東西。
Example: The pile of cups was beginning to lean.
Example_Translation: 那疊杯子開始傾斜。

Meaning: Profound means deep or very intelligent.
Meaning_Translation: 「深奧的」意思是深刻或極其聰明。
Example: For a young man, Jeremy has some profound thoughts.
Example_Translation: 傑瑞米雖年輕，卻有深刻想法。

Meaning: To seize something means to grab it quickly or strongly.
Meaning_Translation: 「抓住」某物是指快速或用力地抓取它。
Example: The man seized as much money as he could before anyone could see him.
Example_Translation: 這男人趁人不注意時盡可能拿錢。

Meaning: To squeeze something means to press it together and hold it tightly.
Meaning_Translation: 「擠壓」某物是指壓緊並牢牢握住它。
Example: When Clara saw her cat, she squeezed it to her face.
Example_Translation: 克拉拉看到貓就抱到臉上緊緊摟住。

Meaning: Supreme means of the highest level or best quality.
Meaning_Translation: 「至高無上的」意思是最高層級或最佳品質。
Example: The supreme officer was in charge of keeping the citizens calm.
Example_Translation: 最高長官負責安撫民眾情緒。

Meaning: Something terrific is very good.
Meaning_Translation: 「極好的」東西非常好。
Example: My youngest daughter is a terrific painter.
Example_Translation: 我小女兒是個超棒的畫家。

Meaning: A trait is part of someone’s personality.
Meaning_Translation: 「特質」是某人個性的一部分。
Example: One trait of Salvador’s personality is his cheerfulness.
Example_Translation: 薩爾瓦多性格特點之一是開朗。

Meaning: Something vital is necessary for life.
Meaning_Translation: 「重要的」東西是生命所必需的。
Example: The heart is a vital organ.
Example_Translation: 心臟是重要器官。

Meaning: To attack something is to hurt or damage it.
Meaning_Translation: 「攻擊」某物是指傷害或損壞它。
Example: She watched the lizard attack its prey.
Example_Translation: 她看著蜥蜴攻擊獵物。

Meaning: A breast is one of the two soft parts on a woman’s chest.
Meaning_Translation: 「乳房」是女性胸部的兩個柔軟部位之一。
Example: She was diagnosed with breast cancer.
Example_Translation: 她被診斷出乳癌。

Meaning: Cancer is a serious disease that causes cells to grow abnormally.
Meaning_Translation: 「癌症」是導致細胞異常生長的嚴重疾病。
Example: He was a leading scientist in finding a cure for cancer.
Example_Translation: 他是癌症治療研究的領先科學家。

Meaning: Cancerous cells are the result of cancer.
Meaning_Translation: 「癌細胞」是癌症造成的結果。
Example: The exam found cancerous cells in the patient’s blood.
Example_Translation: 檢查發現病人血液中有癌細胞。

Meaning: A cell is the smallest part of a living thing that can live by itself.
Meaning_Translation: 「細胞」是生物體中能獨立生存的最小單位。
Example: A red blood cell carries oxygen.
Example_Translation: 紅血球攜帶氧氣。

Meaning: A cigarette is a thinly wrapped paper tube filled with tobacco that is smoked.
Meaning_Translation: 「香菸」是裝有菸草、用薄紙捲成並用來吸食的管狀物。
Example: Cigarette smoking is terrible for your health.
Example_Translation: 吸菸對健康極度有害。

Meaning: A code is a set of symbols used to hide or read a message.
Meaning_Translation: 「密碼」是一組用來隱藏或解讀訊息的符號。
Example: She used the code to solve the puzzle.
Example_Translation: 她用密碼解開謎題。

Meaning: A cure is a medical treatment to make a sickness go away.
Meaning_Translation: 「治療」是讓疾病消失的醫療方法。
Example: Scientists are still working on finding a cure for diabetes.
Example_Translation: 科學家仍在努力尋找糖尿病療法。

Meaning: To damage something is to cause its destruction.
Meaning_Translation: 「破壞」某物是指導致其毀滅。
Example: The wildfires left the forest in a state of destruction.
Example_Translation: 野火讓森林一片毀壞。

Meaning: DNA is the short form of deoxyribonucleic acid.
Meaning_Translation: 「DNA」是去氧核糖核酸的縮寫。
Example: The police sometimes use DNA to solve crime.
Example_Translation: 警方有時用DNA破案。

Meaning: Extensive means large in size or amount.
Meaning_Translation: 「廣泛的」意思是規模或數量很大。
Example: The game drew extensive media coverage.
Example_Translation: 這場比賽獲得廣泛媒體報導。

Meaning: Female refers to women or girls.
Meaning_Translation: 「女性」是指女人或女孩。
Example: She is the only female student in her class with short hair.
Example_Translation: 她是班上唯一短髮的女學生。

Meaning: Furthermore means more information will be added.
Meaning_Translation: 「此外」意思是會補充更多資訊。
Example: She’s clever, and furthermore, she is not afraid of work.
Example_Translation: 她很聰明，而且不怕吃苦。

Meaning: A gene controls what it looks like, how an organism grows, and how it develops.
Meaning_Translation: 「基因」控制生物的外觀、生長和發育方式。
Example: Gene therapy is sometimes used to treat an illness.
Example_Translation: 基因療法有時用來治療疾病。

Meaning: To inherit is to receive something that is passed down from a relative.
Meaning_Translation: 「繼承」是指從親戚那裡接收傳下來的東西。
Example: All the girls in my family inherit red hair from my great-grandmother.
Example_Translation: 我家所有女孩都遺傳曾祖母的紅髮。

Meaning: A link is a connection to something else.
Meaning_Translation: 「連結」是與其他東西的連接。
Example: The two lines in the poem share a common link.
Example_Translation: 詩中兩行有共同連結。

Meaning: Male refers to men or boys.
Meaning_Translation: 「男性」是指男人或男孩。
Example: He was the only male in the store.
Example_Translation: 他是店裡唯一的男性。

Meaning: A population is all the people living in an area.
Meaning_Translation: 「人口」是居住在某地區的所有人。
Example: The population of our city is steadily growing.
Example_Translation: 我們城市人口穩定增長。

Meaning: A result happens because of something else.
Meaning_Translation: 「結果」是因其他事情而發生的。
Example: The result of her experiment was surprising.
Example_Translation: 她實驗的結果令人驚訝。

Meaning: Sugar comes from plants and is used to make food taste sweet.
Meaning_Translation: 「糖」來自植物，用來讓食物變甜。
Example: She added extra sugar to her tea.
Example_Translation: 她茶裡多加了糖。

Meaning: To accommodate is to have enough room.
Meaning_Translation: 「容納」是指有足夠空間。
Example: The meeting room can accommodate nine people.
Example_Translation: 會議室可容納九人。

Meaning: A circus is a traveling show with animals and people.
Meaning_Translation: 「馬戲團」是有動物和表演者的巡迴表演。
Example: I like to go to the circus to see the animals do tricks.
Example_Translation: 我喜歡去馬戲團看動物表演。

Meaning: To coincide means to happen at the same time.
Meaning_Translation: 「同時發生」是指在同一時間發生。
Example: My birthday coincides with Christmas.
Example_Translation: 我的生日和聖誕節同一天。

Meaning: To commission someone is to pay that person to do some job.
Meaning_Translation: 「委託」某人是指付錢請他做某項工作。
Example: The artist was commissioned to create a picture.
Example_Translation: 這位藝術家受委託創作一幅畫。

Meaning: A dose is a certain amount of medicine taken at one time.
Meaning_Translation: 「劑量」是一次服用的特定藥量。
Example: My mother gave me a dose of medicine before I went to bed.
Example_Translation: 我媽睡前給我吃藥。

Meaning: To dye something is to make it a certain color by using a special chemical.
Meaning_Translation: 「染色」某物是指用特殊化學品使其變成特定顏色。
Example: Valery got her hair dyed at the salon yesterday.
Example_Translation: 瓦萊麗昨天在沙龍染髮。

Meaning: The extent of something is how large, important, or serious it is.
Meaning_Translation: 「程度」是某物的大小、重要性或嚴重性。
Example: He ate to such an extent that he became overweight.
Example_Translation: 他吃太多以致變胖。

Meaning: Gender is a category that describes being either a boy or a girl.
Meaning_Translation: 「性別」是描述是男孩或女孩的類別。
Example: Do you know the gender of her new baby?
Example_Translation: 你知道她新生兒的性別嗎？

Meaning: A headline is the title of a newspaper story.
Meaning_Translation: 「標題」是報紙新聞的標題。
Example: The headline on the front page was about the economy.
Example_Translation: 頭版標題是關於經濟。

Meaning: An informal thing is casual and relaxed, not official.
Meaning_Translation: 「非正式的」東西是隨意放鬆的，非官方的。
Example: They had an informal meeting to talk about their experiences.
Example_Translation: 他們開非正式會議分享經驗。

Meaning: To inquire about something is to ask about it.
Meaning_Translation: 「詢問」某事是指問有關它的問題。
Example: Dad called to inquire about the price of tickets for the show.
Example_Translation: 爸爸打電話詢問表演門票價格。

Meaning: A messenger is one who carries information from one place to another.
Meaning_Translation: 「信使」是從一地到另一地傳遞訊息的人。
Example: The messenger delivered an important document to the office.
Example_Translation: 信差把重要文件送到辦公室。

Meaning: To peer at something is to watch it carefully.
Meaning_Translation: 「凝視」某物是指仔細看著它。
Example: She peered at people through the window.
Example_Translation: 她透過窗戶窺視人們。

Meaning: A portrait is a painting or photograph of someone.
Meaning_Translation: 「肖像」是某人的繪畫或照片。
Example: I saw many religious portraits when I went to the museum.
Example_Translation: 我去博物館時看到許多宗教肖像畫。

Meaning: To pose is to stay in one place without moving.
Meaning_Translation: 「擺姿勢」是指靜止不動地待在一個位置。
Example: The kids and their dog posed for a picture.
Example_Translation: 孩子和狗一起擺姿勢拍照。

Meaning: A ranch is a large farm where animals are kept.
Meaning_Translation: 「牧場」是飼養動物的大農場。
Example: My uncle has many horses on his ranch.
Example_Translation: 我叔叔的牧場有很多馬。

Meaning: To steer something is to control where it goes.
Meaning_Translation: 「操控」某物是指控制它的行進方向。
Example: He steered the go-cart around the track.
Example_Translation: 他駕駛卡丁車繞賽道行駛。

Meaning: A stripe is a thick line.
Meaning_Translation: 「條紋」是粗線。
Example: The flag of the United States has red and white stripes.
Example_Translation: 美國國旗有紅白條紋。

Meaning: A tame animal is not afraid to be near people.
Meaning_Translation: 「馴服的」動物不怕接近人類。
Example: The tame bird rested in his hand.
Example_Translation: 這隻馴服的鳥停在他手上。

Meaning: To tempt people is to offer them something they want but shouldn’t have.
Meaning_Translation: 「誘惑」人們是指提供他們想要但不該有的東西。
Example: I wasn’t hungry, but she tempted me with a piece of my favorite cake.
Example_Translation: 我不餓，但她用我最愛的蛋糕誘惑我。

Meaning: To ban something is to not let people do it.
Meaning_Translation: 「禁止」某事是指不讓人做它。
Example: Smoking is banned in this building.
Example_Translation: 這棟建築禁菸。

Meaning: A cautious person is careful to avoid danger.
Meaning_Translation: 「謹慎的」人小心避免危險。
Example: Be very cautious as you stack those boxes.
Example_Translation: 疊這些箱子時要非常小心。

Meaning: To confess is to admit a bad or embarrassing truth.
Meaning_Translation: 「坦白」是指承認壞事或尷尬的真相。
Example: The woman confessed that she had stolen the money.
Example_Translation: 這女人承認偷了錢。

Meaning: A cottage is a small, old house in the countryside.
Meaning_Translation: 「鄉村小屋」是鄉間的小而舊的房子。
Example: My aunt lives in a pretty cottage in the mountains.
Example_Translation: 我阿姨住在山裡的漂亮小屋。

Meaning: Daytime is the time of the day when the sky is light.
Meaning_Translation: 「白天」是天空明亮的時間。
Example: The kids are only allowed to play outside in the daytime.
Example_Translation: 孩子只准白天在戶外玩。

Meaning: A desperate person will try anything to do or change something.
Meaning_Translation: 「絕望的」人會不惜一切去完成或改變某事。
Example: I’m desperate to find a new job.
Example_Translation: 我迫切想找新工作。

Meaning: An exhausting activity is very tiring.
Meaning_Translation: 「令人筋疲力盡的」活動非常累人。
Example: After an exhausting journey, we finally arrived.
Example_Translation: 經過漫長旅程，我們終於抵達。

Meaning: To fade is to become quieter or less bright.
Meaning_Translation: 「褪色」或「變弱」是指變得更安靜或更不明亮。
Example: The piece of cloth I found was old and faded.
Example_Translation: 我找到的布料又舊又褪色。

Meaning: A fierce person or animal is angry or violent.
Meaning_Translation: 「兇猛的」人或動物是憤怒或暴力的。
Example: Wolves are fierce animals. Do not disturb them.
Example_Translation: 狼很兇猛，別打擾牠們。

Meaning: To gamble means to play a game that involves winning or losing money.
Meaning_Translation: 「賭博」是指玩涉及輸贏金錢的遊戲。
Example: Many people like to go to casinos to gamble.
Example_Translation: 許多人喜歡去賭場賭博。

Meaning: A lawn is an area covered in grass.
Meaning_Translation: 「草坪」是覆蓋草皮的區域。
Example: My dad keeps the lawn in front of our house very neat.
Example_Translation: 我爸把家門前的草坪維持得很整齊。

Meaning: To mow grass is to cut it to make it short.
Meaning_Translation: 「割草」是指修剪草使其變短。
Example: I mow our lawn every weekend.
Example_Translation: 我每週末修剪草坪。

Meaning: An outlaw is a criminal who hides from the police.
Meaning_Translation: 「亡命之徒」是躲避警察的罪犯。
Example: The police passed out posters of the outlaw to all the people.
Example_Translation: 警方向所有人發放通緝犯海報。

Meaning: A prospect is a possibility that something will happen.
Meaning_Translation: 「前景」是某事可能發生的可能性。
Example: He wakes up every morning with the prospect of having a good day.
Example_Translation: 他每天早上醒來都期待美好的一天。

Meaning: A purse is a bag in which women keep money, makeup, keys, etc.
Meaning_Translation: 「手提包」是女性用來放錢、化妝品、鑰匙等的包包。
Example: My sister likes to buy designer purses.
Example_Translation: 我妹妹喜歡買名牌皮包。

Meaning: A rod is a thin stick made of wood or metal.
Meaning_Translation: 「桿」是木製或金屬製的細長棍。
Example: I bought a new fishing rod to use while on vacation.
Example_Translation: 我買了新釣竿度假時用。

Meaning: Seldom shows that an action doesn’t happen very often.
Meaning_Translation: 「很少」表示某行動不常發生。
Example: It seldom rains in southern Arizona.
Example_Translation: 亞利桑那南部很少下雨。

Meaning: To shave means to cut the hairs on one’s face with a sharp tool.
Meaning_Translation: 「刮鬍子」是指用鋒利工具剃除臉上的毛髮。
Example: My father shaves his face every day because he doesn’t want a beard.
Example_Translation: 我爸每天刮鬍子，因為不想留鬍子。

Meaning: A terrified person or animal is extremely scared.
Meaning_Translation: 「極度恐懼的」人或動物非常害怕。
Example: When I saw the ghost, I was absolutely terrified!
Example_Translation: 我看到鬼時嚇壞了！

Meaning: A wizard is a man who can do magic.
Meaning_Translation: 「巫師」是會施展魔法的男人。
Example: The wizard made gold fall from the sky.
Example_Translation: 巫師讓黃金從天而降。

Meaning: An action done abroad is done in a different country.
Meaning_Translation: 「在國外」進行的行動是在另一個國家做的。
Example: My friend is going on a summer trip abroad.
Example_Translation: 我朋友要出國度暑假。

Meaning: An airline is a company that takes people to different places by plane.
Meaning_Translation: 「航空公司」是用飛機載人到不同地方的公司。
Example: The airline has excellent customer service.
Example_Translation: 這家航空公司客服很好。

Meaning: An audience is a group of people who gather to watch someone do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「觀眾」是聚集觀看他人表演的一群人。
Example: He was excited to be part of the audience.
Example_Translation: 他很興奮能成為觀眾之一。

Meaning: A bargain is a very good price paid for a product.
Meaning_Translation: 「便宜貨」是以非常優惠價格購得的商品。
Example: She was looking forward to getting a good bargain at the supermarket.
Example_Translation: 她期待在超市撿到便宜。

Meaning: A brief action lasts a short time.
Meaning_Translation: 「簡短的」行動持續時間很短。
Example: The lawyers took a brief break.
Example_Translation: 律師們短暫休息。

Meaning: The currency of a country is the type of money used in that country.
Meaning_Translation: 「貨幣」是某國使用的錢幣類型。
Example: The currency in China is different from that in Australia.
Example_Translation: 中國貨幣和澳洲不同。

Meaning: Data is a collection of information and facts.
Meaning_Translation: 「資料」是資訊和事實的集合。
Example: He saved all the data on his computer.
Example_Translation: 他把所有資料存到電腦。

Meaning: Domestic refers to something that happens within a particular country.
Meaning_Translation: 「國內的」是指發生在特定國家內部的。
Example: The airline has fifty domestic flights daily.
Example_Translation: 這家航空公司每天有五十班國內航班。

Meaning: A draft is a piece of written work that is not in its final form.
Meaning_Translation: 「草稿」是尚未定稿的書面作品。
Example: He was writing his first draft.
Example_Translation: 他在寫初稿。

Meaning: To gather is to form a group or bring together.
Meaning_Translation: 「聚集」是指組成群體或集合起來。
Example: We will gather the children before the meeting.
Example_Translation: 我們會在會議前集合孩子。

Meaning: A hobby is a fun and creative activity people do in their free time.
Meaning_Translation: 「嗜好」是人們在空閒時間做的有趣且具創造性的活動。
Example: She liked to paint as a hobby.
Example_Translation: 她喜歡以繪畫為嗜好。

Meaning: An income is the money you earned from work.
Meaning_Translation: 「收入」是你從工作中賺到的錢。
Example: She was saving her income to buy a house.
Example_Translation: 她存薪水買房子。

Meaning: A jet is a fast plane with a big engine.
Meaning_Translation: 「噴射機」是裝有大引擎的快速飛機。
Example: Her company owns a private jet.
Example_Translation: 她公司有私人飛機。

Meaning: Maximum is the highest amount of anything allowed.
Meaning_Translation: 「最大值」是允許的最高數量。
Example: The maximum driving speed here is 80 km/h.
Example_Translation: 此地最高限速80公里/小時。

Meaning: An official thing is approved by someone in authority.
Meaning_Translation: 「官方的」東西是經權威人士批准的。
Example: Her official degree was being transferred.
Example_Translation: 她的正式學位正在轉移中。

Meaning: To recommend means to give advice based on experience.
Meaning_Translation: 「推薦」是指根據經驗給予建議。
Example: His doctor will recommend the best medicine for her cough.
Example_Translation: 他的醫生會推薦治療咳嗽的最佳藥物。

Meaning: To refer to something means to mention or call attention to it.
Meaning_Translation: 「提及」某事是指提到或引起注意。
Example: Mr. Cid referred to the time to show Bill that he was late for class.
Example_Translation: 席德先生提到時間，指出比爾上課遲到。

Meaning: A remote place is distant or far away.
Meaning_Translation: 「偏遠的」地方是遙遠或距離很遠的。
Example: He lived in a remote village in the Himalayas.
Example_Translation: 他住在喜馬拉雅山的偏遠村落。

Meaning: Sleepless describes a time period in which someone does not sleep.
Meaning_Translation: 「失眠的」描述某人沒有睡覺的時期。
Example: Jill had a sleepless night because she had so much on her mind.
Example_Translation: 吉兒因思緒太多而失眠。

Meaning: The volume is the total amount of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「總量」是某物的總數量。
Example: The volume of cars in the parking lot was steadily increasing.
Example_Translation: 停車場車流量穩定增加。

Meaning: To circulate is to spread something around, especially in a circular way.
Meaning_Translation: 「流通」是指將某物散佈開，特別是以環狀方式。
Example: The fan helped to circulate cool air through the room.
Example_Translation: 風扇幫助涼爽空氣在房間流通。

Meaning: Consequent means happening because of a different situation.
Meaning_Translation: 「隨之而來的」意思是因另一情況而發生。
Example: Her consequent rash came after she touched the poisonous plant.
Example_Translation: 她接觸毒植物後出現隨之而來的皮疹。

Meaning: To derive means to come, or originate, from a thing or place.
Meaning_Translation: 「衍生自」是指來自某物或某地。
Example: Red’s nickname was derived from the color of her hair.
Example_Translation: 紅的綽號源自她頭髮的顏色。

Meaning: To drown is to die from not being able to breathe underwater.
Meaning_Translation: 「溺死」是指因無法在水下呼吸而死亡。
Example: He would have drowned if the sailors had not rescued him.
Example_Translation: 若非水手救援，他早就溺死了。

Meaning: A dynasty is a series of rulers who are all from the same family.
Meaning_Translation: 「王朝」是一系列同一家族的統治者。
Example: The ancient Egyptians had a dynasty that lasted for many years.
Example_Translation: 古埃及有個持續多年的王朝。

Meaning: A fraction is a small part of something.
Meaning_Translation: 「一小部分」是某物的小片段。
Example: Only a fraction of the cake was gone.
Example_Translation: 蛋糕只少了一小塊。

Meaning: Frost is a white layer of ice that forms during very cold weather.
Meaning_Translation: 「霜」是在極冷天氣下形成的白色冰層。
Example: In the morning, the trees were all covered with frost.
Example_Translation: 清晨樹木都覆蓋著霜。

Meaning: An illusion is something that looks real, but doesn’t actually exist.
Meaning_Translation: 「幻覺」是看起來真實但實際不存在的東西。
Example: Some pictures create an illusion for the eyes.
Example_Translation: 有些圖片會造成視覺錯覺。

Meaning: To invade is to take over a place by force.
Meaning_Translation: 「入侵」是指以武力佔領某地。
Example: The enemy forces tried to invade our country from the sky.
Example_Translation: 敵軍試圖從空中入侵我國。

Meaning: A lieutenant is a rank in the military or police, or a person with that rank.
Meaning_Translation: 「中尉」是軍隊或警察的軍階，或擁有該階級的人。
Example: The lieutenant was a good leader, and his soldiers respected him.
Example_Translation: 這位中尉是位好領導者，士兵都很尊敬他。

Meaning: Marine describes something related to the sea.
Meaning_Translation: 「海洋的」是與海洋相關的。
Example: A healthy ocean is full of marine animals.
Example_Translation: 健康的海洋充滿海洋生物。

Meaning: A merit is a positive or good quality.
Meaning_Translation: 「優點」是正面或良好的特質。
Example: The actor received an award for his merits in the movie.
Example_Translation: 這位演員因電影中的傑出表現獲獎。

Meaning: A navy is the part of a country’s military that fights at sea.
Meaning_Translation: 「海軍」是國家軍隊中在海上作戰的部分。
Example: My country is known for our strong navy.
Example_Translation: 我國以強大的海軍聞名。

Meaning: Polar relates to the cold places on Earth’s north and south ends.
Meaning_Translation: 「極地的」與地球南北兩端寒冷地區有關。
Example: Only a few people live in the Earth’s northern polar region.
Example_Translation: 只有少數人住在地球北極地區。

Meaning: A ray is a line of light that comes from a bright object.
Meaning_Translation: 「光線」是從明亮物體發出的光線。
Example: The sun’s warm rays covered the beach.
Example_Translation: 太陽溫暖的光線灑滿海灘。

Meaning: To resign means to quit a job.
Meaning_Translation: 「辭職」是指辭去工作。
Example: After I officially resigned from work, I said goodbye to my boss.
Example_Translation: 我正式辭職後向老闆道別。

Meaning: Suicide is the act of killing oneself.
Meaning_Translation: 「自殺」是結束自己生命的行为。
Example: Some people feel so sad that they think suicide is the only answer.
Example_Translation: 有些人悲傷到認為自殺是唯一出路。

Meaning: To tremble is to shake as a result of excitement or cold weather.
Meaning_Translation: 「顫抖」是因興奮或寒冷而發抖。
Example: Harry was not used to the cold, so he trembled most of the day.
Example_Translation: 哈利不習慣寒冷，整天發抖。

Meaning: An underlying thing is a hidden cause or reason.
Meaning_Translation: 「潛在的」東西是隱藏的原因或理由。
Example: Her underlying fear of flying reduced her traveling options.
Example_Translation: 她深層的飛行恐懼限制了旅行選擇。

Meaning: Via introduces a route or means of travel.
Meaning_Translation: 「經由」用來介紹路線或交通方式。
Example: We arrived in the city from the airport via the train.
Example_Translation: 我們從機場搭火車抵達城市。

Meaning: To alter something means to change it.
Meaning_Translation: 「更改」某物是指改變它。
Example: I altered the color of my nails to match my hair.
Example_Translation: 我改變指甲顏色以搭配頭髮。

Meaning: An action done aside is done toward the side of something or someplace.
Meaning_Translation: 「在旁邊」進行的行動是在某物或某地的側邊進行。
Example: The man stood aside and opened the door for me.
Example_Translation: 這男人站到一旁為我開門。

Meaning: Autumn is the season of the year between summer and winter.
Meaning_Translation: 「秋天」是夏季和冬季之間的季節。
Example: I love when the leaves fall in autumn because I can play in them.
Example_Translation: 我愛秋天落葉，因為可以在葉堆玩耍。

Meaning: To blend is to mix two or more things together so that they become one thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「混合」是指將兩種或以上東西融合成一體。
Example: My wife blended together all of the ingredients to make a delicious stew.
Example_Translation: 我太太把所有食材混合煮成美味燉菜。

Meaning: To collapse is to fall down suddenly.
Meaning_Translation: 「倒塌」是指突然倒下。
Example: The tree collapsed right in front of our house.
Example_Translation: 樹就在我家門前倒塌了。

Meaning: To crush something is to press it together so its shape is destroyed.
Meaning_Translation: 「壓碎」某物是指壓緊使其形狀被破壞。
Example: Selena’s new car was crushed when the tree fell on top of it.
Example_Translation: 樹倒下壓毀了賽琳娜的新車。

Meaning: To curve is to move in a line that bends and does not go straight.
Meaning_Translation: 「彎曲」是指沿著彎曲而非直線的路徑移動。
Example: The road curves to the left and to the right.
Example_Translation: 道路左右彎曲。

Meaning: A disgusting thing is very unpleasant.
Meaning_Translation: 「令人作嘔的」東西非常令人不快。
Example: After running all day, Greg’s feet had a disgusting odor.
Example_Translation: 葛瑞格跑了一整天，腳臭得要命。

Meaning: A drain is a pipe that carries away water from a building, such as in a kitchen
Meaning_Translation: 「排水管」是將建築物（如廚房）的水排走的管子。
Example: .The water in the sink goes down the drain as you wash your hands.
Example_Translation: 洗手時水從水槽排水孔流走。

Meaning: To embrace is to hug.
Meaning_Translation: 「擁抱」是指摟抱。
Example: When they saw each other again, the happy couple embraced.
Example_Translation: 這對情侶重逢時緊緊相擁。

Meaning: To envy someone is to wish that you had something that other person has.
Meaning_Translation: 「嫉妒」某人是指希望自己擁有對方擁有的東西。
Example: Sally envied the happy couple.
Example_Translation: 莎莉羨慕這對幸福情侶。

Meaning: Fireworks are objects that create colored lights when they are lit.
Meaning_Translation: 「煙火」是點燃時會產生彩色光芒的物品。
Example: The display of fireworks was so beautiful.
Example_Translation: 煙火表演非常美麗。

Meaning: Flour is a powder made from plants that is used to make foods like bread.
Meaning_Translation: 「麵粉」是用植物製成、用來製作麵包等食物的粉末。
Example: I wanted to bake a pie, but I needed flour.
Example_Translation: 我想烤派，但需要麵粉。

Meaning: A fuse is a string on fireworks that burns to make them explode.
Meaning_Translation: 「引信」是煙火上燃燒後使其爆炸的線。
Example: The boy lit the fuse on the rocket and waited for it to burst in the sky.
Example_Translation: 男孩點燃火箭引信，等它在空中爆炸。

Meaning: Ginger is a root of a plant that is used to make food spicy and sweet.
Meaning_Translation: 「薑」是植物的根，用來讓食物變辣且帶甜味。
Example: Ginger is a common ingredient in many dishes from India.
Example_Translation: 薑是許多印度菜的常見食材。

Meaning: A jealous person might take something from you.
Meaning_Translation: 「嫉妒的」人可能會從你這裡拿走東西。
Example: Miriam was jealous because Sue was paying too much attention to Jim.
Example_Translation: 米里亞姆因蘇太注意吉姆而嫉妒。

Meaning: A paste is a thick and smooth substance.
Meaning_Translation: 「糊狀物」是濃稠且光滑的物質。
Example: My son needed some paste for a school project.
Example_Translation: 我兒子做學校專案需要漿糊。

Meaning: A receipt is a paper that proves that something was received or bought.
Meaning_Translation: 「收據」是證明某物已被收到或購買的紙張。
Example: After looking at my receipt, I realized that I had spent too much money.
Example_Translation: 看了收據後，我才發現花太多錢。

Meaning: To wipe something is to slide a piece of cloth over it to clean it.
Meaning_Translation: 「擦拭」某物是指用布滑過其表面以清潔。
Example: She wiped the dust from the windows.
Example_Translation: 她擦掉窗戶的灰塵。

Meaning: A wire is a thin string made out of metal.
Meaning_Translation: 「電線」是金屬製的細線。
Example: The wires were connected to towers that brought electricity to the city.
Example_Translation: 電線連接到輸電塔，將電力送入城市。

Meaning: To acknowledge something is to accept that it is true or that it exists.
Meaning_Translation: 「承認」某事是指接受它為真或存在。
Example: The teacher acknowledged that the young student was hungry.
Example_Translation: 老師承認這位小學生餓了。

Meaning: An ambassador is a government worker who works in another country.
Meaning_Translation: 「大使」是在另一國工作的政府人員。
Example: The ambassador from Korea was in charge of the conference.
Example_Translation: 韓國大使負責主持會議。

Meaning: A blonde is a person with light-colored hair.
Meaning_Translation: 「金髮的人」是頭髮顏色淺的人。
Example: My cousin is a blonde with blue eyes.
Example_Translation: 我表親是金髮藍眼。

Meaning: To conquer a place means to attack and take control of it.
Meaning_Translation: 「征服」某地是指攻擊並控制它。
Example: The soldiers were trying to conquer the world.
Example_Translation: 士兵試圖征服世界。

Meaning: To drag something means to pull it across the ground.
Meaning_Translation: 「拖曳」某物是指在地面上拉它。
Example: The dog was dragging his owner down the street.
Example_Translation: 狗拖著主人沿街走。

Meaning: To exaggerate is to say that something is bigger or better than it really is.
Meaning_Translation: 「誇大」是指說某事比實際更大或更好。
Example: Jimmy wasn’t exaggerating about the seriousness of his injury.
Example_Translation: 吉米沒誇大傷勢的嚴重性。

Meaning: Heritage is the collection of features of a society, such as language and religion.
Meaning_Translation: 「遺產」是社會特徵（如語言和宗教）的集合。
Example: Teepees are part of the heritage of the Native Americans of the plains.
Example_Translation: 圓錐帳篷是北美平原原住民的文化遺產。

Meaning: To insult someone is to say things that will hurt the person’s feelings.
Meaning_Translation: 「侮辱」某人是指說傷害其感受的話。
Example: The girls insulted each other all afternoon.
Example_Translation: 女孩們整個下午互相辱罵。

Meaning: An action that happens meanwhile happens at the same time as another action.
Meaning_Translation: 「同時」指一件事與另一件事在同一時間發生。
Example: He wants to be a doctor in the future, but meanwhile, he works a regular job.
Example_Translation: 他未來想當醫生，但目前做一般工作。

Meaning: A necklace is a piece of jewelry that people wear around their necks.
Meaning_Translation: 「項鍊」是人們戴在脖子上的珠寶飾品。
Example: Joyce received a lovely pearl necklace for her wedding anniversary.
Example_Translation: 喬伊斯在結婚紀念日收到美麗的珍珠項鍊。

Meaning: A noble is a rich and powerful person.
Meaning_Translation: 「貴族」是富有且有權勢的人。
Example: The Queen invited a noble from a nearby country to dinner.
Example_Translation: 女王邀請鄰國貴族共進晚餐。

Meaning: A precious thing is valuable and important.
Meaning_Translation: 「珍貴的」事物既重要又有價值。
Example: In a desert, water can be more precious than money.
Example_Translation: 在沙漠，水比錢更珍貴。

Meaning: A prejudice is an unfair opinion about people based on the group they belong to.
Meaning_Translation: 「偏見」是基於某人所屬群體而對其產生的不公平看法。
Example: The company’s rules against gender prejudice must be enforced.
Example_Translation: 公司反性別偏見的規定必須執行。

Meaning: A rumor is a story that may not be true.
Meaning_Translation: 「謠言」是可能不真實的故事。
Example: Carla was spreading rumors around the office.
Example_Translation: 卡拉在辦公室散播謠言。

Meaning: A sin is something that is wrong for religious reasons.
Meaning_Translation: 「罪」是出於宗教原因而被視為錯誤的行為。
Example: Taking something that doesn’t belong to you is a sin.
Example_Translation: 拿不屬於自己的東西是罪過。

Meaning: A spectacle is an amazing sight.
Meaning_Translation: 「奇觀」是令人驚嘆的景象。
Example: Niagara Falls is quite a spectacle.
Example_Translation: 尼加拉瀑布非常壯觀。

Meaning: A stack is a pile of different things.
Meaning_Translation: 「堆疊」是一疊不同的東西。
Example: There was a stack of paperwork on his desk to complete.
Example_Translation: 他桌上有一疊待完成的文件。

Meaning: A suspicious person does not trust others, or is not trusted by others.
Meaning_Translation: 「可疑的」人是指不信任別人，或不被別人信任的人。
Example: Dad was suspicious of the caller on the line.
Example_Translation: 爸爸懷疑電話那頭的人。

Meaning: Tin is an inexpensive metal.
Meaning_Translation: 「錫」是一種便宜的金屬。
Example: Soup is a food that is often sold in tin cans.
Example_Translation: 湯常裝在錫罐裡販售。

Meaning: A vase is an attractive container in which people keep flowers.
Meaning_Translation: 「花瓶」是用來插花的漂亮容器。
Example: The vase was filled with such lovely flowers.
Example_Translation: 花瓶插滿美麗的花。

Meaning: To ache is to hurt, or cause pain.
Meaning_Translation: 「疼痛」是指感到痛或引起痛。
Example: Mindy’s head ached because she bumped it against the wall.
Example_Translation: 明蒂頭撞到牆，所以頭痛。

Meaning: Arctic shows that something is of or from the cold, far-north part of the Earth.
Meaning_Translation: 「北極的」指來自地球寒冷遙遠北方的事物。
Example: It is cold when the arctic winds blow.
Example_Translation: 北極風吹起時很冷。

Meaning: A canal is a path for water to travel through.
Meaning_Translation: 「運河」是供水流經的通道。
Example: The city of Venice, Italy, has many canals.
Example_Translation: 義大利威尼斯有許多運河。

Meaning: A chemist is a scientist who works with chemicals.
Meaning_Translation: 「化學家」是從事化學研究的科學家。
Example: My mother is a successful chemist who helps invent new products.
Example_Translation: 我媽是成功的化學家，協助發明新產品。

Meaning: A chill is a feeling of cold.
Meaning_Translation: 「寒意」是感到寒冷的感覺。
Example: The chill from the cold wind made Bill shiver.
Example_Translation: 冷風讓比爾發抖。

Meaning: Congress is a group of leaders in a government.
Meaning_Translation: 「國會」是政府中的一群領導者。
Example: Congress makes laws for people to follow.
Example_Translation: 國會制定人民須遵守的法律。

Meaning: Dairy shows that something is made from milk.
Meaning_Translation: 「乳製的」指由牛奶製成的東西。
Example: Things like milk and cheese are dairy foods.
Example_Translation: 牛奶和起司等屬於乳製品。

Meaning: To descend is to go downward.
Meaning_Translation: 「下降」是指向下移動。
Example: I descended the stairs to get out of the building.
Example_Translation: 我走下樓梯離開大樓。

Meaning: A grocer is a person who sells food.
Meaning_Translation: 「雜貨商」是販賣食品的人。
Example: Our grocer, Mr. Smith, is a very kind man.
Example_Translation: 我們的雜貨商史密斯先生人很好。

Meaning: To hesitate is to wait for a short time before doing something.
Meaning_Translation: 「猶豫」是指在做某事前短暫地遲疑。
Example: He hesitated for a moment before he decided which one to choose.
Example_Translation: 他猶豫了一下才決定選哪個。

Meaning: An institution is an organization that works to help a city or group of people.
Meaning_Translation: 「機構」是致力於幫助城市或人群的組織。
Example: Banks are vital institutions that businesses and people use every day.
Example_Translation: 銀行是企業和民眾每天使用的關鍵機構。

Meaning: To jog is to run slowly.
Meaning_Translation: 「慢跑」是指緩慢地跑步。
Example: He jogs every day so he can be healthier.
Example_Translation: 他每天慢跑以保持健康。

Meaning: A merchant is a person who sells things.
Meaning_Translation: 「商人」是販賣商品的人。
Example: The merchant was selling used cars.
Example_Translation: 商人在賣二手車。

Meaning: To poke something is to push something quickly with your finger or a pointed object.
Meaning_Translation: 「戳」是指用手指或尖銳物快速推一下。
Example: I poked my finger on a thumb tack.
Example_Translation: 我手指被圖釘刺到。

Meaning: To postpone something is to make it happen later than planned.
Meaning_Translation: 「推遲」是指讓某事比原定時間晚些發生。
Example: They postponed the meeting until Elena arrived.
Example_Translation: 他們把會議延到艾蓮娜到達。

Meaning: To splash is to crash into something so that liquid spreads out.
Meaning_Translation: 「潑濺」是指撞擊液體使其四散飛濺。
Example: Some green paint splashed upon the floor.
Example_Translation: 一些綠色油漆潑到地板上。

Meaning: Stubborn people don’t change their minds easily.
Meaning_Translation: 「固執的」人不容易改變主意。
Example: Both of my parents are stubborn. They never give in to each other.
Example_Translation: 我父母都很固執，從不讓步。

Meaning: A suburb is a small part of a large city.
Meaning_Translation: 「郊區」是大城市邊緣的小區域。
Example: I grew up in the suburbs, only a few minutes outside of the city.
Example_Translation: 我在郊區長大，離市區只有幾分鐘路程。

Meaning: The tide is the level of the water in the sea.
Meaning_Translation: 「潮汐」是海水的水位變化。
Example: The tide continued to crawl upon the beach little by little.
Example_Translation: 潮水一點點漫上沙灘。

Meaning: A tragedy is a very sad event.
Meaning_Translation: 「悲劇」是非常悲傷的事件。
Example: It was a tragedy when his house was struck by lightning and burned.
Example_Translation: 他家遭雷擊起火是場悲劇。

Meaning: A bomb is an object that explodes and destroys large areas.
Meaning_Translation: 「炸彈」是會爆炸並摧毀大片區域的裝置。
Example: The bomb will destroy anything that is nearby.
Example_Translation: 炸彈會摧毀附近一切。

Meaning: A certificate is a document that says that something is true or happened.
Meaning_Translation: 「證書」是證明某事真實或已發生的文件。
Example: I was given a certificate for completing the computer course.
Example_Translation: 我完成電腦課程後拿到證書。

Meaning: A circumstance is an event that makes a situation what it is.
Meaning_Translation: 「情況」是使某個局勢成為現狀的事件或條件。
Example: There were many circumstances behind their success, like hard work.
Example_Translation: 他們成功背後有很多因素，例如努力。

Meaning: A coffin is a box used to bury dead people.
Meaning_Translation: 「棺材」是用來埋葬死者的箱子。
Example: When people pass away, they are usually buried inside of a coffin.
Example_Translation: 人過世後通常葬在棺材裡。

Meaning: To cope with a difficult or stressful situation means to deal with it.
Meaning_Translation: 「應對」困難或壓力情境是指設法處理它。
Example: He copes with work stress by exercising three or four times a week.
Example_Translation: 他每週運動三、四次來應對工作壓力。

Meaning: Criticism is the act of saying that something is not correct or good.
Meaning_Translation: 「批評」是指指出某事不正確或不好。
Example: She had a lot of criticism about their new plan.
Example_Translation: 她對他們的新計畫有很多批評。

Meaning: To devastate something is to cause great damage or pain to that thing.
Meaning_Translation: 「摧毀」某物是指對其造成嚴重損害或痛苦。
Example: The entire wall was devastated.
Example_Translation: 整面牆被摧毀。

Meaning: To frown is to make an unhappy look with one’s face.
Meaning_Translation: 「皺眉」是指臉上露出不開心的表情。
Example: Melissa frowned when she found out that the party had been cancelled.
Example_Translation: 梅莉莎得知派對取消時皺眉。

Meaning: To gaze at something means to look at it for a long time.
Meaning_Translation: 「凝視」是指長時間注視某物。
Example: We used a telescope to gaze at the stars for over an hour.
Example_Translation: 我們用望遠鏡凝視星星超過一小時。

Meaning: To glance at something means to look at it quickly.
Meaning_Translation: 「瞥一眼」是指快速地看一眼。
Example: She glanced behind her to see if he was looking at her.
Example_Translation: 她回頭瞥一眼看他是否在看她。

Meaning: Grief is the feeling of deep sadness, usually when a person dies.
Meaning_Translation: 「悲傷」是深切的哀傷，通常發生在有人去世時。
Example: The grief caused by losing her parents was very difficult for her.
Example_Translation: 失去父母的悲痛讓她難以承受。

Meaning: A groom is a man who is going to be married.
Meaning_Translation: 「新郎」是即將結婚的男子。
Example: The groom looked happy as he walked with his new wife.
Example_Translation: 新郎和新娘同行時看起來很幸福。

Meaning: A license is an official document that gives one permission to do something.
Meaning_Translation: 「執照」是官方核發、允許從事某事的文件。
Example: In the United States, you need a driver’s license to drive legally.
Example_Translation: 在美國，合法開車需要駕照。

Meaning: A microscope is a device that makes small objects look bigger.
Meaning_Translation: 「顯微鏡」是讓微小物體看起來變大的儀器。
Example: Germs cannot be seen without a microscope.
Example_Translation: 沒有顯微鏡看不到細菌。

Meaning: A nuclear thing relates to the division or joining of atoms.
Meaning_Translation: 「核能的」事物與原子的分裂或結合有關。
Example: Nuclear power plants provide inexpensive energy to cities.
Example_Translation: 核電廠為城市提供便宜能源。

Meaning: To portray something means to describe it or show it in a picture.
Meaning_Translation: 「描繪」某物是指用文字描述或用圖像呈現。
Example: Her picture portrayed the house she grew up in when she was little.
Example_Translation: 她的畫描繪了她小時候住的房子。

Meaning: To rotate something means to turn it around in a circle.
Meaning_Translation: 「旋轉」某物是指使其繞圈轉動。
Example: An airplane’s propellers rotate quickly to help it fly.
Example_Translation: 飛機螺旋槳快速旋轉以助飛行。

Meaning: A souvenir is something bought to remember of a place or event.
Meaning_Translation: 「紀念品」是為了記住某地或某事件而購買的物品。
Example: I bought a Russian doll as a souvenir on my trip to Moscow.
Example_Translation: 我去莫斯科旅行時買了俄羅斯娃娃當紀念品。

Meaning: A submarine is a boat that can go underwater for long periods of time.
Meaning_Translation: 「潛艇」是能在水下長時間航行的船隻。
Example: The submarine dove under the sea so the enemy couldn’t see it.
Example_Translation: 潛艇潛入海底以免被敵人發現。

Meaning: To trace something means to follow over it with the eyes or a finger.
Meaning_Translation: 「描摹」某物是指用眼睛或手指沿著其輪廓移動。
Example: He traced over the graph with his finger.
Example_Translation: 他用手指描繪圖表。

Meaning: A coastline is the outline of a country’s coast.
Meaning_Translation: 「海岸線」是一個國家海岸的輪廓。
Example: He noticed that most of the cities in Australia are on the coastline.
Example_Translation: 他注意到澳洲大多數城市位於海岸線。

Meaning: To deter means to prevent or discourage someone from doing something.
Meaning_Translation: 「阻止」是指防止或勸阻某人做某事。
Example: Icy roads deter people from driving their cars.
Example_Translation: 結冰路面讓人不敢開車。

Meaning: To devise something means to come up with an idea or plan about it.
Meaning_Translation: 「設計」某事是指想出相關的點子或計畫。
Example: The thieves devised a plan to steal the diamonds.
Example_Translation: 小偷策劃偷鑽石的計畫。

Meaning: A distance is how far it is between two points.
Meaning_Translation: 「距離」是兩點之間的長度。
Example: The distance between America and Russia is about 8,000 km.
Example_Translation: 美國和俄羅斯距離約8000公里。

Meaning: Expertise is the knowledge and skills to do something well.
